title: Nice Stay
review: Stayed here for 03 nights in November. Had booked a Family Suite, but upon check in they didnt have the type of room available. Got upgraded to one bedroom suite,,, which is a reasonable alternative.  Room was clean and spacious.  Breakfast was standard 4 star fare... No complaints.  Staff was courteous and helpful.  Location is good. Not too far from anything.  A good no-frills stay.  Will definitely consider staying her for again.

title: Staff service

title: The staffs are really good ... I am really happy
review: Had a pleasant stay at Centara Pattaya. The rooms are comfortable and the staff is friendly. A very good value for money hotel with nice peaceful surroundings yet good and central location.  I had issues with my original room initially but was instantly offered another room which was good. Special thanks to Marissa (front office manager) and Nui, who were very helpful and made my stay memorable.   - Dr. Viraj Darode.

title: Good Hotel in proximity to market area
review: Room size is good with sit out space but bathroom bit cozy. Breakfast area is bit small for large groups. Be cautious for swimming pool too as it's average depth is 1.6m. This may be good for swimmers but not for beginners.

title: Location is best rest okay
review: Centara Pattaya Hotel (Indian themed Vegetarian Breakfast Buffet on the 2nd floor)(okay)  78/140 Moo 9, Pattaya, Banglamung, Chonburi 20150 Just west of 2nd Road on Phatthayasaisong 4 (which is just south of Soi 6 on the east side of 2nd Road)  038-295-999  Listed at facebook group > Vegetarian or Vegan Friendly Restaurants in Pattaya in Thailand & Beyond   Indian style Vegetarian Breakfast Buffet 300b > Indian main dishes, a couple of them tasted okay / Tofu dish, excellent / Muesli, very tasty / Fresh Fruit Salad / Yogurt / real Orange & Pineapple Juices / no omelet station just cooked Eggs that were cold / Olive Oil & Lemon to make dressing but not many ingredients to make a Salad, no lettuce / only Pastries for dessert, no ice cream, pies, cakes or puddings / no whole wheat…

title: Pathetic Experience!!!!!
review: we stayed at this hotel for 3 nights from 28th to 30th oct with my family of 7 people and one child... and it was my worst experience ever...   First of all when we arrived at hotel... there was no one to greet nor any welcome drinks... i reached to the reception it was clumsy... the person at reception doesnt even carry a smile while seeing us..   Now, coming to our reservation... we booked three family studios .. he said he dont have family studios on same floor...he was offering me the rooms on three different floors... i requested him as i m travelling with my parents and in laws.. how can we stay like this... then he said i will upgrade one room to one bedroom suite and in this way i will get two rooms on same floor and one on another floor..it was so annoying that i got…

title: Good place to stay
review: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for having stayed with us at Centara Pattaya Hotel and for your feedback.  I am sorry that we have failed to provide you with a flawless stay experience and from the onset, please accept my most sincere apologies for the disturbances you have experienced and the inconvenience caused.  What you have stated is certainly not the Centara standards we commit to our guests.  We value your observations, and it is constructive feedback such as yours that enables us to improve.   It is very apparent that there were a lot of shortcomings from our end that requires urgent attention.  Your comments will be addressed to ensure such glitches will not transpire again in the future.  Once again, please accept my sincere apologies for any inconvenience caused, and thank you for the time you have taken to provide us with your feedback.  With best regards, The Management

title: Mr Rakesh Gauri
review: Centara Pattaya is a nice hotel which is clean and neat. I like the hotel. It has a good spread of breakfast. They are little slow isn service during breakfast. There are many Indian Tour operators groups who come and stay put at Centara Pattaya.  They also have free shuttle bus service do check. A seven eleven (departmental store) is just 2 mins walk away.  One can easily fine Tuk Tuk taxi outside.  One star less as one can easily hear the person in another room.

title: Excellent service by Shan
review: Dear Valued Guest, What a great review, many thanks for staying with us and delighted you had many memorable experiences during your visit.  We also wish to thank you for your honest feedback and particularly for your comments on where we could improve.  Feedback is so important to us and your highlighted points have been communicated to the teams and management for action. Best regards, The Management

title: The house keeping service is very slow. Had to call 3 times and the also after that I would receive my stuff in 15 mins.
review: This was my second visit to Centara Pattaya hotel. It has been an excellent experience the service is very good the rooms are fantastic . It’s very well located . The staff is amazing , Pla at the front desk has been absolutely brilliant she is very competent at her job in my experience service with a great Thai smile

title: quite place , peaceful hotel
review: I have always had a wonderful time staying here at this hotel property. The proximity to most places from here worth mentioning. I travel here to Pattaya with groups of people from India.its not easy to handle guests in such huge numbers andprovide clean rooms and a lovely spread of food for breakfast. This time weused the conference room services and they were more than accommodative with the program getting delayed by a bit. Kudos to Ms. Boom and her team. Thank you Centara Team for such a wonderful stay.

review: this hotel is a quite place to relax The rooms are cosy .House Keeping .is good Support Staff service requires improvement Check the Mini Bar . The inventory was less in mini bar than that listed in the card The Break fast spread is above average but not great . To sum it up for mid range budget the hotel is decent but not great

title: Lovely place.
review: Lovely and friendly staff, especially Khun Tan - the Executive Assistant Manager, he is very helpful and enthusiastic.  We love the Thai food there, reasonable price and the quality is exquisites. We have a pleasant stay here, definitely will come back next time.

title: Good value. Good location.

title: My holidays
review: I am from Spain. I stayed six nights at Centara Pattaya Hotel. It was a very nice experience, despite the continuous problems with the WiFi.  Special thanks to Recon, Pla and Marissa working at reception. Special thanks also to lady maid clean my room every day in the 5th floor (sector B). Looking forward to see you soon again.

title: Vijay
review: Very good stay welcomed by drink  Hotel has nice accommodation facility including free Wi-Fi cool swimming pool clean rooms with very good room service Hotel have good staff Pla hotel manager very good very helpful good commutator caring  Will like to stay again

First time trip to Pattaya and picked this hotel as it looked like it was in the middle of everything. Overall the stay was 50/50 for me, the hotel upgraded me on my arrival as they were inundated with guests from India. The room I had was lovely, one bedroom apartment/suite, but the air conditioning wasn’t working so I had to call the hotel maintenance guy to sort it out. Other than that the room was excellent.   Location wise, for me it was not great. To get to beach road you more or less have to walk down soi 6 where there are loads and loads of bar girls grabbing you as you walk past their establishment. Ok, fair enough, it’s nice for a single bloke but after two days the whole experience gets on your nerves. Indian restaurants everywhere in the area, although there is a…

title: good location and nice hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for having taken your time to provide us with your valuable feedback relating to your stay with us. We are sincerely concerned and apologies that we fell short on your expectations in some area. Your helpful comments are much appreciated, and your feedback will help us to continually improve the standard of facilities and services offered to all our guests. We are appreciative of your positive comments about our staff friendliness and service.  We greatly appreciate your feedback, as it helps us to improve and provide a better experience and sincerely hope that we can have an opportunity to welcome you back.  Kind regards, The Management

title: Good hotel worth every money
review: the location is very good and you can go to walking street by walk at about 20 minutes near the beach.the access is good and 7-11 market and family market and money changer is near the hotel.breakfast is good.

review: Super staff very professional lokationen a little away from Down town but 10 min bat but your in Down town i stay de luxe room Big room clean this hotel just live up to centara standart super super install here again next time

They went out of there way to decorate our room for my birthday - which was a lovely surprise.  Did i mention the yummy surprise cake too :)   Thank you Marisa!!

title: Relaxation of the family
review: I will like to come again and again to same hotel. It is very nice. Friendly front desk and staff. Good room service. Good breakfast. I will recommend it again to my friends and family. Swimming pool is very nice.

title: Trip to Thai
review: Last weekend I went to Pattaya with my family. We went by car. Pattaya is in the east of Thailand and is a popular seaside resort. We stayed in Centara Pattaya Hotel. On Saturday and Sunday I played in the sea with my family. In the evening we walked around the town and then ate . We had a really fun time.

title: Good hotel near beach
review: Right from the breakfast spread to the hospitality of the staff, everything makes the stay comfortable.   Well maintained pool and good options to relax when you need to take mind off work.  Staff spending an extra minute to make guests comfortable.   The place is definitely going to be my first choice considering the beach is nearby.

title: The worst Crowd
review: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you so much for your very kind review. It was a pleasure to welcome you. It so wonderful to read that our team was able to take good care of you. I am so pleased to see that you enjoyed your overall experience.  We hope to be able to see you again here soon. Best regards, The Management

title: Very happy with my experience at centara
review: Firstly the crowd at the Hotel was really not good. As we girls travelling they would have offered us connecting rooms but that was not the case . the rooms were far. The Hotel Floor and Rooms were conjusted. Our AC was not working. Next door the water was coming out from the room. The Breakfast was not upto the mark. We had told to taken the Breakfast with the Group. Which were litreally the worst and first time vister people. I am sorry but this was my worst Hotel in thailand, As we have visited Phuket , Bangkok too. But nothing worst and unsafety then this hotel

title: Overall Nice stay
review: Dear Valued Guest, We are sorry to read that your expectation was not met 100% this time. Please know that all our rooms are getting a yearly touch up. All your points has been followed up and been addressed with concerned Managers and teams. We have inspected this room with our Executive Housekeeping Manager and our Chief Engineer.  Rest assures that we are all working hard to try to meet all guests expectations and we are all very passionate in our work. If we for any reasons cannot met all expectations we try to find a solution during our guest stay. You are more than welcome to contact direct at the hotel for any further comments. Thank you again and we hope to see you back on your next visit to show our improvements. Sincerely Yours,  The Management

title: Good stay & food
review: Centara Pattaya hotel is one of the best budget hotel in Pattaya. I’m very happy with the food and my room. Due to very high occupancy, the housekeeping is a little slow but they get the job done. Very impressed by the service. Thank you Jason and Karan for the amazing service and hospitality.

title: Great staff and food
review: They have kept western and indian food which allows us to have wider variety of choice and the staff try to talk with us to make us comfortable which is absolutely the best thing and I want to see this in every hotel as it makes us feel like home far from home. thx for the service centara and karan u too thx for the knowledge it helped us aloy in finding our routes.

title: Nice stay
review: Everything is very good in here and as I am concious about cleanliness they have looked for it very nicely and I was facing indian food problem in Pattaya as it was taste less everywhere but centara has provided very well indian food. Loved the thali. Thanks for the wonderful stay.

title: Great location and service
review: It was a nice stay overall and looking forward to come back soon and the swimming pool was big and very well maintained. Centara has totally looked on their hygiene and comfort for guests thanku centara loved it and karan thx.

title: Best of best
review: Centara pattaya hotel provided us one of the best stay in all over pattaya.. their services differ from another hotel like their humble nature with guests and absolutely fantastic fine dining and early morning indian buffet breakfast. Overall it was a great stay. Thankyou .

title: Hanis Spore
review: This was actually a good choice we made for the family holiday because this place is perfect for staying  with family and friends. Very close to Alacazar show which is within the walking distance and close to some of the good shopping options and food street. It's also located in main street which connects with rest of the city & beaches with all night running tuk-tuks & beautiful beaches are also very close within  min walk. Nice bar at pool, good breakfast makes this place a perfect combination of fun filled stay with affordable budget.

title: Mr Hodge
review: Room are clean n have 2 Queen size bed..Aircondition n wifi are good.. Location walking distance to the town n even can walk to Terminal 21 mall.Staffs are friendly and helpful..Sad is that csnt swim in the pool as there are to noisy wth other guests.

title: Good Hotel, Good location
review: First of all, location is good with beach, alcazar, tiffany, terminal 21 mall, 7/11, indian restaurants nereby. Room good with pool view. English breakfast better than Indian which had Poha & Upma daily.

title: Absolutely enjoyed my stay at centara Pattaya hotel

title: What I thought
review: This hotel has the best location in pattaya. The food is very good. Amazing service. And the rooms are very reasonable and clean. Although I felt that the front desk can improve on guest requests and complaints. Overall it was a good experience. Enjoyed pattaya.

title: Good property for a Family
review: It is a decent property with all nice amenities. The rooms are good and have a adjoined balcony. The joint rooms are good fro big families. The Breakfast spread is OK. The only negative point is they charge for everything. My son by mistake broke a glass and they charged me 100 Bahts for the same. They charge the same even for a Laundry bag. I think its jus not fair.

title: Pattaya International Fireworks Festival 2019
review: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your comments. We appreciate your good comments about our location, room size and amenities. We are sorry to read that you had an unpleasant experience with some area. We hope to be able to welcome you back here again.. Best regards, The Management

title: Third Class, unethical forget 4 star it doesn’t deserve a single
review: I made a trip to see fireworks at - Pattaya International Fireworks Festival 2019 Pros - 2 minutes to 7-11 - 5 minutes to GIRLS street (Soi 6) - 10 minutes far from beach - reasonable price - clean room - big room  Cons - facilities quiet old - public area temperature is too hot.

title: Best stay at centara pattaya.must recommended.
review: Dear Valued Guest, It was our great pleasure to be your accommodation in Pattaya. We are glad to know that you enjoyed stay over all. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we strive to make each and every guest feel comfortable while staying with us. We are sorry to read that you had an unpleasant experience with some area. We hope to be able to welcome you back here to see our improvements. Best regards, The Management

title: IT IS A 2 STAR PROPERTY
review: Booked 5 rooms through a travel agent, checked in late evening shocked to see wet floor in 4 rooms, the housekeeping quickly sent a guy who mopped the floor, used the bathroom the flush was not working , dental kit & moisturizer was not provided even after requesting , breakfast is so so. I just asked for fresh towels & soap which was not replenished during my 2 days stay, few mins back & the lady on the other side of phone says we can’t provide u with fresh towel & soap as you are checking out today. I feel sorry for them to work at such crap place, will never ever stay aga In at any of central property. & will never recommend rather I will ask to refrain from booking, I’m writing this review from the hotel itself, expecting to be charged for one or other thing while checking…

title: Memorable staff
review: Hotel front desk staffs are cooperative wehave book reconnecting  room its good for us because we have 2 kids food quality was awesome just like indian restaurant Mr karan meet there he is very cooperating and supporting. All is well we recommend  this property is good in all.

title: Pattaya trip
review: Dear Eranilsoni, Thank you so much for your very kind review. It was a pleasure to welcome you. It so wonderful to read that our team was able to take good care of you. title: Awesome experience at centara Pattaya hotel.
review: Have a wonderful experience while my stay at the hotel excellent location good connectivity and everything you need is near by. Value for money. Helping staff. Neat and clean rooms and good experience at pool. Thanks

title: Great stay at centara Pattaya hotel
review: Dear LalitM92, Thank you for your wonderful review. This is exactly the type of experience we strive to create for each, and every guest and I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. title: My 3rd Time At The Centara
review: Great experience at centara Pattaya hotel. The spa and massage was the best experince.very modern rooms.very good food at the buffet. I absolutely loved this hotel.i will recommend this to anyone.the staff was very helpful.

title: very dissapointed
review: They lost our booking , then agreed to give us rooms ,until we could sort out the problem, however had to pay cash, would not accept credit cards , we had just arrived and had not had time to change money. we where eventually given rooms standard when we had paid for deluxe accommodation.  We have been going to this hotel twice a year for over 6 years , the place stated out fine however every year nothing has changed rooms are old and tried the food in the restaurant is not to the point its the last place i would eat terrible food.  the air-conditioning in the rooms is not functioning correctly very noisy and unreliable the rooms need updating and the bathrooms are old and need a good clean  the room service and laundry service is non assistance. polite staff but unfortunately…

title: Not worth the price
review: Dear Valued Guest, Greetings from Centara Pattaya Hotel. First of all I apologies for the delay in replying to your review and thank you very much for taking the time to provide us your comment following your recent stay with us, it helps us to take faster actions on needed areas and departments. In our pursuit of excellence sometimes we fail, please allow me to express my sincere apologies for the inconveniences you have experienced during stay with us. Regarding to your missed booking, unfortunately our reservation didn’t received any confirmation prior to your arrival. And I believed that our staff explained it you.  Mr. Mario, as all circumstances, I understood how you were irritated and feel annoyed. Rest assured that this kind of incident will be addressed to faster swift improvement and this shall not be allowed to occur in the future.  Please accept our sincere apologies once again and rest assured the necessary corrective improvements have been implemented.   Your constructive feedback has been most helpful in assisting us in ensuring that we provide the highest standards of service and products for all guests and visitors to the property. I trust and hope that this experience has not impaired your view of our hotel.   If any member of our hotel management can be of any assistance in the future, please do not hesitate to contact us at your earliest convenience.  Best Regards, The Management

title: Great stay at CPY
review: It's not cheap with the kind of experience you'll get there. There is absolutely no service given, we got the room and just the room. Even for ice we had to come down to the bar and they say "it's free, isnt the great enough?"  Rooms are clean but gives very shady feel. I would not recommend this place.

title: Centara hotel to old and tired
review: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your comments. We are sorry to see that all your expectation was not met at this time.  We take our guests'comments seriously and discuss them with our employees in detail particularly with heads and employees of a particular department the comments refer to and we always see if there are thing we can do better and if there is a way to improve our services so thank you on pointing out several areas of possible improvements.  Best regards, The Management

title: Try other hotels.
review: Great food ,great service, great accommodation. Thank you central pattaya . Definitely recommended. Great hotel. The staff are very polite. The location is great. Very close to the sea. Absolutely loved this hotel

title: Friendly service and great prices
review: As always its the staff that make this hotel special. The rooms are a large, tidy and priced well. Good location for all the large malls. The hotel is getting a little "tired" but that is reflected in the pricing of this hotel. As a group leader who uses this  hotel for plastic surgery tours, I find the staff very supportive and go out of their way to help but going that extra mile whilst my clients heal and shop)

title: Great Stay
review: Dear Ms. Jackie, Thank you for your wonderful review. This is exactly the type of experience we strive to create for each, and every guest and I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Please know that I will share your feedback to our team. We have also noted your comments about our hotel condition.  Again thank you and welcome back! Best regards, The Management .

title: Superb
review: 5 Stars Services. Good Location with shopping centre around by walking distances. 7/11 is just out the main road. Room is big and clean. All staffs are very helpful with service mind.   Hotel is a bit hard to find.

title: Centered
review: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback, it is with a great pleasure to know that you had enjoyed your overall stay with us. The compliment you have given to us has been shared with  our  team . It is a great achievement for us to know that all the effort the team has put into their duty paid off by having such a lovely feedback from you.  We look forward to welcome you back in the near future.  Sincerely yours, The Management

title: Short Break
review: The front office and the other in house staff were friendly ,polite and very supportive.The rooms and premises too were very neat and clean.The facilities were good.Special mention for the breakfast too.

title: Centara Pattaya ( Comfortable stay)
review: Arrived at the hotel @ 1030 am. Normal check in time is 1500. Still they allowed us to do check in. As we were travelling with our 3yr old child, after 5 hrs of night flight and additionally 2 hr drive from Bangkok, early check in was very much required, thanks to centara team. Hotel is located very close to " Art in paradise " one of the attractions in Pattaya. We were in deluxe room. Breakfast is good. Room service is quick. Food quality is good. Rooms are good. Overall a very comfortable stay. Check out was quick. Definitely recommended.

title: Impeccable :)
review: Dear YatinS897, Thank you for your wonderful review. This is exactly the type of experience we strive to create for each, and every guest and I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Please know that I will share your feedback to our team. Again thank you and we hope to welcome you back again soon. Best regards, The Management

title: Excellent hotel
review: Thank you l enjoyed my stay very much, but it all went to quick. Now lm back at work, l would love to come back to Thailand and Centara Hotel. The Jomtien Beach is excellent, l love the friendliness in Pattaya.

title: Nice hotel with friendly staff
review: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your wonderful review. This is exactly the type of experience we strive to create for each, and every guest and I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Please know that I will share your feedback to our team. Again thank you and we hope to welcome you back again soon. Best regards, The Management

title: Good location to soi-6 fun. Free shuttle to area restaurants bars attractions
review: The hotel is near to everything, soi 6 2 minutes walk.. 7/11 outside hotel... Indian restaurant very near to the hotel... beach 5 minutes walk... walking street 10 bht ride away... overall I recommend this hotel to families friends solo... meetings as well.

title: Gd one just amazing
review: Amazing hotel and good supporting staff  Gd quility staff time less service  Gd location also gd food  And also good superb room and ac quality  Swimming pool excellent staff foods good service good staff

title: Very good experince Everything is good
review: Dear Camper02074770786,  Thank you so much for your very kind review. It was a pleasure to welcome you and thank you so much for choosing Centara Pattaya Hotel. It is great to read that our team was able to provide you with good service.  We hope to be able to see you again here soon.  Best regards, The Management

title: Nice Place ... value for money !
review: Very good service i felt very good experince nice food location is very good Pool is also good Everything is good Whenever i will come  Will come to ur hotel I will back sooon This is one of best tour Thanx so much

title: A pleasant stay
review: Dear Passenger17315823210, Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback after your recent stay with us. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We are pleased to hear that you enjoy our hotel. Welcome back! Best regards, The Management

title: Just an average hotel
review: Nice stay at Centara Pattaya Hotel. Services staff, travel desk and location is great. Recommended for stay with families, a lot of small vendors and markets are just nearby. On the whole this place caters needs of tourists during their stay. Good Job!

title: Nice stay
review: The hotel was conveniently located and was very near to all attractions.. I wish to heap alot of praise on Ms Marrissa Lobby Manager very courteous and a very warm lady who made up for all the hiccups we had during our stay.. 🌟

title: CENTARA PATTAYA
review: Dear Manvinder, Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback after your recent stay with us. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We are pleased to hear that you enjoy our hotel. I have shared your great feedback with our Front Office Manager Kh. Marissa. We hope to be able to see you again here soon. Best regards,  The Management

title: Centara Pattaya
review: check inn time & needs good hospitality rather than a show. overall thali was good. but for breakfast per person 3000 thb seems to be idiotic. because we had our breakfast in 200 THB at Mc Donald. it is more commercial than professional

title: Good location
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for staying with us. We are sincerely concerned and apologies that we fell short on your expectations in some area.  We greatly appreciate your feedback, as it helps us to improve and provide a better experience and sincerely hope that we can have an opportunity to welcome you back.  Best regards, The Management

title: Fantastic Hotel and excellent service
review: Very good hotel with excellent services. The hospitality was good, breakfast and services were good.             we will again visit the same hotel if plan for Pattaya in near future. Location was good and very suitable for family.

title: Second visit to this hotel in 3 months
review: Wonderful stay.  Staff really friendly and helpful. Excellent room, lovely bed and facilities.  Great location, near the beach and nightlife. Good swimming pool to use during the day. Thai lady lived with me in the hotel and was made to feel very welcome by the staff. This is the second time we have stayed at this hotel in 3 months and we can't wait to come back

title: little gem
review: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you so much for your very kind review and your loyalty with Centara Pattaya Hotel. It was a pleasure to welcome you. It so wonderful to read that our team was able to take good care of you. I am so pleased to see that you enjoyed your overall experience.  We hope to be able to see you again here soon. Best regards, The Management

title: Centerally Located, Big Rooms, Nice View
review: centrally located hotel nice buffet breakfast but the service and friendliness of staff makes this a must stay hotel also excellent value for money  the hotel rooms are cleaned to a high standard with clean towels daily

title: Pool very small
review: Dear Janet, Thank you for your wonderful review. This is exactly the type of experience we strive to create for each, and every guest and I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Please know that I will share your feedback to our team. Again thank you and we hope to welcome you back again soon. Best regards, The Management

title: Good experience
review: The hotel is located very close to the Beach 5-7 min walk, good restaurants near 2-3 min walk, located on busy road, so never had problem for getting local transport.   The rooms are big and well ventilated. our room had a balcony with sea view. we didn't tried the food in the hotel restaurant so cant comment on it. Breakfast served was good to average.

title: Very professional staff
review: Staff is very accommodating. Nothing is too big of a request for them. Room are bigs. Food was good. Very central located. Pool and spa services are at door step. Very good value for your money. Thank you.

title: Very good hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you very much for staying with us.  We very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and will share the great feed back to the Team. We hope to see you back soon again. Best regards, The Management

title: Sorrell
review: We stayed here from 7/1/19 until 21/1/19 had a wonderful time here the room was excellent ground floor the breakfast was also excellent plenty of choices all the staff were friendly helpful and polite rooms cleaned every day with fresh towels,water,tea& coffee would recommend to all. Thanks for an awesome stay & holiday cheers.

title: Enjoyful  stay in Pattaya
review: Dear paulgR8048HJ,  Warmest greetings from the Centara Pattaya Hotel.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us whilst your recent holiday in Pattaya.  We are happy to read that you were impressed by so many aspects of your stay. Your kind compliments have been passed on. We look forward to welcoming you back soon to relax.  Kind regards, The Management

title: Nischal garg
review: Great Hotel, This is the fourth time I have stayed there and found the room clean and tidy but a bit old. All staff that I approached were all ways polite an well mannered and helpful. At breakfast there was a large variety of food and from what I had each day was tasteful.

title: Not the best
review: Room was much smaller than expected - it had an "A and B" which suggests a larger room had been split.  Also poor location and views of an old derelict building not great either although the reception staff seemed good.,

title: My stay
review: Dear Mikr35,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to write this comment.  We would like to apologize for your negative experience you had at our hotel as clearly  this does not reflect the quality and standards we set out to deliver.  We are sorry to learn that you found several matters unsatisfactory,  and would like to assure you that appropriate action has been taken to remedy, where necessary.  Naturally, our intention is to give the highest standards of service possible and we regard all our guests of the utmost importance to our future success.   We look forward to welcoming you back again on your next visit to Pattaya.  Yours sincerely,  The Management

title: Great hotel , great location, with excellent staff we loved this hotel, 5*
review: Excellent hotel very friendly staff good room good food arranged my limo to airport would stay at this hotel again as it is next to the main parts of the city and very easy access to all the forms of transport

title: Okayish experience
review: Dear Scenic57882009913,  Thank you very much for your kind feedback following your visit at the hotel.   We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed the overall hotel service and surrounding.  We will share your comments with the team, these will certainly serve as encouragement for us to continue improving the standard of our services.  We hope to welcome you back and stay with us at the hotel on your next visit to Pattaya.  Yours sincerely,  The Management

title: service
review: Great location, great staff , excellent breakfast, it was our first time to Thailand we stayed in Bangkok for 3 nights had a really amazing time there , then stopped at the centara Pattaya for 14 nights we had a great time loved every minute of it the hotel was fabulous the rooms Lovely our cleaner was also amazing  I would also would like to mention ched on the reception desk who went and got our coats from Bangkok that we had left behind at last hotel what a fantastic man and the manager seen him on several occasions just saying hello to his guests and asking if everything was OK a really nice man and a credit to the hotel  , centara  pattaya 5* and we will be coming back

title: Convenient location/ big room
review: This is a second time stay.We stayed at family studio.Big room with bunk bed for kids.Our kids really liked it.The location is very convenient.2 convenience stores are few steps away from the hotel and there are many food shops near around.Took just a few minutes in check-in and check-out and staffs were very friendly.We will come back to stay again.

title: Good stay location is bit problem
review: Dear Travel626660,  Warmest greetings from the Centara Pattaya Hotel.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us whilst your recent holiday in Pattaya.  We are happy to read that you were impressed by so many aspects of your stay. Your kind compliments have been passed on.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon to relax.  Kind regards, The Management

title: A relaxed stay
review: Hotel is very good having Indian breakfast arranged and rooms and bathroom are also great .  Stafs are good food is good , surrounded by many Indian restaurants.  Bit far from Walking street and beach . But this hotel is very much recommended for Indian travellers looking for a good stay in this budget . If you have high budget then better to choose hotel on beach front as it is quite happening during the nights as well

title: Bad experience
review: Dear SKSINGH2014, Thank you for sharing your experience at the hotel and we appreciate your feedback.   We are please to note that you had a good time and enjoyed about the various matters and services. We look forward to welcoming you back again to the hotel in the near future.  Best regards, The Management

title: Vacantion
review: The property is well located and has decent rooms. The welcome drink was interesting even my child enjoyed it. The room was clean and bright. Wifi can be better. The bathroom has separate shower and bathtub which is a plus for disability.

title: expired key cards, lost personal item
review: Dissapointed. Day of check-in we came 2:45pm, after 15 min check in process we were told that room was not ready but check-in is 3:00pm. We waited another 20 min & when we came to the room it was open. After 10 min, housekeeper open the door & found out that door of adjoining room is not locked.  Keycards did not worked for 1st & 2nd day everytime we come back to hotel. One of my personal white nets was missing (left it on top of my bed together with my other clothes) after they clean the room, they cannot find it when I asked.

title: Centara Pattaya -Wake up early
review: Dear Ren P,  Sincere thank you on your in depth and detailed review and comments of your experience during your stay in Centara  Pattaya Hotel.  We take our guests'comments seriously and discuss them with our employees in detail particularly with heads and employees of a particular department the comments refer to and we always see if there are thing we can do better and if there is a way to improve our services so thank you on pointing out several areas of possible improvements.  We are sorry that you have experienced delays on check in and key card problem. What we are also very sorry about is the fact that we were not able to discuss all of the problems you have mentioned in your review during your stay with us since we are sure we would have been able to resolve most of them, particularly the issues of toiletry amenity, pillow, slippers.   Regrading to the lost of personal items, please kindly give me more information so I can tracking from our CCTV, please contact me directly to my email : hmcpy@chr.co.th.  Yours sincerely, The Management

title: Amazing hotel
review: We booking just for weekend relax and we was assign room in new building.The problem is near bed there is little window that it’s not cover.In brief wake up early at sunshine .Pity due it’s good hotel,the evaluation influence of this problem .

title: My stay experience at Centara, Pattaya
review: Dear Getaway47154156192,   Thank you for taking the time to leave your review of the hotel. It is always a pleasure to receive your feedback and we will share your comments with our team.   The experience and problems that you highlighted have been carefully noted for our next operation review. Rest assured we will do our utmost to improve and enhance our products and services to our guests.  We appreciate the sharing of your concerns and hope we will have the opportunity in the future to welcome you back in the future.  Best regards, The Management

title: Awesome hotel and staff.
review: I want to note the lovely and the professional staff that help me with anything in this vecation. The ones I like the most was Nui and Ched They was kind, professional and always give a service with a smile. My room 509 was great one.. its a big room (I dont know if people can see it from thw pictures) but its really big one and everything was clean and in excellent condition.

title: Nice Hotel
review: nice location ,friendly staff and good food and specially very cooperative management,manager FE is very helping person all the time.i will come back on songkran in same hotel.im 100 % satisfied with service

title: Small but not bad
review: Dear lovely5714,    Greetings from Centara Pattaya Hotel and thank you on your encouraging and  supportive review! It is great and heart-warming to read of your experience  during your stay with us and we are so pleased we were able to make your  holiday a memorable success. It makes all our hard work and effort  worthwhile and sincere thank you on your kind words.   We hope we will have the pleasure of greeting you again.  Yours sincerely, The Management

title: Good location but improvement needed in front desk response
review: Location is so-so but staff is friendly and professional. Breakfast room is quite small but food selection is better than I expected. Parking lot is dark and small, but not a big deal since most customers do not use this area.

title: Just don't!
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Warm Greetings from Centara Pattaya Hotel!  Thank you for staying with us.  We are happy to read that your expectations was met and we have noted the good comments on staff was friendly and professional. This we will share with our team.  We hope to see you back soon again.  Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Not the best choice
review: Pros- central location, walking distance to Pattaya beach 700 meters, 7/11 shopping store at 20 metres, walking Street 1 km, Indian dishes in breakfast buffet, instructions printed in Hindi (emplied heavy patronage by Indian tourists)  Cons- slow response of front desk during check-in, not honouring confirmation of three adjoining rooms made by their reservation team, terrible welcome drink (why to offer such bad drink to spoil the very beginning), exorbitant prices of hotel taxi and tourist attractions by hotel tourism desk  Overall an OK hotel for a short stay

title: Excellent stay
review: Pros -Hotel location - Not far from beech . Can be easily walk Very good and helpful receptionist . They even allowed for early checkin at 10am without extra costBig room and all latest amenities Separate Indian Breakfast availableCons- Didn't like indian breakfast they offer. Most of them are cold.

title: Pattaya and Centara Pattaya Hotel makes a great place for vacation in Thailand!
review: Dear Himanshu G,   Greetings from Centara Pattaya Hotel and thank you on your encouraging and  supportive review!  It is great and heart-warming to read of your experience  during your stay with us and we are so pleased we were able to make your  holiday a memorable success. It makes all our hard work and effort  worthwhile and sincere thank you on your kind words.   Regarding to your comment for Indian breakfast ,We have taken appropriate action to resolve each issue and ensure these types of issues do not occur in the future.  We hope we will have the pleasure of greeting you again.  Yours sincerely, The Management

title: Not a hotel for good hospitality at all, rude staff
review: for a vibrant place like Pattaya, if you don't opt for a cozy and professionally maintained and secured place to stay with your family..it doesn't match. Centara Pattaya Hotel is a good option. The ambience,  their green rules,breakfast spread, Warm and always ready to help  hospitality really made our stay worth every penny. Thanks to MMT and and the Hotel :) Cheers and Happy New year 2019

title: Don't fall for it!!
review: Dear UtpalM24,  Warmest greetings from the Centara Pattaya Hotel.  Many thanks for having chosen our hotel for your recent stay while in Pattaya. We are very pleased to hear that you had a memorable stay with us.  Especially we appreciate your nice comments towards our nice and clean rooms, and the friendliness of our staff.   Looking forward of welcoming you back at Centara Pattaya Hotel in the near future again.  Yours sincerely, The Management

title: Great hotel Good people & located in nice place
review: You people really harass your guests!!  When we checked in we request if we can get our 5 rooms interconnected to each other as we would at get together in any of the rooms and it would disturb other guests, to which we were told they don't have availability however we were given at least two out of it and will be informed if any such availability comes in. We had stayed there for 5 nights and called for the room move thrice during the stay but no positive response was given at all. To my surprise the night staff talks to us in such a filthy way as if we had booked a room for free.  Housekeeping staff don't want to help their guests at all, even if you are in problem or stuck some where they don't care they just walk across. If being called there response is always aggressive…

title: Great holiday
review: Me and 2 of my mates staying at the centara hotel Pattaya for 10 nights. I have to say the check in was quick and easy, a welcome drink was waiting on our arrival. The rooms are big and kept clean daily, pool was nice with the bar in it, only down side was if you are a bit away from walking street but what makes up for that is the price and the taxi services,

title: Wonderful Hoilday
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and will share the great feedback on our Check in speed, room size, cleanliness and pool area with all our teams, We hope to see you back soon again.  Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Excellent Service
review: Staff very friendly.  Had a wonderful Thai lady move into my room for 12 days and she was made to feel very welcome by the staff.  Great holiday and I will be returning in February 2019. Swimming Pool was very good.

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for staying with us. We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and we have noted the good feedback on our staff friendliness, room mad and our Pool. We hope to see you back soon again.  Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Very relaxing stay at this hotel
review: Location good breakfast is nice easy access to the beach have free shuttle service we stay in building A be but when we ask to change room they are full we ended up changing the next day over all great stay thank you to the manager Ms  Fe very accommodating and always in help we will come back again soon. We will recommend centera pattaya truth family nd friends.  If you need something to request ask the manger Ms . Fe she is always around

title: Good Location.
review: Centara Pattaya Hotel is good 3 star property. Rooms are spacious with good Aircon and comfortable bed. Buffet breakfast had a good spread with good options for Indian. Loation of Hotel is very good , as main street is very close and many happening events were near by.

title: Good Hotel, conveniently located
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and have noted the good comments on our spacious rooms, comfortable bed, breakfast variety and hotel location. We hope to see you back soon again.  Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Wonderful stay,  Great staff
review: The hotel is conveniently located close to the beach.  They have a separate Indian restaurant. The menu for Indian breakfast was decent, though the taste was good. We had booked 2 rooms and were given rooms which were interconnected to some different rooms, not to each other. The room had 2 big single beds, with a side table placed in between, which was a bit awkward for families. The locker in our room was already locked, and while the staff said they would fix it, nothing happened till we checked out. The check-in, check-out was smooth. However, as with other hotels in Thailand, there was a deposit to be paid at the time of check-in, recommended to be paid in cash, which block some foreign currency, which you might have to convert back to local currency on return to your…

title: Excellent service
review: Dear Guest,  Warmest greetings from the Centara Pattaya Hotel.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us whilst your recent holiday in Pattaya.  We are happy to read that you were impressed by so many aspects of your stay. Your kind compliments have been passed on. The experience and problems that you highlighted for room assignment have been carefully noted for our next operation review. Rest assured we will do our utmost to improve and enhance our products and services to our guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon to relax.  Kind regards, The Management

title: Nice
review: The hotel as such and the guest room is clean and tidy with a good ambience.  The staff was so much cooperative and amazed us with a birthday cake for my wife, since it was her birthday while we stayed there. The housekeeping staff was so cheerful. Breakfast had Indian as well as American cuisine and was outstanding.  It's just 5 minute walk to the beach.  I would really recommend this hotel.

title: Centrally located hotel
review: We opted for this hotel mainly coz of the location. The rooms are okay, small but clean. Do not except any view from the room. We opted for rooms without breakfast so cant comment on the food bit. The staff is good, the beach is at walking distance, restaurants of all cuisines are a stones throw away from hotel. Blessing is the seven eleven at the corner

title: Top
review: Dear ushma d,  Warmest greetings from the Centara Pattaya Hotel.  Many thanks for having chosen our hotel for your recent stay while in Pattaya. We are very pleased to hear that you had a memorable stay with us. Especially we appreciate your nice comments towards our nice and clean rooms, and the friendliness of our staff.   Looking forward of welcoming you back at Centara Pattaya Hotel in the near future again.  Best regards, The Management

title: Great holiday location
review: Was a great stay, staff very friendly and helpful:-) will come back for an otter Holliday... Positioning is grat next to everything but quite in night time, so we could sleep well... Also the welcome drink was fantastic

title: Cool  Centara Pattaya
review: Dear KingOlly88,  Warmest greetings from the Centara Pattaya Hotel.  Many thanks for having chosen our hotel for your recent stay while in Pattaya. We are very happy to hear that you consider us a great place to stay and that you had a great time with us.  Especially we appreciate your nice comments towards  our staff and our welcome drink.  Kind regards, The Management

Relaxing holiday Great staff Friendly and caring willing to accomadate any request asked Could not fault food as there was Thai and Aussie to your liking  Pool and bar great   Would recommend hotel to anyone

title: Best staff I have seen anywhere
review: My room was just perfect. It was cleaned every day without fail. Amenities were fine really great actually. Could not fault any of the service staff. The staff were all great and nothing was too much trouble for them. They looked after my gluten free diet really well and their manners were impeccable. The staff always greeted me with a nice smile. I was very sad to leave and one of the female cleaning staff handed me a nice note saying we hope to see you again. This turned into one of the best holidays I have ever had. Happy to recommend this hotel to anyone. PS the swim up bar in the pool was great too. Top stuff guys.

title: Our recent trip
review: Dear Frank,  Thank you very much for staying with us. We are very happy to read you good comments on our room, cleanliness, Staff service mind and hospitality. I will share this with all concerned teams. We hope to see you back soon again.  Sunny Thai regards Jonas Sjostedt General Manager

title: Undecided.
review: Another great stay,great hotel,  staff are lovely nothing is too much trouble,  great pool with pool bar ,food and drinks are very reasonable.Rooms are good size with comfy beds Bathroom good with both shower and bath ,we always stay here as it's local to everthing shops and bars are walking distance We have already booked yo go back April 2019

title: Good
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for staying with us. We are very happy to read that all your expectations was met and we have noted the good comments on our staff service, pool area, food, drinks, room comfort and hotel location. We hope to see you back soon again. Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Great Hotel
review: Stayed here for 3 weeks.  Not a good idea. The hotel is good. Food good. Staff good. Not much public  areas. Never saw anyone use the bar. It appears more like a waiting room. Nour outside areas to speak of, small well kept pool area but no gardens etc. The hotel was constantly full of Indians tourists on coach trips, or Chinese.at one point I think we were the only British guests. Our friends had issues with noisy neighbours at the beginning of the holiday and not having there room cleaned thoroughly. The area is a different matter. Bang opposite one of the worst street in Pattaya for lady bars. Some were quite aggressive  shall I say to get their customers in..... I've been to Thailand lots of times but never experienced anything like this... and the beaches were supposed to…

title: A good place to stay for Pattaya
review: Location & service is good. I was first time and will be there for the next trip to Pattaya. One thing we need to complain is the shuttle bus driver is not reconize the place to go and waste our time. He bring us to a wrong place.

title: Nice hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for staying with us and sharing your good comments. We are happy to read that most expectations was met. For the free of charge Shuttle bus, we have a fixed route that cannot be changed, unless the traffic demand it. We are sorry for this inconvenience.  Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Hospitality
review: Have been pattaya for many time but this is the first time staying with centara..  Definitely worth the money that you paid..  Maybe the front desk can improve in their attitude of serving  customers...  Other than that should be ok... Great job to the bell boy...

title: Great experience in family room
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for staying with us. We are very happy to read that your expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our value for money and our bell boy service. We have discussed with our receptionist as per your comment. Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Badly Maintained hotel Guestrooms
review: Small hotel, clean, friendly staff. Food at the hotel is tasty. The hotel also has a surprise birthday cake for gust who has a birthday during staying there..so lovely. The hotel located a short walk for 5 mins to beach, near 7-11,  bank Alcazar show and Terminal 21.

title: Overall experience was great
review: For two nights, I had a wonderful experience as hotel staff were nice and the room was great and the breakfast buffet was great too as there are a lot of choices to choose from. I'll definitely book again with Centara hotels again.

title: Travel with friends
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for staying with us. We are very happy to read that you enjoyed our staff service, hotel comfort and our breakfast buffet. We hope to see you back soon again. Sunny Thai Regards. The Management

title: Overall iwas a very bad experience.staff was so rude. They don't understand simple english. Cleaning not done at proper
review: I got lots of pleasure and happiness from my trip to friends and new experiences.Once again, I would like to express my gratitude to the hotel staff who would like to visit with friends or family and travel to Pattaya and kindly welcome them.

title: Relax holiday
review: Dear Guest,  Warm Regards from Centara Pattaya Hotel. Thank you very much for staying with us. We are very happy to read that all your expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our Hotel staff friendliness and service attitude. We will share this with all the team. We hope to see you back soon again.  Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Two nights stay
review: We have to remind many times for cleaning the room. Breakfast was hopeless. Every thing served cold. Even tea coffee was cold.i will not recomerec any one this hotel. Hotel in the crowdy area. They don't allow a dingle local call

title: Enjoyment
review: Management should think on the breakfast menu change on daily basis as well as ll amenties should be keep in bathroom.If possible they can give more attractive offers to people .Barring above its good stay.

title: Great Property with Amazing Location
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments. We are happy to see that you enjoyed your stay. For the breakfast we have rotation on several dishes and also take requests in case you are missing any that we can do, please contact our restaurant about this on your next visit. We hope to see you back soon again.  Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Decent Stay
review: The property is an average one but located in one  of the finest places of Pattaya Beach. The nearby access to restaurants and beach with close by pubs and entertainment centers make it the most sought after properties.

title: A good time
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for staying with us. We are happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and our hotel location. We hope to see you back again. Sunny Thai Regards.  The Management

title: GOOD HOTEL BUT BIT RACIST
review: We (self and wife) stayed in this hotel during Aug 2018. It is fairly good hotel, our check in was delayed as in all the 2-3 rooms shown to us, there was some sort of water seepage and mold in the walls due to which there was smell which was not pleasant. Other then this the rooms were comfortable with balconies in our case with pool view. There was separate sections for Indian and American breakfast, I would not recommend anyone for Indian breakfast as both the dining space and preparation of the food was not up to the mark. However, next day we opted for American breakfast and we noticed sea change, the seating, the ambiance of the dining space, the food, the spread, the presentation every things was excellent and simply superb. The location of this hotel is very convenient,…

title: A good place to stay in Pattaya
review: The hotel enjoys a good location. Beach, Centaral malls, hard rock cafe, Indian restaurants and many massage parlours/bars are in the vicinity. Only Walking Street is a bit far from the hotel. This is not a beach facing hotel. Our check-in and check-out experience were great. Mr. Ched was very helpful in these.Our rooms were good and facilities were all latest and working. Food quality was good but the Indian options in buffet breakfast were repetitive (we stayed for 3 days).The only issue we faced was that most of the staff didn’t knew English. So there were communication issues.

title: Classy
review: Dear Ambkish,  Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to read that your expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our Hotel location, Check in and Check out service, Room amenities and hotel facilities. For our Indian breakfast we have 10 dishes which 4 is rotating + we have Jain food with rotation. We recommend all guest to contact our 24 hour reception for any assistance during their stay. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon.  Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Great Hotel
review: The main highlight of this property is that they are guest friendly ... and more of Indian guest prefer staying at his hotel and they have separate breakfast area for Indian guests and rooms are spacious and clean   It located in the main area near to alcazar show and easily access to all the pubs and massage parlour   But the hotel is getting old and renovation is needed in the coming years

title: Good hotel..
review: Dear Guest,  Warm Greetings from Centara Pattaya Hotel! Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to read that your expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our Indian breakfast, spacious rooms, cleanliness and hotel location. We touch up and maintain all room and outlets yearly and will check to the room you stayed in will be done. Thank you and we hope to see you back soon again.  Sunny Thai Regards The Management

The room is clean clean, sound proof and quiet, bath room is clean, full of facilities, but the spa is not in this hotel, you have to go to another hotel to enjoy the spa. The swimming pool area has nice view too.

title: Very central situated hotel
review: Enjoyed our stay at this hotel. There were two buildings in the hotel, the main building was full of Indian men who were very rude. We were put in the second building. An excellent buffet breakfast was available.

title: Reasonably Good
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for staying with us. We have noted the good comments  on our American breakfast buffet and will share this with our team. We are sorry for any inconvenience with some rude guests. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon. Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Beyond expectation
review: Location : The location is great. Walkable to the Beach , Central Marina Mall , Alcazar, etc. Festival mall is also nearby. There is one more hotel named Centara Grand , so dont get confused. Check in : was smooth. The lady incharge was prompt and explained everything about the hotel. Please note there is a refundable security deposit of 2000 Baht. Rooms : are spacious and well appointed. But dint expect the bedsheet and towels like other premium hotel. Here you will find them little bit yellow and stained.At the same time little facelift in the bathroom is needed. Mattress is of good quality so the sleep quality is good. My room was in the corner so I did not face any kind of disturbance in the night. Breakfast : was not included in the room tariff as I checked in in the…

title: QUALITY AGAIN
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for staying with us. We are happy to read that your overall expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our hotel location, check in process and our Vegetarian breakfast. All our rooms are getting a yearly touch up and maintenance. We will look into our Thali plate to see what we can improve. Thank you again for your feed back and we hope to see you soon.  Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: We enjoyed everything starting from the front door to the balcony of our room. The staffs are very attentive and eagerly helpful. We arrived quite late and asked whether the shuttle bus to Central Plaza was still available. The staff was calling to confirm whether we were still going. I'm very impressed with how caring she was. The room we stayed was in great condition. The breakfast was massive and delicious. Our stay was perfect.

title: Think Twice
review: We visited July this year the staff were friendly and efficient. Breakfast was great. Pool is very overcast and gets vey overcrowded and intimidating due to the clientele that frequent this hotel. We witnessed certain clientele stripping off at the pool to get changed when a changing room was available, they were rude and in large groups which I personally thought that the excellent staff were intimidated

title: Memorable Stay at Centara Pattaya
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us and sharing your good comments on our friendly staff and breakfast. We will try to control the groups better next time they arrive so they follow normal hotel policies and use the changing room. Sunny Thai Regards. The Management.

title: Good
review: Nice stay at centara pattaya . Good hotel at best location in affordable price. Rooms are clean and in appropriate size .Buffet is good with a nice variety but should improve the quality of Indian Dishes. Periodically Pest control required as we can see mosquitoes & cockroaches somewhere Front desk staff is so polite and friendly i would like to thank front desk executive Miss FE & MAI for their kind support. Overall Memorable stay at Centara pattaya.Will come again soon

title: Lovely hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us! We are very happy to read that your expectations was met and will share the good comments on our hotel location, breakfast buffet and Front Office staff K Fe and K Mai. We will look into the breakfast dishes. We have regular pest controls in all room and outlets. Thank you again and Sunny Thai Regards.  The Management

title: Centara Pattaya
review: Hotel is good. Nice property nice location. But ensure one thing that when it rains and water overflows from severage then very best smell enters in corridors of floors. This is making experience pathetic. So improvement required in this area.

title: Nice Hotel
review: My friend & I travel to Pattaya annually and stay at this hotel. The hotel is clean and service is good albeit the hotel is somewhat older. We enjoy the location. It is quiet and close to the main Soi and a short walking distance to beach road.

title: Overall is just fine
review: Dear Guest,  Warm regards from Centara Pattaya Hotel! Thank you for staying with us again and share the good comments on our staff service, cleanliness and hotel location. Sunny Thai regards. The Management

title: Best pattaya hotel
review: Location is great which is not too far from main road. There is 7-11 nearby. The room is great but there are a lot of black stain in bathroom. Major components in room are still in a good condition but in the bathroom it is really need emergency maintenance.

title: Pattaya stay
review: Dear Vechasak,  Warm regards from Centara Pattaya Hotel! Thank you for staying with us. All rooms are regular touched up and maintained and we will change the stained silicon as you mentioned. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon. Sunny Thai Regards.  The Management

title: Dining at the pool
review: Best management i ever seen. Staffs always smile on their face. I left my wallet (have ~ 3000 USD inside) at my saftey box when i had check out and going to bangkok. I called to the hotel, the manager found my wallet and decided sent me back my wallet from pattaya to my hotel at bangkok in personally at the same day. The manger even count the number of the moneys and write down on the paper, make sure there is no lost . What a great service and manager style i ever seen.  Highly recommended this hotel, and this is my best choice to stay at pattaya. One more thanks again to the great management team.

title: Good Location
review: Hotel is very good .. Staff is friendly and courteous.. Two options for breakfast Indian and American/ Continental .. Facilities are good .. Rooms are clean and tidy . It’s a 4 star hotel and value for money .

title: Holiday
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to read that your expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our staff friendliness, breakfast options, facilities and room cleanliness. We hope to see you back soon again. Sunny Thai Regards. The Management

title: Good value for money..but be aware of many Indian guests
review: 2nd stay at this hotel and again not disappointed spotless rooms, all requirements met, excellent breakfast. Everything you want or need is close by.  We asked for a room on the 3rd floor which was unavailable the day we arrived however we were given the option to move the next morning which we did nothing at all to much trouble. Reception staff great, pool staff have there work cut out with all Indians thinking it is appropriate to swim in there underwear, pool guys straight on it stopping them and saving my eyes. Thank you for an enjoyable stay yet again.

title: Lovely Hotel Shame About 90% of Guests
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for staying with. We are very happy to read that your expectations was met and will share on our staff board the good comments on room cleanliness, breakfast, staff service mind  and pool area. We hope to see you back soon again. Sunny Thai Regards. The Management

title: Highly recommend
review: Good value for money. Overall it's a good hotel. Nice location, very spacious rooms and friendly staff. We had some problems with check in, but their supervisor helped us and gave us great rooms.  The rooms and furniture within the rooms and bathrooms are a little dated and could be revamped soon.  Breakfast was great. Asian breakfast was a bit oily but the rest was fine. I liked their healthy drinks and fruit choice.   The only thing I didn't like how many Indian guests had such bad manners. The hotel does tend to have a lot of Indians stay there and in groups can be very loud. I did find a big problem when trying to relax by the pool. But more annoying was when someone has cut in line up ahead at the reception, restaurant or bar. I really admired the hotel staff to deal with…

title: Very good hotel to stay for Indians
review: Very very good hotel and very friendly staff i really enjoyed staying in the hotel as i got the upgrade and it was a very big suits very clean hotel and food was also good as we get Indian breakfast..Its is bit far from main market but you get everything all around it as there is 7 eleven .

title: Orrow family
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We very happy to see that your expectations was met and have noted the kind comments on our room types, staff friendliness and our Indian vegetarian and non vegetarian breakfast. We hope to see you back soon. Sunny Thai Regards. The Management

title: Awesome Place To Stay in Pattaya
review: Stayed here for 2 weeks for family holiday . Was a little nervous after reading some reviews but we had an awesome time. Rooms clean spacious. Staff are so friendly and very helpful. Lovely manager who takes time to chat with guests. Some students learning onsite from uni who are just lovely ! Especially Matoom at the pool bar . Would come back and recommend .  Kids favourite wS the omelette bar at breakfast .

title: Good value for money
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for staying with us. I am very happy to read that all your expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our room, staff and our service. I will share with everyone. I hope to see you back with us again, and I remain, Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Hotel
review: Me and My Friends Stay 3 days in Centara Pattaya and we had a awesome experience. Clean Rooms, Good Service, everyone smile when you assign work anything else, Family Studio Rooms are too big and too good for the 3 person to stay in one room. Highly recommeded hotel.

title: Family Holiday
review: We enjoyed our trip away. This property is well located and right in the heart of Pattaya, close to shops, shopping centres and local restaurants.The restaurant and pool bar staff at the resort made us feel very welcome and demonstrated outstanding customer service.

title: Tour Desk - Amazing Service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for this review. We are very happy to read that all your expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our hotel location and our food&beverage staff service. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon! Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Centara Pattaya
review: I wanted to thank the girls at the tour desk, especially Mayprang ~ you made our first trip to Thailand one we will always remember.  Your service was exceptional, going above and beyond what was required and we felt as though we had made a new friend in May as she welcomed us so warmly.  Highly recommend the girls here, exceptional! Thankyou again from the Whitton, Ireson and O'Reilly family

title: Pattaya Surprise
review: Dear Guest,  thank you for very much for taking the time to make this review and share your comments. We are very happy to read that all your expectations was met and will share the good comments on the Tour Desk. Best regards. The Management

title: Good location, good service
review: "If you find a hotel that is between Central Location will be close or within walking distance to lots of nightlife, street vendors, malls, restaurants and many things.  This is a good LOCATION for either direction." Clean and Easy to travel.

title: Communication
review: Good Experience.Quality Breakfast, nice ambience, would certainly revisit whenever opportunity comes. Would be great if the Hotel could send Packages in mail., pertaining to other places of interest in Thailand where the organization has its properties.

title: Comfortable and fair value
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking your time to give us a good feedback about our quality of breakfast was good. Your kind compliment will be pass to our team and will motivate them to keep up the good work. Once again thank you for your review and we hope that we will have another opportunity to welcome you back in the future.  Sincerely yours,  The Management

title: Family Visit
review: Nice swim-up pool bar. Clean, comfortable rooms. This hotel is not flashy or extravagant, but offers clean rooms, decent beds, a choice of pillows and friendly staff. Parking is a bit tight and Second Road is just a few steps away. Great location.

title: Excellent service and staff
review: Dear Guest,  Thank for staying with us. We have noted the good comments on our  clean rooms, beds, hotel location and friendly staff. Welcome back. Sunny Thai Regards. The Management

title: Comfortable Stay
review: Located very well in the Heart of the City, You can find lot of Food options at walking distance including Indian Food. Walking distance from Alcazar. Lot of efforts has been put by the staff to keep the Hotel Clean, Good Green initiatives. Rooms are spacious and New (Building B). Well placed Common areas. Food for Families

title: Pleasant stay
review: I and my boyfriend went to this hotel n we we’re given a pool view room. Loved the location. Everything was walking distance away from us. N v could actually roam around on our own. Right from shopping areas to restaurants were just in 5 minutes away. So location wise it’s gteat. Friendly staff. There was an Indian guy called Varun who helped us with the routes how to go where. It’s worth going. I would love to go there again..

title: Good location
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make this review. We are happy to read that your expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our hotel location and staff friendliness. We hope to see you back soon. Sunny Thai Regards. The Management

title: Holiday
review: - Good location not far from department store and the sea. Room is OK even a bit old. Good service mind of stafffs. A lot of nreakfast for choosing in the morning. Near the transportation. But they have a lot of indian travelers here.

title: Average quality hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us. We have noted the good comments our hotel location, staff servicemind and our breakfast. All our rooms are maintained and touched up at least 1 time per year. Thank you again. The Management

title: Top class
review: Had a great stay at this hotel would stay again the pool area was nice and clean but a bit shaded and could get a bit noisy there was plenty choice in the buffet breakfast rooms were very clean and staff all very helpful

title: Good hotel, good location but bad hosptality
review: The hotel is in a very good location, nice rooms and decent facilities. But the staff is not hospitable at all. They dont smile or dont show good courtesy. They can be more friendly and come across as more hospitable

title: Nice hotel with amazing service
review: Dear Guest, I am sorry to see that you found some staff not service minded, as this we normally get very good feed back on. I will address this with all concerned. Kind regards.

title: NEVER STAY HERE. ITS SIMPLY PATHETIC. TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY, TIME AND ENERGY.
review: I choose this hotel because it is close to beach and pattaya night bazar.Also, Alcazar Cabaret show is just minutes of walk away.On arrival the staff were super friendly.We were staying in family studio room for 3 people.Room was nice, clean and big.The hotel also has pool bar and pool to burn suns heat.Breakfast was excellent and had very good variety to taste. Overall nice and confortable stay. Thank you Centara Pattaya

title: Staff not co operative and does not provide any support
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review.  I am happy to read that your expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our hotel location, Family Studio room type, Room cleanliness, Pool bar and our breakfast. Thank you again, and I remain, Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Comfortable stay
review: In simple words if you are with family or not the hotel is not recommended at all.   Bad condition of hotel, rude staff and problem resolution.   They are ready to harass. Breakfast too bad and not served till its standard time.

title: Indians should Avoid
review: After bitter experience at Centra, Centara Karni, another poor experience at Centara Patrata. The property location is good but 2 different towers room allotment to a group. All instructions r narrated in Hindi to be followed but no Indian Chef is there for Indians....Horrible Breakfast....Despite a dedicated Indian dining room....  Though precooked Centara Grand pattaya but Centara Pattaya declined to provide shuttle service....  Verdict: Centara is a Big Brand but the Customer delight is Minimum here... Indians should avoid...They r least bothered for Indians

title: Good
review: Dear Guest,  we are sorry to see that your expectations was not met time. We do have information in both English and Hindi. We will look into our vegetarian breakfast again and see if we add the special dishes you prefer. We offer free of charge shuttle from our and nearby hotels, with drop of service to the beach, beach road, central festival and other nearby attraction but not to Pratumnak area. We are sorry if there has been any miss understanding  for this. Thank again for your comments, we will do our best to improve accordingly. Sunny Thai Regards. The Management

title: Lovely stay
review: Good. Limited drinking water. No support for local calls.  Breakfast to be improve. Local call charges 30 TBH. Centrally located. Very professional. You can stay. No beach view rooms. Walking distance from alcazar show.

title: Cleanliness and Sleep Quality
review: Dear Guest,  thank you for taking the time to make this review. We are very happy to see that all you expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our hotel location and professional staff. We will look into the breakfast to see what we can improve. Thank you again and we remain,  Sincerely Yours The Management

title: Very central, amazing staff. restaurant has some great choices and menu is quite good. Everything close by.
review: Pros: Centrally located. Entire staff is polite and service oriented. Spacious rooms. Great buffet breakfast.  Cons: House keeping staff is over burdened which seems to be due to shortage of staff. This delays room cleaning at times and refurbishment of toiletteries is not uniform.  Overall: Value for money and worth the stay. Look forward to return soon

title: Comfort,Amazing.. Great Breakfast & Good Staff especially Mrs. JYO
review: Wow.. Wow.. What an experience to stay at CENTARA. Good Breakfast... Good Staff... Good Environment.... Everything is good.  I specially thank Mrs. Jyo (Front Office Superviosr) for her exclusive help in the hotel.There was some misunderstanding with our tour guide, but she helped a lot to overcome in a nice way. Special thanks to Mrs. JYO.

title: Comfortable Room , Good BF
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review.
