We are very pleased to see that all your expectations was met and have noted the kind comments on our staff and will share with them all. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt General Manager

title: Amazing stay
review: Affordable Rooms and Good Locations. Hotel is new and clean, location is good to move around in Pattaya and Pattaya Beach . Staff are friendly, helpful and most important that they have smiles all the time.

title: Great location and Breakfast
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make this review. We are very happy to see that your expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our hotel, cleanliness, staff service, staff friendliness and their smiles.  Thank you again, and I remain  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt General Manager

title: Fantastic hotel look forward to next visit
review: Me and my Boyfriend stayed at the Cantata Hotel for a few days and I really enjoyed it. The rooms were lovely and clean, staff was very friendly and the breakfast was very good. There was so much variety of things to choose from, there is dedinitely something for everyone and a chef was cooking omletts/scrambled eggs from scratch which was lovely  The location was great, lots of shops, bars and food markets around. Very easy to get around by Taxi or foot.  The beach is not far away at all as well and lots to do and see at night time  I had a lovely stay and would definitely recommend to come here

title: Great staff fair rooms
review: Great staff and very helpful. Breakfast good and staff very attentive. rooms need redecoration and fresh air, some rooms as mine wet from ceeling and smelly. Value for money ist good and usually a recommendable hotel

title: 2nd Visit to Centara
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for making this review and share you good comments from your stay. We are very happy to read that your expectations was met and have noted the good remarks on our staff service mind, breakfast and our value for money. All our room get a yearly touch up or renovation, and we will monitor the schedule for this floor. Thank you again! Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Amazing Hotel with nice staff
review: Well, I have just returned after my 2nd visit to this hotel. First of all, Indians are very much the Favourite. I went outside and lit up a Cigarette on the forecourt, I was literally shouted at to move of which I did. 2 Nights later, Indians were all standing outside shouting and ALL smoking in the same place as i was and the same staff that moaned at me said NOTHING to them..!!  The food has NOT changed at all over the last year, still the same Bland tasteless breakfast, same every day, every month, every year.. The staff are lovely (some) Na in the bar is amazing and friendly.. (Needs pay rise) Rooms are ok, Not the cleanest in Thailand as found hairs on the floor from previous occupants, Indians RULE the swimming pool area and as previous people have said they are VERY loud…

title: poor
review: Dear Mark J,   We are sorry to see that your expectations was not met 100% this time. We have noted your comment on the groups that was staying here the same time as you. Rest assure we do everything we can to control any kind of issue that can disturb other guest.  As per Thai law, there must be smoking areas. Thank you for following this and we are sorry that you had to witness others who did not.   We are in contact with the agent who brought these groups and will share all comments with them in order to avoid this in the future.  We would like to point out that the majority of our guest and groups are well behaved and friendly. We have guest and groups from all over the world.  Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt General Manager

title: Our stay apr 2018
review: This is the only hotel i visited in the last 5 years of me visiting pattaya twice in a year , which offers so warm attitude towards it's customers, The staff is so soft spoken and will go out of the way to help everyone .  definitely recommend this hotel  {group of friends , family with children of all ages}

title: Wonderful stay
review: Had the most wonderful stay here. The staff are SO friendly and accommodating! The rooms are spacious with a very generous breakfast buffet. Location is awesome! Only a 10 minute walk to one mall and 20 minutes to several others (or 5 minutes if you take a tuk tuk! Markets and shops all around! There is a fantastic massage shop literally 20m from the hotel entrance! Ask for Kim, can highly reccommend!

title: Average is about right
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very happy to read that all your expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our staff friendliness, hotel location and our breakfast buffet. Welcome back! Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Excellent staff and Comfortable Stay
review: There’s nothing wrong with this hotel, but nothing outstanding either.   Our travel agent suggested they would arrange an upgrade to a family room as part of our package but although the hotel they said they had done this, we were given the deluxe room we had booked - we were pleased this was on the 8th floor facing the pool. The only downside was on the last couple of days, a large group had checked in for a conference and they all Yahoo’d around the pool first thing (and you could hear it from 8th floor! Imagine being on 3rd floor!). Not really the hotels fault but still an annoying way to wake up. Didn’t notice any traffic noise or disruption from other guests.  The breakfast had a lot to choose from but mostly the same food every day with very hasty table clearing (don’t…

title: Staff go the extra mile to enhance quality service for cosmetic surgery clients
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make this review. We are sorry to see that your expectations was not met 100% this time and have noted the comments on the noisy group. We will try to inform future groups to be more aware of the level of noise. We have checked your booking but cannot find any request about up grading? Your comment on our staff friendliness and hotel location has been noted and shared. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon. We also have a sister hotel, 500 meter from us, Centara Nova Hotel & Spa, what could be what you are looking for. Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Good Hotel
review: I have visited along with my friends. You will find Indian tourist in this hotel. The catalogue and information are also shared in Hindi.  We have been welcomed by a Kashmiri intern. He is amiable and have created an additional comfort for us.   Staff is friendly and helpful in nature.

title: Descent 4 star hotel with poor maintenance and housekeeping
review: An overall good hotel with poor maintainance and housekeeping.   The location of the hotel is good as it is near to most attractions.  Spacious rooms, comfortable beds are the positives. Breakfast is average with few options.   All the positives are spoilt by poor maintainance of the rooms. The taps were leaky, poor electricals.   The housekeeping is very poor. A few staff in the front desk too spoil your mood with a grudgy face and behavior. They were not ready to help too.   Surprisingly the trainees were well behaved, polite and were really helping.   Special mention about the pool. Its just a namesake one, very small and useless.

title: Average all around
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments. We have noted the comments on the room maintenance, and we have a yearly program in all rooms and outlets. We have also addressed the comments on our reception staff in order to improve our services. Thank you again. Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Superb room for a family with two children
review: Check in staff fairly matter of fact and not very inviting as I would have expected. Room is nice and clean but does have a door adjoining next room which is not ideal. Balcony nice and overlooked pool area, which I liked. The pool area itself is nice and enjoyed the bar. Was hard to get room serviced (as other reviewers have mentioned). Had service room light on from midday but nothing, when I approached cleaners they looked at me blankly and were dismissive. That needs to improve. Another negative is the large Indian and Chinese tour groups making a ruckus in the common areas. Not the vibe you want on holidays. Also, forced 1000bht deposit for a prepaid room is a bit much.  Pros: nice room/balcony           Pool area Cons: lacklustre service and cleaning            Tour group…

title: About my April groups
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make this review. We have noted the comments on the room service and will address with our team. We apologize for that not all of our room maids can communicate in English, this is why we ask guest to contact our reception for any requests so there is no miss understandings. 1000THB for deposit is very normal for any big chain. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon again. Sunny Thai Regards The Management

title: Average all Around
review: Good room (a spacious room with double bed and adjoining room with two bunk beds for children).   Good breakfast with plenty of choice to suit all tastes. Swimming pool ok. Hotel staff were very helpful.

title: Excellent room & great food
review: The property is excellent and food is definitely good however needs to focus more on customer service. I required a travel adapter which is usually a basic accessory and ideally available on all 4 star properties and free to use however i found it strange when they asked for a security deposit from me to use the adapter. This was definitely strange considering a 4 star property. Apart from this i think everything else was a spot on.  Pros - Great location - Excellent spacious rooms with all necessary amenities - Buffet was amazing - Travel desk was helpful - Courteous staff

title: Nice and Clean Room
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your good comments on our food, buffet, hotel location, room size, tour desk. For the adapter and usage we have an universal electric socket in all room and we have extra available from the reception, that guest can borrow with a small deposit that we pay back upon the adapter is returned. Thank you again and welcome back. The Management

title: Pleasant staff and management
review: Such a good hotel for exploring Pattaya Night life,very easy to get public transportation and go to city center. The room was nice and clean, amenities were nice, only one thing that really need to fix is Air-Con. It was set at 34 degree when we arrived. We reset to 25 but it took such many hours to reduce temperatures. Overall was great!!

title: The buffet is to die for
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very happy to read that all your expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our hotel location, room cleanliness and style. We have fixed the air-condition. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: not up to the standard
review: Clean comfortable hotel only a short walk to beach. Welcoming staff on arrival and we were surprised to find our room had been upgraded to 8th floor with balcony and ocean views.We totally enjoyed our short three night stay here as hotel location is excellent and also surrounded by many shopping areas within walking distance or free hotel shuttle bus. Good gym facilities and pool. Breakfast was very good with special mention to Ann and Nancy who were efficient and friendly. Ta at pool bar also kept us entertained with his great smile. Susi at travel desk was a dynamo and went out of her way to arrange our transport on our departure day from hotel back to Bangkok airport. She is a valuable asset to this hotel.We would return again to this hotel and wish Jonas and his team all the…

title: Situated in soi 6 so can't travel with family
review: Overall Good Experience but shower was not good(the pressure is very low) & Indian breakfast is very bad. You Need to manage with fruits, bread & butter and juice. The services for tourists provided by the hotel are little bit on a expensive side.

title: Its reasonable just not outstanding
review: Dear Guest,  We are pleased to see that your overall expectations was met: We have noted the comments on the water pressure and breakfast and will try to improve. It is walking distance to The Harbour mall, which is south east asia biggest family shopping mall. You also have walking distance to several other family attractions nearby.  Sunny Thai regards The Management

title: Great hotel and good location
review: I stayed at Centara Pattaya after wanting a hotel more central to Pattaya City itself and was impressed last time I stayed at the Centara Phratamnack. This hotel unfortunately wasn’t as good. It is a 4* Hotel and for Thailand I would say a reasonably weak 4*. The Check In Process was long and I had to wait abut 10 minutes to be seen to. When I arrived at 10am I was told my room wouldn’t be ready till 2pm which was fine and the staff very kindly looked after my luggage. The hotel offered free wifi available throughout the hotel however this was always slow and was a pain having to keep logging on every time I wanted to use it both on my phone and on my tablet.   The rooms were spacious and had a comfortable bed and old-fashioned air conditioning although it managed to keep the…

title: One of the Best Hotel in Pattaya
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make this review. We are pleased to read that your overall expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our room size, room amenities and staff friendliness. Our sister hotel in Pratumnak is a Centara Grand, which offers and different standard, and also then a different rate. We have noted the comments on the WIFI issue and have our IT team to check this, same as for our Night shift about noisy guest late night. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Excellent services
review: Stayed here for 3 nights and arrived at 10am. Even although check in isn’t until 3pm, they organised our room within 30 minutes for us. Room was very clean, tidy and modern. Only minor down side for us was, the swimming pool is very shaded and doesn’t get very much sunshine during the day due to the position of the hotel buildings, however the swim up pool bar is amazing and staff are fantastic. They also do a happy hour between 5pm-7pm, buy one get one free :-)

title: Good staffs
review: Good location , a lot of shops snd restuarents around hotel, good staffs. Room is clean , comfortable and have everything for stay. facilities in hotel are good. Food is reasonable price but breakfast is quit high price

title: A lovely stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank for sharing your comments from your stay, we appreciate all feed back and comments and have noted the good ones on our Hotel location, staff service, room cleanliness and hotel facilities. We offer a special price on our breakfast if you buy for all days upon check in. Otherwise we can recommend to book breakfast together with your room next time, in order to get the lowest price.  Sunny Thai regards The Management

title: Mediocre hotel
review: Every one of the staff were helpful friendly and professional. they were all well dressed and opened doors for me.  I had dvt from the flight and staff helped me with a wheel chair, the room was large and very clean and was cleaned with fresh linen every day..The hotel is in the perfect location near the beach and restaurants and bars. however was very quiet at nights. There was nothing I did not licke . The call after a friend stayed is a great safety precaution. Thank you..

title: Mr&mrs Gibson
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. I am very happy to see that all your expectations was met and have noted good comments on our staff helpfulness, staff friendliness, Staff service mind, room amenities, room size, room cleanliness and hotel location. Thank you again, and I remain, Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Very relaxing stay at this hotel
review: Nice food and friendly staff.. lovely pool and gym..  5-10 minutes walk to the beach. Rooms ok and spacious with a balcony but unfortunately our room did not look over the nice pool shown on the picture on the site but instead overlooked on a swamp/barren land and the neighbouring hotels pool which had graffiti. I was not impressed with the location and our views therefore cut the trip short but 2-3 days.

title: Very comfy bed
review: Room was clean and spacious. Bathroom clean nice shower and a separate bath. Staff very friendly and helpful. Good location near bars and restaurants great Italian few doors down.  Only issue hotel took deposit from us to hold against room and said it would be about two weeks before we got money back, not very useful as we are travelling around Thailand.

title: Great hotel for value
review: Dear Guest,  thank you very much for taking the time to make this review.We are happy to read that your expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our room cleanliness, room size, staff friendliness, Staff service and hotel location. The deposit you make can be done either by cash or credit card. If you choose the credit card then the banks normally take 7-10 bank days to release the amount (it is not decided by the hotel). Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt General Manager

title: Not in good taste.
review: Stayed at this hotel fews times now for my birthday.  big rooms cleaning lady always helpful. Pool staff were very good. Never had aye problem.  meet the manager once jonas was great bloke. Very friendly staff we're always good will be returning again for bthday again in august. See you soon cheers

title: Reasonably priced......you get what you pay for
review: Dear Guest,  Many thanks for taking the time to make this review. We are very happy to read that all your expectations was met this time and we have noted the good comments on the room size, room cleanliness, staff friendliness and service. Please mail us before next visit so we can prepare accordingly. Thank you again and see you soon! The Management

title: Worst Reception staff
review: I visited this hotel on January 10,11 2018. It is centrally located with beach and main market hardly 500 m away. Food was good and staff very pleasing however I could not appreciate this hotel because they suspect every traveller bad. On  arrival 2000 Baht security money,okay if you ask even for towel 500 baht again as run away with towell.I've visited worldwide but never experienced this. Not recommended at all.

title: Disappointed
review: Spend here 13 nights with family, had two room connected. Check in was smooth and frontdesk officer vely polite. Breakfast ok, as it usually is at Thai. Gym is small, if you need one. Pool is small too and this time water was very cold, mostly because weather was unusually cold too.  Why i give only 2stars. In my opinion hotel is very much over-ratet, magement figures out very strange and un-professional, focus is not in right things... could easily with basic improvement and leadership be better place.   Lock’s are very unsafe, rooms very wornout. Toilet smells badly. During our visit there was poisoning in our room for injects, never figured out what it was for, hopefully not for bedbugs.  Hotel was full of indian and russian visitors, nothing wrong with that. Very much noice…

title: Great Value For Money
review: Dear Guest,  We are sorry to read that your expectations was not met 100% this time. Thank you for your comments, rest assure we take all comments serious and will address them with all concerned in order to improve. We do have a yearly maintenance in all rooms and outlets so they always get a proper touch up and renovation when needed. In all rooms we have double locks + a signage by each handle to remind guests to always ensure they close their doors properly when leaving the room. We are sorry to read about the smell in your rest room and have checked and deep cleaned again. The "poisoning" you write is a normal pest control that we have coming 2 times per month. As all big hotels and international hotel chains, we have an outside supplier that comes and do our pest control. We have this information by the elevator, on the in house TV channel and on a note in each room, sorry if you missed to see this.   We also inform all guests to keep their noises down in the corridors and balconies, sorry if there has been any guests to loud, when we hear it or someone comment it we always inform the rooms concerned. Our security walk around every hour for this purpose.   Your good comments have also been noted on our check in, staff friendliness and our breakfast.   Thank you again and hope to see you back one day to show you our improvements, and I remain,   Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt General Manager

title: Really bad service and over charged for laundry
review: We stayed in this hotel with friends and found the staff to be very friendly. The rooms were spacious and modern. It was cleaned every day to a good standard. The breakfast was excellent with a good range of food to keep all tastes happy. The restaurant had a varied menu of an evening and the food was very reasonably priced.  The pool is small but well maintained and the swim up bar is fab on those hot afternoons. My only criticism would be the manager who found it necessary to berate the staff every day in front of the guests for what seemed to be for show.

title: Thank you special service for cake celebration for birthday
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make this review. We have noted the good comments on our staff friendliness, room design, room cleanliness, breakfast selection and value for money. We will inform our Manager to brief the staff in private, thank you for bringing this to our attention. Kind regards. The Management

title: Good but
review: A stayed here for five days and regret it now on arrival had to pay 3000b deposit the room never got cleaned one day and was charged 1800b for two small bags of washing the hotel had bad smell around the underground car park never will i stay here again very poor

title: 2nd time at this hotel
review: 2nd time at this hotel says it all really, staff 5 stars, always clean room, breakfast tasty. and if i go to Pattaya next year , i will be booking this hotel again. we was a returning guests in same room 709 , thank you for a lovely stay again

title: City View Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very happy to read that all your expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our staff service mind, room cleanliness and breakfast standard. Thank you again, and we hope to see you back next year.  Best regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: Nice Hotel, Good Location and Great Staff
review: Centara Pattaya hotel is the finest place in Pattaya. The people here are very courteous. They had given an upgrade to me from deluxe room to family room. The room we got was on 7 floor and had a nice city view. The rooms were clean and comfortable. This place is very near to where the Alcazar show is being held. This place is rightly placed for the tourists who want to visit the beach and also nearby mall and food joints.

title: Mr
review: Dear Guest,  thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very happy to see that all your expectations was met and that you enjoyed your stay with us. We have  noted the good comments on the room standard, cleanliness and hotel location. Thank you again and we hope to see you back on your next trip. Best regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: 3rd visit
review: I needed my laundry done between my stays at the hotel. I asked the staff to help do the laundry and keep it for when we check back in after a couple of days. The staff were extremely supportive and even though it was an unusual request on my part they figured out a way to accommodate. They could have simply said we cannot do it, but they Had a positive ‘can do’ attitude. Very refreshing.

title: very impressed
review: recently  had  a  three  week  stay  at  this  hotel.I  must  say it  exceeded  all  my  expectations.Location  excellent.Staff  were  amazing.Thanks  to    Varun  reception  manager.Mr  POM  and  his  staff  at  the  pool.And  the  cleaning lady  on  level  8 .Breakfast  was  excellent.All  staff  very  friendly.Be  back  soon   for  sure.

title: Average hotel......
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for making this review. We are very happy to read that all your expectations was met and have noted the good comments on our hotel location, staff service, pool bar service, cleanliness and our breakfast. We will inform the good feed back to our teams and K Varun and K Pom. Thank you again, and I remain, Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Charming Friendly Staff - However.....................
review: After reading reviews prior to our stay and noting the comments about the adjoining rooms we paid in advance to upgrade to a family studio. We are glad we did as the room was the best thing about our stay although at times we had an unpleasant sewage smell. We bought a couple of air fresheners from the local 7/11 store nearby. We were on the 7th floor. Our room  wasn't cleaned in till 4.30ish but we out most of the day so it didn't pose a problem. We had free WiFi and complementary water each day. The pool area is quite small for the size of the hotel and only had 19 sunbeds around it which were half in the shade either am or pm. Some Indian guests were in the pool in their underwear which put us off using it. The staff did make them get out and gave them some swim shorts.…

title: Great hotel in Pattaya
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make this review. We are sorry to see that your expectations was not met 100% this time. We have noted the good comments on our hotel location, staff friendliness and staff service. The room cleaning is done daily between 08.00 and 17.00 and we take request if any guest want to have a specific time, kindly inform our 24 hour reception next visit. Due to our value for money concept,  low rates and room types we attract all segments such as Families, Couples, singles and groups. It depends on which month you visit. We have addressed your comments on groups around the pool area and breakfast to our teams so we can try to improve the service and atmosphere. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely yours,  Jonas Sjostedt General Manager

title: I ALWAYS enjoy my time at this hotel!!!!
review: Stayed for 10 days in Nov 2016 - wonderful relaxing time, staff super helpful, rooms clean, food excellent. Went home totally chilled out. So booked again for 14 days in Nov 2017 - all the above still apply - if not better! However -  Multiple coach loads arriving and departing at all times of night and day! I dont appreciate being kept awake by booming music and doors being slammed and then being woken early (6am) by certain individuals being around the pool shouting loudly to each other and on their phones. During the "busy" time, breakfast turned into a bit of a free for all, being pushed on more than one occasion and persistent queue jumpers that when being politely challenged by staff, look at you in contempt. Caught one guy scraping his food back into the breakfast buffet!…

title: Deluxe and delightful.
review: The hotel and room was deluxe and delightful and the staff were friendly, courteous and helpful. Was greatly impressed with the wonderful buffet breakfast selection and fare and one can either sit inside or on the veranda area pictured. Remarkable but pleasing that they along with other Thai hotels, actually include excellent provision of proper lunch type meal combination foods the choice of which in which they excelled; after the first morning with westernised habits of eating bacon and sausage and  scrambled egg and toast etc, I generally chose and relished eating tasty rice and  noodle combination dishes that really set me up for the whole day and had the result of me hardly feeling hungry at all until well into the evening. Must mention the fact too that the background…

title: Great as ever
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for making this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay and have noted the good comments on our staff service, friendliness, breakfast selection, breakfast area, pool area, Pool service and hotel location. We will share them with all concerned teams. Thank you again! Kind regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: Good Hotel... Recommended
review: I have been visiting this hotel frequently and must say that it is a great place. The location is in the heart of the city. Great breakfast. The entire staff is friendly and hospitable. A word of thanks to Mr. Varun for going the extra mile to ensure that the entire stay was comfortable. Looking forward to my next visit to this lovely hotel.

title: Great Hotel In Pattaya
review: Dear Guest,  We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and have noted the good comments on our hotel location, breakfast, staff friendliness and specially Mr. Varun. Thank you and see you on your next visit! Jonas Sjostedt

title: Between good and average
review: Good Hotel, good location, friendly staff, good breakfast... What else would you ask for... Everything is nearby be it restaurants be it 7/11. The stay was very comfortable, clean rooms, good wifi speed which was indeed complimentary. Thank you team for such a wonderful experience

title: Great hotel great location
review: This was our 2nd visit to centara pattaya, we were upgraded to a suite ,as we had very noisy people next to us on our last previous visit ,I must say that the hotels customer service is absolutely superb ,our room was amazing ,the manager and staff were so friendly and helpful ,we travel to pattaya 2-3 times a year and our next visit is April 2018 and we will be booking to stay there again

title: Great place for a base
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for sharing your comments from your stay. We are very happy and pleased to see that all your expectations was met. We have noted the good comments our 1 Bed Room suite, staff service and staff friendliness. Thank you again and welcome back as soon as possible. Best regards The Management

title: Excellent Hotel property.
review: As we booked a cheap and cheerful holiday to Thailand for 10 days, we were not expecting much, but, really surprised at the standard of the hotel.   Rooms were very clean and large, with a big bathroom that had a large shower and a bath.   We were on floor 4 in building A, had a good view of the pool area and attracted the sun from early morning until lunch time.    The bed was enourmous and comfy but firm, all the usual amenities and a good air con system.  Breakfast was very good, with loads of choice and the option to eat inside or outside.  The breakfast room was always busy but not so busy it was crowded or ran out of food and tables were always available.  We only ate dinner at the hotel once, which was the day of the Kings cremation as we expected other places to be…

title: Lovely hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for making this review and share all your good comments. We are very pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay with us. We have noted the good comments our hotel and room standard, cleanliness, view from balcony, room bed, breakfast, restaurant food prices and quality, hotel location and the free shuttle bus. Thank you again and welcome back! Best regards, Jonas Sjostedt

title: disappointed
review: Excellent property.Spacious rooms and good balcony spaces to sit back and relax with a good background view. Front desk services are beyond comparison. Reception staff specifically Mr Varun very courteous and helpful.Location also very convinient Will visit again soon.

title: Amazing hotel. Lovely, friendly and attentive staff.
review: The holiday overall was amazing - much like the hotel we stayed in. Clean, comfortable, modern and the staff were very accomdating. The only complaint in relation to the hotel has nothing to do with the hotel itself nor the staff - but the majority of the Indian guests who were staying at the hotel at the same time were particularly obnoxious, ignorant and plain seedy. Taking pictures of myself and other family members, not using their manners towards other guests and staff. Other than that 10/10 stay and would 100% recommend and return.

title: It’s Okayish....
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. I am very happy to read that all your expectations was met and that you enjoyed our stay. I have noted the great feedback on our cleanliness, room style and staff service. We have sometimes bigger groups arriving at the same time and we will try to be better to arrange so they are not to noisy in the public areas, and I remain,  Sincerely yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Troggs on Tour
review: The hotel does the job of a decent accommodation for a few nights & it is reasonably priced , I stayed there for 2 nights & on check I was asked to pay a deposit of 2,000 baht, my friends stayed 3 nights & they paid 3,000 baht, so that’s something to consider when booking this hotel. Hotel rooms are reasonable in size, but what I hated was that the were adjoining doors in the room, although locked, but noise/ conversations can be heard when very quiet...I was surprised the rooms had no robes or slippers. The hotel is situated on a side road minutes away from the main  road, so it is quite. I have to praise the staff, especially Jeff on reception, he is extremely friendly & super helpful, & so are his staff, so well done.. The major flaw of the hotel I encountered was that the…

title: Good Hotel, but not great.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments. I have noted the good comments our our value for money, room size, staff service and friendliness and hotel location. We offer robes and slippers on request. Regarding the heavy rain and areas with flooding all around Pattaya and Thailand we cannot control, but as most hotel we secure our areas with flood gates and regular cleaning of drainage. All roads drainage are controlled and maintained by the municipality and not by the hotels. Thank you again for your comments, I Will share them with our team specially to Khun Jeff, our excellent Night Manager, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt General Manager

title: Meets basic needs
review: Second visit to this hotel and found the staff pleasant and helpful in all departments. Would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to anyone. Rooms are clean and what you would expect at a 4 star hotel. Transfers between hotel and airport were booked beforehand with no problems encountered. All in all a great fortnight and can’t wait for my next visit.

title: good hotel
review: we have just came back from Thailand last week this was our third time, hotel was very good ,staff are really friendly, rooms were large ,food was good ,hotel was 5 -10 mins from beach,  free internet, hotel was a good location for all amenities the only downside was that our room used to feel as if it was the last one to get cleaned about 530/6 pm and after a day out we just wanted to relax but felt we couldn't  until the room was cleaned but please our intentions are not to put people off i can assure you this is a nice hotel and would recommend it to anyone and after all a holiday to Thailand would be an exciting trip cannot wait to go back

title: Disappointed customer
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your comments from your stay with us. We are very happy to see that you were satisfied and your expectations was met. We have noted the good comments on our staff friendliness, rooms size, food quality, hotel location and free WIFI. We clean all rooms between 08.00 - 17.00 and if you have any specific time you prefer you can request this in our reception. Thank you again and welcome back! Kind regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: Great value
review: We stayed in this hotel for 7 nights in September & stayed in Room 528A.  Pros- the staff are really friendly & helpful & always had a smile on their faces. Check in was easy with no problems. On our last day check out was at 10.30 however our pick up transfer wasn't until 16.00 & our Rep arranged for us to stay in our room until 14.00 when we came & sat down in the lobby & checked out the receptionist said we could have arranged to stay in our room until 15.00 which we were unaware of & she very kindly brought us a glass of juice free while we waited.  The hotel location was very good in walking distance to the beach & shops with a 7-11 shop just outside the hotel. Breakfast had a good choice of food from European through to Chinese. Free wifi provided.  Cons- the downside to…

title: Beavh
review: Dear Guest,  We are sorry to see that your expectation was not met 100% this time. We have noted the comments on the stained duvet, cleanliness and noisy neighbor. For the duvet our team changed it immediately and also arranged some fruit basked to you and offered late check out with out any charge. We have a yearly maintenance program and have arranged a touch up in the room you stayed already. We have also noted all good comments on our staff service, staff friendliness, check in and check out service, breakfast standard and selection. Thank you again and we hope to see  you back to show our improvements.  Best Regards The Management

title: Great rate and services
review: We did not know what to expect from this hotel as it was our first Centara experience. The reception was a little unfriendly as they did not converse well in English and required a deposit due to a misunderstanding. It is understandable to ask for a key deposit but not 1000thb per night. Most hotels secure your key deposit with a credit card.  Our room was not ready yet, and we had to wait. Surprisingly we were upgraded and received a beautifull room. The reception  areas and passages are a bit dark. A very good breakfast is served. Room very comfortable and good quality bed and bathroom anemities. The pool is small, but good enough to cool down or swim a few  lengths. Walking distance to the beach, shops and nightlife.  We will surely return to this hotel.

title: Great value and great service
review: I stayed in this hotel for 2 nights. Far enough away from the main drag but still close enough to walk. Friendly helpful staff. Nice little balcony to sit in the evening or early morning. Nice pool area with gym, showers and pools towels. Great selection for buffet breakfast

title: Perfect Choice for Holiday....
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for your nice review to our friendly staff, hotel product and breakfast service. We are very pleased to see that you are enjoyed to stay with us and we hope that we will have another opportunity to welcome you back in the near future.  Sincerely yours,  The Management

title: 6 Nights in Pattaya
review: We checked in to this hotel on 28.08.2017  and checked out on 31.08.2017. Our room number was 506B. The property is centrally located and quite close to the famous Alcazar Show. You will find a good market near the hotel although the beach is little far away. The rooms are nicely maintained and quite spacious too. All rooms are attached with a balcony which is an additional advantage. The check in and check out process was quite smooth. Inside the hotel it gives the feeling of an Indian hotel as every where you will find the basic instruction are written in Hindi. The only reason for giving 4* is the morning breakfast. Although the spread was good but almost every day the menu was all the same. Overall a nice experience with Cetara Pattaya Hotel and would love to stay again.

title: An excellent choice, quiet and convenient
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for your nice feedback to our service, hotel product and hotel location. We are very pleased to see that you are enjoyed stay with us and we would like to apologize about our breakfast is not variety, we are happy to informed you that, now our staff on process for training about vegetarian food to make more variety food in the breakfast. Once again thank you for your comment and we hope that we will have another opportunity to welcome you back in the near future.  Sincerely yours,  The Management

title: Coast Restaurant
review: We stayed at the Centara Hotel Pattaya and it was great value.. The rooms were a good size and kept spotless. The food was always quality and it is worth having dinner at the restaurant at least once. Free wifi is great. The pool is open 7am to 7pm and the swim up bar is awesim and also daily happy hours add to the already great value. I would certainly recommend a stay here when in Pattaya.

title: Holiday wirh my sister
review: We could not find a fault with this hotel. The staff are just the best so friendly and helpful . The room was immaculate and wirh a sea view. Loads of toiletries daily and fresh bedding /towels Centrally located for all shopping eating malls etc. Definately recommended this hotel.i would stay here again anytime. Thank you for making our holiday a special one to remember. Ps the frozen mango smoothie at the poolside bar are just the best

title: I bet, you can not find better hotel than this with this price tag!!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for making this review. I am very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and all your expectations was met. I have noted the kind comments on our staff friendliness, room standard, room maid daily cleaning, hotel location and our popular frozen mango smoothies. Welcome back! Best regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: Short break f on middle easr
review: Very very cooperative staff, specially Mr Varun. And very neat and clean swimming pool, awesome food. We were amazed to see a hotel with lots of amenities and indian breakfast, it was really an experience.  We had lots of fun in swimming pool, with drinks served in the pool with crispy snacks. Very good location and bigger rooms with big beds (even single beds can accommodate two person).  Neat and clean rooms and great comfort, all the rooms are with balcony, though the hotel is non-smoking but you can still enjoy the smoking in balcony with a table and two chairs.  All rooms are pool facing and nicely done.

title: Average hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for this review. I am very please and happy to see that you enjoyed your stay and have noted the good comments on Mr. Varun, our Vegetarian breakfast, swimming pool area, cleanliness, hotel location and big rooms. Thank you again and we hope to see you back with us soon, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Unbelievable experience in Centara Pattaya Hotel
review: As an avid traveler and 1 card sold member I decided to make a short stay in Pattaya.. the idea was cheap and going solo. Hotel is very central and would not need a bike or car unless you want to wonder afar.. Pro's * it's cheap, food, taxes and all.. good value for money * very central, to all bars and beach.. shopping centre * some great island excursions * it can be crowded at times with bus groups * basic with swim up bar, small but functional * staff are friendly and try their best to assist * car or bike rental stand very convenient with decent price.  Cons: * hotel is old (possibly refurbished some years ago) but not well maintained and poor cleaning.. dust, dirty basins etc * breakfast was ok, cheap and got the job done.. just don't be late. * lots of noise in halls, and…

title: Quite good
review: Good soundproof, clean room, good location Friendly cleaning staff, everytime we meet, they say hello with a smile. The male (the tall one) receptionist did a good job, but the face did not emotionally. Beautiful pool but the water is quite cold although the recorded water temperature is 29 degree. Probably because of lacking sunshine. U-shaped architecture helps to avoid sunlight and provide cool wind. Gym room has few equipments. Excellent breakfast: delicious and variety. The room does not have fans, only air conditioning make me have a sore throat T ^ T The shower water pressure sometimes is strong sometimes is week but the good thing is always have hot water. Drink water in the room is free but weird taste. Basically good, but not as expected at the price of 52us$ per…

title: Nice and quite place to stay in Pattaya
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for sharing your comments on your stay. We have are very pleased to see that you enjoyed everything and have noted the good comments on the room cleanliness, hotel location, friendly staff, pool area, gym, breakfast quality and breakfast variety. We have checked the shower pressure and it is working normal now again.  best regards The Management

title: everything was great
review: Nice and quite place to stay in Pattaya  I stayed in this hotel in the month of July 2017. Good hotel . near Alcazar and beach is around 500 mtr from the hotel. staff is very cooperative. rooms are spacious and all with balcony.

title: Pleasant Place to Stay in Pattaya
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We have noted the good comments on our hotel location, friendly staff and rooms size. best regards.  The Management

title: Yet another amazing stay
review: The hotel was great good food.Rooms very clean towels changed every day.Pool was nice.Staff amazing could not do enough for you.I done the cooking course it was great.The hotel is close to the night life.Will go to this hotel again later in the year.It is guest friendly they check the girls paperwork if not correct they wont let them in really good service.Thanks for a great 10 days.

title: Great location.  Modern design hotel.  Staff is helpful.  Delicious food at buffet breakfast
review: I stayed here 12 days (3 trips) in the past 2 months.  Perfect location.  One minute walk to soi 6 ... where all the fun is at.   5 minute walk to the beach.  Scooter taxi and 7-11 outside the front door. Easy to find the hotel.    Staff speaks good English and always friendly and helpful.  They make my stay pleasant.    Buffet breakfast has delicious food.  Coffee is excellent.  It is worth paying more for the room that includes breakfast.  Dinner at the same restaurant is delicious food and a very low price.   I ate there most nights because it is guaranteed delicious taste and clean.  Nice design room and bathroom.   Modern and very impressive looking.  Large rooms with big beds.  Beds are very comfortable.   Quiet at night for a good nights sleep.  Pool is small but pool…

title: Amazing Food and Service
review: Dear Guest,  We are very happy to read all these great comments and feed back. We really appreciate these and will share with all concerned. We have noted the good comments on our hotels perfect location, English speaking staff, breakfast quality and selection, our coffee, dinner and quality of food, value for money, room design, bathroom design, room cleanliness, big bed and comfortable, pool area and check in process. Thank you again , and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Recommended
review: The location of this Centara Pattya is also great near to 6 SOI which is called second walking street in Pattaya. Breakfast is great and Alacarte is excellent. I also went to their Signature Spa which was for 3 hours in just 1800 Bhatt. very reasonable and most relaxed. The Guests are allowed in the hotel without additional charges. The Free Shuttle to the beach road is also available in just 15 minutes if Sr citizen requires and Beach road is walking distance too.

title: Excellent hotel with nice decorated rooms but...
review: Dear Guest, thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very happy to see you enjoyed you stay and have noted the kind comments on our locations, breakfast, A la carte dishes and our signature Cenvaree Spa. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Great Stay
review: I have to say this place is fantastic. Place is nipping clean breakfast great pool area mostly quiet and everyone is friendly. I will be looking to return again next year. Room is spacious and clean free bottle of water each day also. It is close to anything you may need and want. Pool staff I think have the hardest job they have to contend with the Indians who think it is acceptable to get in the pool in there underwear ( something's you will never unsee ) however the staff made sure they got out and covered up great work. Would recommend this place to anyone who asks. Thank you

title: amazing amazing and simply amazing :)
review: for the meanwhile i've to write here, there is no question to ask or no complain to make here, to those which have complained about the mold, try living in florida, its the climate so don't blame the staff!!! FRIENDLY, HELPFUL, GENTLE, AND MUCH MORE ADJECTIVES THAT I CAN'T EVEN THINK TO USE, THANKS FOR ALL YOU HAVE DONE! IT WAS A BEAUTIFUL AND MEMORABLE EXPERIENCE

title: Guest Friendly Policy
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for this feed back, I am very pleased and happy to see that you enjoyed your stay and all your expectations was met. I have noted the good comments on our friendly and helpful staff and I will share it with everyone. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Great hotel with Great staff
review: I have stayed at this hotel feb 2016 alongwith my friend. This is a perfect hotel in all respect for all travelers. Nice clean rooms, great location, excellent wifi, friendly staff. The only thing that i have noticed during my stay that being a vegetarian i disappointed with the breakfast but on going through the recent reviews on this portal I think that the hotel management has upgrade their veg breakfast. This hotel has a guest friendly policy which is also a great attraction for guests to stay at this hotel. Best wishes

title: Moldy Smell in room
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your comments from your stay in 2016. Please note that we have now days  a special vegetarian breakfast as well with many different option of dishes. I have noted the good comments on our nice clean rooms, location, wifi and friendly staff. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Surprise gift to my wife for her b/day.... Holiday in Pattaya
review: I was with my family after a terrible experience in Bangkok went to this hotel. Front staff were very welcoming. Even they were not filled they offered me an upgrade and that made a first WOW to me. Mr. Varun the management trainee was gone a mile head and assisted through out the stay they even suggested us with the places to go shops etc.  We got a brilliant room for my family (actual room was small, booked through a TA), View of the room was not bad ,looking at the front. House keeping has done a great job everyday by cleaning and surprising with replenishing the amenities. even they arranged our clothes which was a mess while rushing for tour day.  We never faced an engineering issue there.  All in all it was a great experience at this hotel....

title: Good place
review: It's one of the budget hotels in pattaya near walking street. If you are looking for a non smoking room with balcony this is the place. Pool is decent. Food is not affordable.   Walking street and beach are nearby so it's easy to go to other places from here. This place has a lot of indians but I personally don't think it is a big issue .

title: Miss Rom Thank you so  much
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for making this review. We have noted the good comments on our location and facilities. We have food dishes from 79THB and also daily combo promotions that includes a soft drink, from 119THB, we believe this is very affordable.  Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Holiday
review: Centara  pattaya  hotel was  Good!! Manager  JONAS  SJOSTEDT and Miss ROM was kind  and awesome service to our  family!! Hotel facilty wad very  clean  and breakfast was best I have ever been. Next  time I would go pattaya, my family should stay in Centara pattaya hotel!! Thanks a lot  ROM and JONAS.

title: Centara Pattaya Hotel
review: Thank you very much for the kind feed back from your stay with us. We are very happy to see the good comments on our staff, hotel facility, cleanliness and our breakfast. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Great place all round !
review: I along with  my family had a very pleasent and a comfortable  stay at this  hotel. The front desk staff specially  Mr. Varun and Miss. Naem were very  courteous and helpful. The rooms are very  spacious with all facilities with excellent  Air conditioning.  House keeping is superb. Change of linen and towels in the bathroom  is done properly. Breakfast is a big treat absolutely  laid in a fantastic  manner. Free wi fi in the room with good  connectivity.  Hotel is located to nearby entertainment places like Tiffiny and  Al Cazar. Indian restaurant along with  local food  is easily  available  at walking  distance. My family  really  enjoyed  staying at this hotel. We would definitely  like to repeat our stay in  future.

title: Indian center :)
review: The room was good for the price and good area smaller pool that I was expecting .  This hotel has good and helpful staff I think all the room are connected and it was little nois from other room sometimes but still ok . The problem was that there was a lot of Indian and I think if u are Indian is good for you but me and my gf had some difficulty but still good for the price u pay .

title: Average hotel
review: Thank you for sharing the comments from your stay with us, we have noted your good comments on our room standard and value for money. Kind regards. The Management

title: Nice hotel
review: Stay in Centara pattaya hotel was average. Rooms were just OK and staff was discourteous . Air conditioners were not working properly. We stayed for three nights but no good experience. They serve Indian breakfast but for three mornings, we got same breakfast-poha and upma. Hotel people could have taken pains to change dishes  and there are so many choices in India breakfast. Location is good. Toothpastes and toothbrushes were also not kept, so one can imagine what type of services they provide. Wi-fi facility was excellent. Swimming pool was also good.

title: Good location
review: Dear Guest,  thank your for taking the time to make this review. We have the good comments on our Wifi and our pool area.  We have several dishes on rotation on the Vegetarian breakfast and also offer to take request. Same is for toothbrush and toothpaste that can deliver on request, which is also mentioned in the welcome letter. We have checked and maintained the air condition in the room you stayed, thank you for bringing this to our attention. Kind regards. The Management

title: Breakfast and location
review: The hotel is good. Pros: 1. Location. Near to market  2. Good Indian buffet breakfast 3. Nice pool. 4. Helpful and friendly staff 5. Good travel desk. Cons: 1. Too crowded 2. No smoking rooms. One has to go to balcony or outside to smoke. Overall had a good experience with hotel. Would definitely love to stay again...

title: worst ..!!!
review: poor service , small rooms, no security for girls , not recommended for couples or family ..nt safe ..!!! breakfast options r too less if u r a vegetarian..🙈menu also doesn't hv much options for vegetarians ..!!

title: Worst View Ever-Zero Customer Service-AVOID!
review: Dear Guest,  I am sorry to see that your expectations was not met this time. We have 4 room types, Deluxe, Family Studio, 1 Bed room suites and Centara 2 bed room. Largest room is 65m2. We also 24 hour security and CCTV on all areas and outlets. For the breakfast we offer a vegetarian breakfast on the 2 floor. Kind regards. Jonas Sjostedt

title: Bad ! Bad ! Bad !
review: this, bar none, was my worst Centara hotel stay ever. The disappointment started even at the time of check in when i was told NONE of my specific request for my room could be provided as "they are fully booked". I had specifically requested for higher floor which may provide me some partial seaview. It is beyond me why would they gave those rooms which may meet my request to others who didnt actually make any special request for the same. You know that it means everything to me that's why ive requested them but some other guests couldnt care less about it and you gave that room to them, PATHETIC and RIDICULOUS!  I also felt ridiculed not only my request was turned down, they gave me room at lower floor with full view of the next door dilapidated building which could fit nicely…

title: Nice and Quiet
review: Dear Guest,  We are sorry to see that you were disappointed with your stay. We have 8 floors and you were given a room on the 4 floor.  We have discussed with our Guest service agent who checked you in about this and unfortunately she has tried to arrange the first available room for you, instead of informing you to wait for room to be vacant on the 8 floor. We always try to arrange all requests from all our guests. Thank you again for bringing this to our attention.  Kindest regards The Managment

title: A Reasonable Hotel
review: The worst stay i'ev had , the attitude of the staff towards there guests is unacceptable !! The hotel is poorly kept , the interior of the lobby is garish !  I had the family suite which had a view of the electricity transformer bang opposite!! Ugly ! I would have never checked in had it that my friends were staying there ! The staff won't send us the ironing table because we have a ice bucket in the room!!!! Until the bucket is returned the ironing board can't be given, come down return the bucket & we'll send the board !!! 😳 !! What non sense???  At check out maid asks me where the writing pad is ? I don't know where the hell it is as im on a holiday & not bothered with writing & any way isn't it a consumable ???? You want an account of the toilet paper aswell ?  The bell boy…

title: Perfect for our needs
review: Good clean hotel.Handy location. 5 mins walk to seafront.Nice wee pool with reasonable beer and food prices.Plenty of restaurants nearby as we were room only.Recommended in that price range ! Friendly staff. Ideal location and quiet at night.

title: Tour desk Centara pattaya Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time make this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. We have noted the good comments on our cleanliness, pool, food&beverage prices, location and friendly staff. We hope to see you back with us soon again. Best regards. The Management.

title: Excellent Hotel with a great location!!!!!!
review: When you stay at this Hotel be sure to make yourself known to Suzy,lloyd & the girls at the Tour desk. So professional in everything they do whether it's booking a tour or wanting to know other stuff about Thailand. Can't highly recommend enough Helena & Chris ☺✌👍

title: Cosy hotel. Nice stay!!!
review: Thank you very much for making this review. We are very pleased to see that all your expectations was met and we have noted the good comments about the Tour Desk staff and will share it with them. We hope to see you back with us soon again. Best regards. The Management.

title: Brilliant
review: The first best thing of this hotel is it's great (central) location. Pattaya beach is at a walking distance. Infact, our room had a sea view (though it is not next to the beach -higher level room). The Alcazar show venue is 5 mins walk. The walking street is easily acccessible by Tuk Tuk. The hotel and rooms were very neat & clean.The staff is very good, courteous. The food was good. We only had breakfast at the hotel. They had two types of breakfast:- Indian breakfast on second floor and International breakfast at their restaurant on ground floor. The indian breakfast was good in taste and also the spread. We stayed in Deluxe room. The room was spacious. The hotel has a swimming pool. Overall, great stay, good staff, excellent location. Kudos to the entire team. Will definitely…

title: Poor buffet
review: We stay in hotel three days from 24 th may to 26th may.hotel staff was good .rooms are neet and clean.Thai receptitionst is not good in english .Mr Varun was the only person who can understand the problems of visitors Main complaint of buffet breakfast all three days same menu only change in vegetable table.no varity in menu.poor service in buffet after too much long wait they provide items in less quantity.Overall zero value buffet breakfast

title: Pathetic Experience at Centara Pattaya Hotel
review: We sorry to see that you were note satisfied with our breakfast buffet. As informed you upon arrival we offered 2 different buffets, one american western buffet in The Mix restaurant and one vegetarian on our second floor. Guest can choose which one to use or combine both. We offer over more than 100 different items in total and try to find choices for all nationalities in our hotel. Thank for you the good comments on the staff, room cleanliness and Mr. Varun. We have shared this with all concerned. Kind regards from The Managment.

title: Budget Hotel
review: We had booked one night (23 May, 2017) at Pattaya as a part of my 10 days vacation in Thailand. The customer service at front office was extremely pathetic. Long wait at the reception for both check in and also at the time of check out. Staff was very rude. Even the bell boy has the audacity to yell at you if try to enter the lift with him. Not sure if this treatment was because of us being Indians. To my utter surprise the front office manager refused to take down my complaint in writing and asked me to do that online, leave aside solving my problem. Amazingly Varun (Management Trainee) at the front office was the only professionally skilled person, who wanted to help with our concerns. Lest recommended if you value your self respect.

title: A pretty good choice
review: Dear Guest, ¨ we are sorry to see that you were not satisfied with your check out. We have investigated this and have in our records following. You came in the lunch time and requested to check out right away as your taxi was waiting for you and your family. You informed our reception another room number than you stayed which was the reason our staff and bellman went to the wrong room. Rest assure that we give the same service to all nationalities. We have followed up with all staff and managers involved and addressed all your comments in order to prevent any similar issue in the future. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Ones again we are sorry for the slow service. We hope to have a chance to welcome you back and show our improvements, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Happy time in good hotel
review: I have stayed in this property in April 2017 with family. This is an old hotel, we have to walk a long way from reception to our room. Rooms are clean and well appointed. Bed linens are not clean. we have received a bill for making lipstick marks on bed linens, but we have not made any marks, even though we have charged for it. after talking to hotel management for several times, they cancelled the bill. Reception staff are not co operative. they are very strict to their rules.

title: EVERYTHING AT HAND
review: LOCATED...Opposite Soi 6/1 just down from 7/11(handy) ROOM.. Ideal size well maintained ROOM CLEANING .. Slow had to contact reception  @ 5.00pm to get room cleaned ... seemed to be short of housekeeping staff. WI-FI .. Free in room BREAKFAST .. Multi choice  for all nationalities....real nice . OTHER MEALS .. Had couple found to be excellent and tasty. POOL AREA/GYM/SAUNA .. Excellent  in all aspects. OVERALL OPINION OF STAY .....This hotel and staff are friendly and helpful from first arriving to day of departure....  Hotel is also guest friendly...... Hotel has it's own shuttle bus that run throughout the day in a circular route .... Enjoyed my long stay here and have already booked/paid for September (24 days)

title: Fabulous
review: Thank you so much for sharing your comments on your stay with us. We are very happy to see that you enjoyed our Free WIFI, breakfast, pool area, gym/Sauna/steam room, staff friendliness and service. best regards from The Management.

title: Great customer service and staff
review: The Hotel is fabulous in all ways. Location is very close to market, 7/11 Store and Indian Restaurants and it is easy to get Tuk tuk for travel. The Rooms are beautiful with a balcony. Beds are very comfortable. Bathrooms are spacious and clean. Swimming pool and Gym are very well maintained. There is a separate restaurant for vegetarians for taking breakfast. There is a good variety of Indian food items and fruits. The manager Mr. Varun is very courteous. The Thai staff at the Reception may be trained in English for better service to the guests.

title: Our home for 10 days
review: Dear Guest,  thank very much for sharing your comments from your stay. I am very happy and pleased to see that you enjoyed it all and have noted the good comments on the vegetarian breakfast selection, room, beds, bathrooms, swimming pool and our excellent management trainee Mr. Varun. I have shared this with all concerned. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Service is pathatic
review: I stayed at this hotel, with my wife, for a week in May 2017 on a bed and breakfast basis.   Check in was simple and easy and efficient, however as we arrived before 2PM we couldn't get access to our room, having spent 3 hours driving up from Bangkok.  I had arranged for flowers to be in our room on arrival but as we couldn't get in we could not check.  Natty, the reception manager, was really helpful and she offered a bag store and said if we went for a meal by the time we get back it would be ready with flowers there.  On our return everything was as promised. The hotel was situated around 300 metres from the beach in the centre of Pattaya and was surrounded by other hotels, bars, shops and massage parlours (some more professional looking than others) The room was spacious and…

title: Maintenance problems
review: The AC in the room was causing moisture to drop onto the floor giving a slippery surface. I was first told it was my fault, because I did not keep the room below 25degC???? The moved to another room, same problem. Suggest to the manager he gets a new AC technician who knows his job to fix the AC drains!

title: Great value for money
review: Dear Guest,  We are sorry for the inconvenience with the air condition. We have a yearly maintenance and deep cleaning program, and if broken and can not be fixed we replace them. The condensing sometimes comes when guests keep the balcony doors open and air condition on at the same time. Thank you again for bringing this to our attention so we can take action accordingly. Best regards from the Management

title: Five day holiday
review: Front desk staff is very profesional. Special thanks to Mrs. Natee, who solved our problem with room at first. I have witnessed, how she deal with "less experienced traveler", who had no maners at all - very proffesional, calm, direct. She is a true asset to this establishment.  If this was Centra hotel, very good. For a Centara (5 star) brand :), I have 1 issue - the food is just bad. Pizza is more of a thick pie with ketchup and cheap cheese. Massaman curry commes with 1,5 cm layer of oil on top. Potatoes are raw and the beef is tough. Tiramisu is without taste of coffee or amaretto. Yet the room service delivery was fast and server very professional.  As my already cheap room price didnt include breakfast, I was willing to pay additional money for it - I have changed my mind…

title: Bait and switch or just unlucky
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your comments from your stay. I have shared it with all concerned so we can improve. We have food tasting on these dishes this week as they dont seem to have been up to our standard. Centara Grand is 5 star hotels and Centara Hotels are 4. Thank you again, and I remain, Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Fantastic stay in the heart of Pattaya
review: We have been to this hotel on a number of occasions and normally there have been no issues? This time we believe the standards have dropped since our last visit. The staffs were not so attentive and the housemaid on some days was non existent. We will come again to this hotel on a future occasion, because it is so central for Pattaya.

title: Friendly staff in a small hotel
review: Revisited this hotel hotel after a year and it retains its friendly charm. The previous front line staff had been promoted (not surprising) but the new ones were equally friendly and helpful, especially Marissa who speaks English. The young bell boys will help with the baggage and store them with a smile. They stored our golf bags each day and brought them out to be loaded. During our previous visits, we noticed coach loads of Indian tourists but now replaced by Chinese tourists.Sensibly, they have put aside a tour group counter.   Free wifi is provided and the shuttle service to Central Festival Shopping Centre in Beach Street still operates. The travel agent at the hotel is friendly and one can book tours and private car to airport at a reasonable price. It is a more reliable…

title: CONVENIENTLY LOCATED
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very happy and pleased to see that you enjoyed you stay with us and that you expectations was met. We have noted the kind and good comments on our staff service and service mind, K Marissa in the reception, Free Wifi, Free Shuttle service and also the Tour counter. We will share this with all concerned. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Value for Money. Lovely Staff.
review: Stayed here for a month. Fantastic, convenient location. Just off second road near SOI 6. Ample secure parking. I had an extra large room on the eighth floor. Really nice, spacious, airy room. Great size bath, big enough for two!! Good water pressure as well. Restaurant was better for dinner than it was for breakfast. Depending on the amount of guests and their lack of manners, breakfast seemed to be a free for all, not really my style. The buffet style breakfast gave you a fair but not substantial choice of foods. Dinner was much more reserved and acceptable. The service was more personal and the food was better than average. The swimming pool was good and to my delight, was never overcrowded.  The staff were all very friendly and were only to pleased to help. Four minute walk…

title: Nice family hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We have noted the good comments on our 1 Bed room suites, room size, big bed, water pressure in the showers, service, food quality and our location. For suggestion on breakfast dishes please mail me directly to the hotel. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Good place for Corporate trips
review: I stayed here for 4 weeks. It was affordable and very good value. Fabulous breakfast. Lovely staff. The rooms were really nice, but on many the outlook was onto construction sites. The general area is very handy to the shopping street, and sleaze ville streets nearby. Very handy to great shops. Fun place to stay. Homely.

title: Overnight Stay as a Transit Hotel
review: I'm here for a night on a business trip. This hotel is not suitable for a person traveling on business ! The hotel is located right in the center of North Pattaya, surrounded with nightclub streets. If you're a party person looking for a cheap, good quality accommodation, this is the place.   The service is the Centara Group standard. The room, although small, is quite clean. The value is more than what's paid !

title: Winter Blues Blown Away With Centara Pattaya Hotel Stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for making this review. We have noted the good comments on our service, cleanliness and value for money. Our location is Central of Pattaya but still far away from the main entertainment areas, which is around 10 minutes with a taxi from our hotel. For our business guests we also offer a small business center corner with computers and free internet access 24 hours a day. Thank you again.  Best regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: For holidays
review: I had the good fortune to spend a week at the Centara Pattaya Hotel at the beginning of February, from start to finish it was an absolute pleasure. Even with an issue with my room on arrival, this was resolved with no fuss at all by the reception manager(can't recall her name, terrible with names) by having another room made up for me.  I've read some reviews that some though there wasn't enough choice at breakfast, being a Scotsman who enjoys a good breakfast, there was more than enough to satisfy my appetite, especially as the lady who cooked the eggs to order took the time to get my eggs poached.  Any staff that I sought info from were all very knowledgeable and took their time to make sure that I knew where I was going etc.  Please pass on my thanks to all your staff, in…

title: Good Hotel - Nice Location - Value for Money
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. I am very pleased and happy to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and that all your expectations was met. I have noted the kind and good comments on our staff service and knowledge and have shared this with all concerned teams and the persons you mentioned. Also to our Front Office Manager K Natty, Our Omellette expert K Lek and our restaurant super captain K Ao. I have also noted the good comments on our breakfast selection. Thank you again and we hope to see you back with us on your next visit, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: A stay marred with constant incompetency and no airconditioning
review: This property is one of the best property for us every time when we came to here we feel like a home, the staff n house keeping is very nice n familer n the atmosphere of the hotel is such a good I will like to choose this hotel every time

title: Nice location.
review: Good hotel , friendly staff.Rooms are comfortable , Swimming pool is amazing.Indian breakfast was average , with limited choices.the location is ideal with all the main attraction nearby.I really liked the Gym very much. overall a nice experience.

title: A Pleasant stay with some disappointment in end
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and we have noted to positive comments on our staff friendliness, room comfort, pool and pool area, location and our gym. Thank you again and we hope to see you back with us on your next trip. Best regards Jonas

title: Good hotel in Central Pattaya
review: The hotel is near to beach location quite good for couple and friends zone but not for families as the area in front of hotel is overly expose. Also one needs to take care of the bar facility  they  provide in the room. I was charged for the item which i haven't used. So to be cautious if you dont want to use any just inform the staff to remove all the stuff or check the item in front of staff at the time of checkin and checkout. I was charged 180THB. Breakfast is good rooms are clean and spacious. Pool facility is also good. The famous alcazer show is just walkable distance. If you can increase your budget go for suite rooms. Also note the hotels takes 1000THB per night as refundable security deposit.

title: Great Place to have a fun holiday!
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make this review. There was 2 items missing from the minibar when you checked out, which we charged for. We are sorry if there has been any miss understanding about this. We are pleased to see that you were satisfied with your stay and we hope to see you back with us, soon again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Great Stay with Friends
review: Hotel is decent and clean with good breakfast. Located in central Pattaya, 5min walkable distance to the beach. You get tuk-tuk from the beach for 10bht to walking st. 7-11 is just outside the hotel and has many restaurants nearby. Travel desk is cool and they arranged a trip to Koh larn (Coral Island) along with adventure sports. Their charge was pretty reasonable.   House keeping/room service was lazy didnt turn up and when we complained at the reception they assured immediate action and then got things rectified. Appreciate their prompt action. I would recommend this place to others.

title: Terrible
review: I would not stay here again or recommend it.  I will say the hotel is very reasonably priced but as they say you get what you pay for.  The ac was very loud and all night the lights kept flickering off and on though they were turned off-spooky. Tv was not clear and the breakfast was

title: Best place to stay with fantastic services
review: Dear Guest,  We are very sorry to see that you were not satisfied with your stay, except for the reasonable price. Unfortunately we did not get this information during your stay and could not assist you to fix the ac and the light. We hope to have chance to welcome you back on your next visit, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: As expected fantastic service.
review: I frequently travel to Pattaya every month. Centara Pattaya Hotel always a first choice to stay. They provide a fantastic services. Recently, I booked a hotel and I got sick, they provided reschedule for my booking. Overall is great location, room, and facilities.

title: Best hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very pleased to read that you were very satisfied with your stay and have noted the good comments on our staff service, hotel location, room standard and facilities. Thank you again, and I remain, Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Excellent stay..!!
review: During my 1st trip to Pattaya I stayed at the Centara Grand Mirage so I had great expectations for the Centara Hotel. I was not disappointed. From the friendly greeting upon arrival, the buffet breakfast, the friendliness of the staff around the pool, restaurant, and room service everything was Fantastic. The only reason I did not give 5 stars, was that our rooms took forever to be done. Most of the times, it was 3 pm until room service cleaned the room. You tend to find it annoying when you go out in the morning and when you came back after lunch, the room was not ready so you can have a nice lay down to relax.

title: Amazing staff, location, modern rooms and Close to everything.
review: So much to like! All the staff were lovely, friendly & polite. Majority knew English, which was helpful. I'd like to give a special thanks to one of the staff Marisa , she was also friendly and ever so accomodating and out of 4 hotels she's the best we have found! This hotel is lucky to have her.
