The hotel itself was modern, close to everything & inexpensive. Added bonus was having a bar in the pool.. Cocktails & were good value & enjoyable. The rooms all have a balcony overseeing the pool. Bathroom was roomy and ultra modern. Air con & bar fridge were ice cold. Bed was super comfy. Wifi was good. Room service was quick and easy. Food was yummy and hotel had everyday specials. Another bonus was having an Tourism place on site, so easy to organise events with a Free shuttle bus…

title: Not impressed
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. I am very pleased and happy to see that you enjoyed your stay and that all your expectations was met. I have noted the good feed back on our Guest Service Office, Khun Marissa and will share this with her. I have also noted the good comments on the hotel product, value for money, cocktail quality, room standard and cleanliness, WIFI and the free shuttle we offer. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Awesome as always!!
review: We booked this hotel online for a week in September 2016. The Hotel is centrally located but that is the only positive. The rooms were average, could be cleaner. The breakfast was mostly cold even though they had hot & cold food. The hotel was mostly full of indian businessmen on seminars so they were treated better than the other people staying there. The hotel is best 3 star but they wanted to charge 5 star prices for bar drinks & spa/massage services. Won't stay there again.

title: Holiday with family
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments. We are sorry to see that your expectations was not met 100%. We have noted your comments on the breakfast, cleanliness and the business groups. Rest assure we try to met all guests expectations and to deliver the same service to everyone. We have among the lowest Spa prices in Pattaya and have been nominated for the best Value for Money Spa 3 years in row, so we do not agree on your comment that we charge 5 star prices. Same for our bar where we also offer Happy Hour with buy 1 get 1 every day. There is also daily promotions, such as 2 Chang beer for totally 117THB net all day long. There is no 5 star hotels who has lower price that this. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Wonderful time I had
review: This was my second stay at their property and can't believe, I got better service than before!! Loved their breakfast, so delicious as always. Beautiful and clean rooms. A must stay property to stay at Pattaya!!

title: Very good.
review: Stayed here for 5 nights in August & wss reasonably impressed.  I am about to book again.  The rooms are a good size, with good amenities and they are clean. This place is in a good location.  The breakfast is pretty good & the service is good.  I think that this place offers really good value for money.

title: First time in Pattaya
review: Dear Valued Guest,  thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very happy and pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay and that all your expectations was met. We have noted the good comments on your room size, amenities, cleanliness, location, breakfast, service and the value for money. Thank you again, and I remain, Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Average hotel
review: myself and my husband stayed at this hotel for 10 nights, after 3 nights in Bangkok. the hotel itself was very clean, the staff will go out of there way to help you, the breakfast is very good loads of choice. we was in room 709 with the view of the pool.....there is a tour operator called Lloyd we booked a few tours with him and enjoy our tours. the night market is a must while in Pattaya , and an elephant ride... we did have a few lunches in the hotel.... all in all i would like to thank the staff and the manger for a wonderful 10 night relaxing in the sun, for our first time in Thailand i cant wait to go back ,

title: ramesh
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. I am very pleased to see that all your expectations was met and have noted the good comments on hotel cleanliness, breakfast standard & variety, staff friendliness and service and the Tour desk service. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Excellent Staff & Service
review: It was just an average hotel..the food was also ok nothing out of the box..The rooms are spacious but the hotel is not the beach road..Personally i would have preferred one on beach road since the view is good..Good for a family stay though..One of the staff was very helpful since we have a language problem he helped us a lot in knowing about the city..

title: ramesh
review: nice stay place is centara pattaya hotel me and my friends 2 night stay in hotel  very nice looking & pool just 10 minte walk to sea nice beach hotel stof is best and good service      business purpuge to go thailand

title: Centara, Pattaya ........... affordable, great location
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and have noted to good comments on our hotel design and service. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Nice stay
review: Centara Hotel, Pattaya is an excellent family hotel. It is centrally located yet not too far from the beach ... just 10 or maybe 15 minutes walk ... Ours   was a family holiday and I had booked a couple of rooms through Booking.com ... The check in was fast, efficient ... and, yes, smiling, welcoming  faces at the reception ... believe me when I say that this is important. A guest, at the very inception, needs to be reassured that he or she in friendly environs, needs to be able to relate... Here I give the Centara the thumbs up !!  We were given adjoining rooms in the new block. The rooms were simply decorated but very  nice , comfortable. There is the mini bar, the wee little fridge, coffee/tea maker (with stock) , a Tv ... and great Wi-Fi ... The bathroom is squeaky clean…

title: Third time back
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review and give all your comments from your stay. I am very happy and pleased to see that all your expectations was achieved. I have noted the positive and good comments on the first impression, check in procedure, staff friendliness, room product, room amenities and set up, mini bar selection, Wi-Fi, breakfast and food quality. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Good stay but....
review: We stayed for 2 nights at this hotel.  We enjoyed the pool and the food at the hotel.  It was situated centre of the area  which was useful for us going to the purchase area and beach side walk.  Had a memorable stay at this prop.

title: Nice clean hotel
review: The hotel is very clean and rooms are nice and decent size, the location is good not to far from beach and plenty of bars and restaurants nearby, the buses are all around so nowhere to far to travel to x the pool bar has lovely snacks at decent prices and the staff were lovely especially Nit and Pair i would certainly stay again

title: Perfect Stay in all aspects
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review and share your comments from your stay with us. We are very happy and pleased to see that you enjoyed our room standards, cleanliness and location. We have also noted the great comments on our staff and will share with all concern, specially K Nit and K Pair. Kind regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: Worst Centara we ever stayed in
review: Hi guys..  I had researched this hotel before my trip and here I am giving my Frank opinions if u plan to visit Pattaya..  1. Nice decent hotel 2. All rooms are good...prefer a pool side facing if u can.. 3. Lovely buffet spread...with some Indian dishes.. 4. Not far from the beach and other happening places of Pattaya.. 5. Seven 11 all around.. 6. Reasonably priced..  In short a perfect place for a family.. Please do visit..  Thanks  Nelson..

title: Fantastic staff ,great service .central location.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for sharing your comments from your stay with us, we very pleased to see that we met all your expectations and have noted the good comments on our hotel standard, rooms, breakfast, location and value for money. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Fantastic
review: Booked in for a week but left after one night due to noise coming from party in Family room next door!! We had to report the incident to security and as a result felt threatened the next morning. Hotel was full of guests from the Indian sub continent who in the vast majority of cases had absolutely no manners. Breakfast service was a nightmare with people scrambling for food the second it was replenished as well as filling empty bottles with water or fruit juices to take on trips etc. To be fair to the management they treated our concerns seriously and offered us a move to the Centara Nova which is nearby and was like moving to paradise.

title: Great staff, very friendly and helpful.
review: This is a great place to stay, the first room we checked we didn't like the view, we spoke to the staff who could not of been more helpful, they moved our bags to another room with a great view of the pool. The pool bar has excellent and very friendly staff and is a great way to spend a few hours swimming and enjoying happy hour between 5pm and 7 pm. The breakfast buffet is well stocked with a great selection of food for all tastes at a good price, it's a great way to start your day.

title: Modern resort style hote
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed our staff service mind, bell service, pool bar staff and area, breakfast and food quality. We hope to see you back with us soon again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Outstanding family stay
review: Modern room design with enormous shower (no bath in our rooms) and views over the central swimming pool. Well suited to families but a bit noisy if you looking for a quiet venue.  Dinner buffet offers a great choice of eat-as-much-as-you-can dishes which includes sushi, seafood (prawn, crab, rock lobster), pork chops, steaklets plus usual assortment of salad, pasta and Thai dishes.   Beach is a fair walk away - there is an hourly shuttle service to and from one of the beach areas. The beach is not great by normal island standards - quite narrow and steep and the sea rough. When we were there, a significant amount of trash washed up on the beach overnight.

title: One of the worst hotel stay ever!!!
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay and have noted the good comments on the pool area, food quality and room standard. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Good value 3 star hotel
review: We stayed here as a family of six with the grandchildren in mind. We all had a brilliant time. The hotel was modern and quirky and we were very happy with our rooms. The staff were fantastic especially at meal times and at the pool/beach. We have been to Thailand many times so had a taxi waiting for us when we went off site as it out of Pattaya - well done Mr Kom - took us everywhere for 200 bahts! Breakfast was top notch and they did an excellent BBQ. The main attraction was that there was plenty for the grandkids to do - if the grandkids are happy then Mum and Dad and Granny and Grandad are happy.

title: Gala time with my frndz
review: The  hotel  is  damn  good  with  all  the facilities...the  staff too are taking care  of us....feeling great  to hv  such  a hotel in pattaya..we  came  from  banglore  to Bangkok  for school  trip  to enjoy...n  we are enjoying too  in  the hotel...

title: School trip
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and have noted the good comments on our staff service and our facilities. Thank you again and i remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Great hotel if no Indians
review: The hotel is nice . The staff is kind ,I liked the time I stayed here also the GM was kind enough to give us the info about the hotel  The food is ok.... I would love to visit this hotel again with my friends

title: Good , but there is better with same price
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for making this review. I am very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and have noted the good comments on our staff performance, food quality and standard. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Nice hotel.. Overall good staff..
review: Front desk staff were really polite, friendly and supportive. Fast check in. the room was nice, fully furnished and clean. I can say a real 4 star one. the atmosphere and breakfast buffet were pleasant. However, the noise and nuisance from Indian people were intolerable. I strongly recommend the hotel management to find a solution. Another suggestion for the room, If you could provide slippers, It gonna be fantastic. Thanks Centara and hope to see you again.

title: Birthday celebrations
review: Stayed at the Centara pattaya hotel for two weeks. Ideally situated close to shops  beach and walking street .   Hotel staff very obliging.  They go out of their way to assist.  Restaurant serves great food good value for money

title: Good hotel amazing staff totally ruined by Indian hordes
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time so share your comment from your stay with us. We are really pleased to see you enjoyed everything and have also noted the kind feed back on our staff and their service. Thank you again, and I remain, Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Nice hotel no complaints. Great staff
review: The centara and its staff were brilliant ,the rooms were clean and tidy ,the breakfast was great with a good choice. The centara is well situated just off second road. One thing totally wasted our time there, the Indian hordes mainly single men aged between 20 and 60 who thought it was ok to take there clothes off poolside then jump in the pool without showering and with their underpants on .the pool staff really tried so hard to stop this happening but were overwhelmed by the shear number of Indians.  In the restaurant at breakfast the staff were constantly warning them about their eating habits (using their hands to take the food from the heated containers).also trying to keep the noise down ,(they were so loud). I have never known people with such disgusting vile habits than…

title: Nice hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review and share your comments from your stay. We have noted the good comments on our staff friendliness and service mind. Rest assure we do our utmost to inform everyone to shower and use shorts before entering the pool. There is also signage in several languages about respecting all guests and keeping the volumes down so no one disturb other guests. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: loud idians and cocrotch in my room
review: Nice clean well looked after hotel, breakfast was decent. I see complaints about Indian guests, I'm Irish and I had no trouble. A few days in the pool I joined in with the Indian groups, made friends had beers and a laugh. Also if you see lots of Indian guests, they know value for money lol. Beau was one of the managers and she really couldn't have done any more, nicest manager I've came across and worked very hard and always with a smile. If she changes hotel then so will I :)

title: Pattaya has little of interest.
review: If you wish a good cheap hotel with good service I would recommend Centara Pattaya but the streets outside are not for family as ladies of the night and in this case also the day are at work and there are a lot of them and very friendly. Excursions are the only thing to do there and be vary ask lots of detailed questions for example if you go jetsking they say once round but they do not tell you that lasts 60/90 seconds, and keep track of hidden costs at the excursion help desk the amounts mentioned and the total at the end can differ. Would recommend massages and tattoos. The brochure says beach 6 minutes away which true enough but hardly anything exciting there. Do not regret going but not again.

title: Horrible Service, Moldy Bathrooms, Sketchy Guests
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed the hotel and our service. Yes the hotels location is in the central part of Pattaya. If you walk fast one of the soi you can make it to the beach in 8-9 minutes. Pattaya as a destination offer everything, beach, excursions, Island trips, shopping, markets, fun parks, culture, floating market and much more. Next to the hotel you have Sai Song (second road) which has shopping centre, market, restaurants and several family attractions so it is well visit by families. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Nice Hotel
review: I had a bad time at Centara Pattaya. I realize this is an older hotel, but dont believe that its really nice. The service staff at the front desk were very unhelpful. For example, at 5am my airport taxi didnt show up and they tried to charge me $1 to use the phone rather than trying to help me find my driver. The rooms are older and there is mold in the bathrooms. I wont make any comments on the bus loads of indian sex tourist staying in the hotel (then again, its like that everywhere in Pattaya).

title: Close to beach
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments. I have investigated your comments and also checked our records, log books and security camera. Our record shows that our staff assisted to call the taxi for you 4 times. You had booked a taxi from the street who did now show up, event though we called him 4 times and every time he said he was on the way. We charged you the cost price for this. I understand that it must have been stressful not knowing if your driver would come  or not, but i cannot blame our staff for this. Regarding the comment on mold in your bathroom this has been addressed and we have deep cleaned the silicon area. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: What a trip!!!
review: This hotel is close to the Bart Bus and Soi 6 entertainment street. Staff are fantastic and rules are strict. Pool looks bigger in the photos as usual. Rooms are very nice and modern. Remember to place the change my linen card on the pillow to have staff change the sheets. Only down side is the amount of Indian visitors who take over the whole hotel on weekends, some where requested by staff to please change clothing and comply with hitel rules. The Staff look after all guest the same from all over the world. I found it a bit expencive and after staying 11 days I found out there was deals where free days are offered for extended stays but I was never offered any deals.

title: Very clean and good location
review: 20 min walk from walking street  Close to nightlife  Very very clean room Small pool but nice bar in the water At the time of our visit, most of the guests were indian You may need to pay if you put stain on blankets or towels. We asked for salt but they asked us to come down stairs and grab it. But on general, i will stay again if i return.

title: First stay in Pattaya
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review and share your comments. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and have noted the good comments on our staff service, cleanliness and location.  Kind regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: It's good if you get a best rate
review: Chose to stay here for 2 weeks - great location for first time Pattaya visitors. Arrived to check in - didn't realise that you required a credit card or USD deposit. We left 3000 Thb instead. Given a twin room with a view of the pool. Room was well kept and brilliant housekeeping services every afternoon. Cannot fault the staff of this hotel - they do an excellent job and deserve more recognition. Wifi available throughout the hotel. Breakfast was good - egg bar was the highlight. A fresh omelette every day if you wanted. As for the previous reviews claims of 'Indian men' - as two white women we received a lot of stares and gawping. However this was also the case whenever we stepped outside. I don't think its fair for the hotel to be blamed for this - if someone books a room -…

title: Not nice
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. I am very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and have noted the good comments on our cleaning, room maid, breakfast, staff service mind, wifi and pool area. Thank you again and we hope to see you back here on your next Pattaya visit, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: NEVER STAYING HERE AGAIN.
review: Overall is just ok,  staff is ok, Breakfast is good with many choices. Room should get improved, my room door cannot locked and need to wait a staff to fix. Moreover, water couldn't drained at shower area and all flood.  Check their official website. Always has good promotions!!!

title: Used to love this hotel, but now the clientele put us off
review: I have stayed in this hotel twice before and always enjoyed it. The staff are great as is the manger jonas.  What put us off this time is crowds and crowds of Indian men , taking there clothes off and going in the pool with just underwear on, in the breakfast room they also handled all the food and were actually eating food over the buffet breakfast. At the pool shower room they were using it as there personal toilet which was disgusting. Both my husband and daughter got eye infections . Our daughter is 3 years old and the Indian men would stare and look at her all day around the pool which we found strange , but it wasn't just us other people around the pool both men and women commented about how they would stare at our child. The hotel and staff are good but like I say the…

title: Decent Hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to bring your comments to our attention. We are sorry that you felt bothered by the group and rest assure we will inform the agent and also find a way to manage this better in the future. Thank you again and we hope to see you back with us on your next visit, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Honest opinion
review: Decent hotel at reasonable room tariff. Rooms are quit good with decent views of the surrounding. All though NO natural views like hill , mountains , sea , beaches or anything of that sort. Plus point are easy access to the city and shops like 7/11 and Mac Donald's and so on.

title: Summer vacation with kids
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed yours stay with us and have noted the good comments about our rooms, surrounding and location. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Mesmerising hotel.
review: My room was not like it was presented by the flight centre. How ever despite to vew from my room being por it was nice and clean . It was comfortable and well laid out . I feel that though rated as a four star hotel i think thats a liitle above what i would give it a good 3 star. Location is great with very good food resonably priced. I will have to say that credit must be given where credit is due . The staff are all very friendly and couldnt do enough for you. The assistant manager Beau needs a special mention and her abillity to make you feel at home is outstanding well done management here. If any one has an issue seek out this lady and your problems are gone . Laundry i found to be a little expencive but hell as long as i didnt have to do all good.

title: Great place to stay with terrific staff
review: Was well looked after from the moment I stepped into the hotel. I stayed on the 7th floor and had a good view from the back of the hotel. The bed was very comforatable and the airconditioning was very cooling. The breakfast was great with a big choice. The only negative was the Indian tourists who pushed their way past you when ordering eggs or getting stuff from the buffet. My motto, treat them as they treat you. But in saying that, the staff had full control and knew who was next in line. Susi and Lloyd were a great help at the tour desk as were all the staff.    A big thanks to all the staff and will definiatly stay there again. The bad reviews that I have read on here must be from people that just cannot be pleased. Thanks again.

title: 1st time to Pattaya
review: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. We have noted the good comments on our hotel product, bed and mattresses, breakfast, staff service and the tour counter staff. Thank you again and i remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: holiday
review: Our 1st visit to this Pattaya, after many trips to the Thai islands. For those of you who are in the same position as we were,,, ie... been to many islands but never to Pattaya and so many friends say, you must go and see! Well we did and here is my verdict. I am not going to comment on the day time activities, as this is a mainly nightlife resort and most will be travelling for this and not to sit on an unimpressive beach by Thai standards. We usually go to Patong the party capital of Phuket. However Pattaya is different, totally different. It certainly has some life about the place, although far more spread out than the compact Patong, Pattaya has a number of different night spots in different areas. The easiest way to move around is by motorcycle taxi as these guys know…

title: Tour desk Centara Pattaya hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to send your comments on your stay in our hotel and Pattaya. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and have noted the kind comments on our staff and their service mind. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Good hotel
review: great hotel with a very nice swimming pool,we got pool side attached rooms which were very clean,service was also very good . the location is a bit far from walking street  but it is close from alcazar show and rasputin where normally many Indians go.the quality of the Indian breakfast must be improved .

title: Very nice to stay.
review: Very nice hotel to stay. It's near beach. And 10 minutes form walking street. The breakfast was too good. Indian food available in breakfast. With in year stayed twice this hotel. The room was clean and spacious. The swimming pool was good.

title: Nice one
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and have noted the positive comments on our location, breakfast, Indian dishes, room cleanliness and size, and our pool and pool bar area.  Thank you again and we hope to see you back here on your next visit, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Passable,- Probably been good when was new.
review: We stayed there for 4 days, it's a nice hotel, clean, good value for money. Great location: close to many shops and walking distance to a small mall. it has a lovely swimming pool with a nice bar and the staff were very friendly.

title: Friendly, clean and helpful
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us an have noted the positive comments on our friendly staff, cleanliness, location, value for money and our pool and pool bar area. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Nice hotel
review: This hotel is located in a comfortable location and provides parking. the entrance to the hotel is not appealing. the rooms are small but fairly decorated and accessorized. The rooms and the hotel in general were clean but felt abit tired, Maybe due to using very cheap materials. cheap doors, cheap wood veneers, and more. my room also smelled from sewage, originated in the bathroom. i also experienced some water leak issue over the bed in the middle of the night.  Breakfast is OK, nothing fancy, coffee from an instant machine- Not good.  Service was Mah.. No one to escort us to the rooms or help with luggage.   Was ok, could be better

title: Great hotel, fairly priced, great staff A+
review: Had the pleasure of staying here with 11 friends for a stag doo (Bachelors party)  Staff were great and friendly and the hotel was absolutely faultless. The hotel throughout was thoroughly clean and the the pool and gym/fitness room was adequate in size.  Only downfall was a mix up in rooms and a power cut that was all fixed in no time.  Breakfast is great, dinner I recommend just going out and trying Thai foods or restaurants as there is many places to eat from with a great variety.  Highly recommended.

title: Gud hotel, Nice location, pathetic Reception staff, group travellers
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very for taking the time to make this review. We are very pleased to see that you and your friends enjoyed your stay with us. We have noted the good comments on our staff, friendliness, service attitude, cleanliness and breakfast. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: 3 night Pattaya stay
review: We had booked deluxe room in tower b, but outta sheer cunningness we were sent to tower A, as thr were too many guest for group booking & they wished to fulfil their commercial booking.when we reached our room in tower a, was horrified to see the size of such a small room, dirty pillows, pungent smell, small bathroom which was way away from the description of the room facilities and gory.it finished before starting. we were literally harassed to pay deposit of $100 per room which was no were mentioned to us at the time of room booking. we tried explaining our situation tht v r running outta cash so v will deposit our passport or credit card fr tht sake but tht pathetic lady Mrs Patty, didn't care a damn. whenever you speak to reception staff thy talk as if thy r doing u a favor…

title: WORST HOTEL EVER.....!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank for sharing your comments on our stay with us. We are sorry for the inconvenience upon check in, but we (as all major hotel chains) are following the policy with a guarantee deposit. This for guests how has not paid their room or plan to use the in-house facilities such as restaurants, pool bar, spa etc. This can be done in cash or credit card, same as other hotels. We are sorry if you felt our reception staff did not inform this in a correct way.  You had booked a Deluxe room and you were also accommodated in a Deluxe room. The size of the room is around 32m2, same size it says on the web page. For guests who prefer bigger rooms, we recommend our 1 Bed Room Suites, size is up to 60m2. You were offered this upon check in for a surcharge. We have two buildings in the hotel, both built and open the same year. We have noted the good comments on all other staff, room maid, cleaning and value for money. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Two enjoyable stays here
review: Very nice hotel,rooms large,comfortable and clean, air conditioning and bathroom facilities good, small side balconies pool area ok and never too busy,quiet at night so sleep not a problem,breakfast just what you would expect, location V.Good,staff friendly and helpful,would book again

title: You get what you pay for.
review: Stayed here for 1 week in early July. Upon arrival, the exterior and entry way into the foyer looked nicely decorated and clean. Checkin was quick and efficient by the smiling staff.   The room I was staying in was a deluxe double room facing the city as I like because it's more quiet when laying up.   The room was mostly clean when I arrived all except the bathroom. I think they forgot to clean it as there was pieces of hair that looked to be from a woman in the vanity and shower. The bath was spotless. The tiles felt sticky like it hadn't been mopped in a long time.   I came to realise sometimes even if you push the maid service at times they don't clean your room. This only happened twice during my one week stay.   Something they NEED to fix in room 624 is the fridge!! It was…

title: One of the Best !!!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review. I have noted your comments about the cleaning and addressed this with our housekeeping team. As per Centara environment and green card policy we ask the guest to put the cleaning card on the bed if you want to change the linen. The minibar is a normal standard size and inside it you can control the temperature. It should have been standard temperature and we suspect it has been lower. We are sorry for this inconvenience. Thank you again for your comments and we hope see you back with us on your next visit, and i remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Centara is best coz of their employees
review: Great Hotel...fantastic location. We stayed in their One bedroom suite and the rooms were very spacious and chic. The property is very well located and quite close to most of the popular & visited tourist spots and just 5-7 mins walk from the beach.  The pool with a bar is a great place to hang out.

title: Bubbly service, mint rooms, slick restaurant
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. I am very happy to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. I have noted the positive comments on the 1 Bed room suite, our location and our Pool Area. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Awesome hotel with excellent service
review: I got early check in coz of chu. She is very good with customer and very soft spoken. I must say that i will come again to stay here just coz of its employees. Best wishes to chu. Swimming pool is very nice and nick is nice guy over the pool bar. Every one is so nice and clean n nice rooms.

title: Good hotel
review: Hotel is good rooms are clean 4* hotel is not near to beach 500 Mtr from beach balcony is in every room in A category you will find the bathroom tub not in b category so kindly try to get  a category rooms breakfast is good but not proper Indian taste

title: Excellent
review: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments. Your feedback is very important to us as we strive for continuous improvements. We hope that we will have another opportunity to welcome you back in the near future.  Sincerely Yours,  The Management

title: Fantastic experience
review: Hi I have been there here for 2 night in 503 A room is very nice room service is also good each and every service is very fast and good for specially for family reception are also very kindly with talk and helpful and breakfast is very good and hygienic with all the different countries taste and very good for India taste

title: Fantastic Staff
review: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you very much for taking your time to write a good review with nice feedback to our hotel product and our service. We hope that we will have another opportunity to welcome you back in the near future.   Sincerely yours,   The Management

title: Great stay
review: I had been there for a conference. Resort is just superb. Room size and specially size of bed and mattress they have definitely deserve 5* for it. Room amenities are also very good, ambience of hotel can be better but swimming pool with bar is something interesting. Hotel has got free wifi everywhere for its guests. Breakfast spread out is also good. Overall a fantastic experience and will surely recommend the property.

title: Old decor but clean room
review: Stay here where i going to Pattaya with tour.. the hotel is standart, nothing to special but the room is clean. Not have much time to look around near hotel bcoz im here just 1 night..im booking 2 room n request for connecting room but full and they give free upgrade 1 room to "family room" so the room have living room n more big than the other one.. thankyou

title: Comfortable Stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for this review. We are pleased to see that you liked our cleanliness and hope to see you back here on your next visit.  Best regards,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Excellent stay with convenient location
review: Hotel with Good Location and like Most THAI Hotels serves Great Breakfast Quality, Air-conditioner took sometime to start. Good Room Service & Staff Arranged In Room Massage Session. Reception staff has Unique, Vibrant  Attention Grabbing Dress Code

title: Welcoming staff and clean comfortable hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay, our breakfast and staff service. We have followed up and fixed the Air condition as per your comment. Thank you again and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt General Manager

title: To many Indians
review: We stayed in this hotel on 17 and 18 of June, 2016. The staff is excellent and very helpful. We reached almost 3 hours before official check in time and we were provided with the room immediately and without any questions. The room itself was excellent with all the facilities one can think of and quite spacious. The breakfast spread was pretty decent and had many options to choose from.  The best part of this hotel is its location. It is very close to many attractions in pattaya like alcazar show, 3D art gallery etc. the beach road is also at walking distance and once you reach there, you can either walk on the beautiful pathway or take a songthaew for jus 10 bahts to reach walking street. Though it is close to all these attractions, it is very quite and peaceful. There is a…

title: Good central hotel
review: We visited this hotel from 29th May for 2 weeks. The hotel it`s self, well breakfast  was good with a varied selection, lovely cook who will fry you eggs ect, all the staff were friendly and helpful. Good location for getting about there is a free shuttle to varies locations.There is a nice small swimming pool always seemed to be warm which was a bonus, pool staff as before very friendly.Rooms ,we were on the 7th floor nice room no problem with noise there is a hairdrier in the room,Also I should say you don`t need to take towels as they are supplied at the pool bar they are large.Tea and coffee in room only get a couple of coffees but cheap enough at the store on the corner.Go for the deluxe room with the king size bed as you get a shower and a bath.

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. We have noted the good comments on our breakfast selection, location, shuttle service, staff service and room amenities. Thank you again and we hope to see you back with us on your next visit, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjotedt General Manager

title: Great for what you need!
review: Was back in centara in may again this hotel is just the best clean friendly staff bar food so cheap and 17 00 to 19 00 buy one drink get one free . The manager always out round pool talking to people asking everything ok i will be back in December

title: Short break
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for making this review and share you good experiences from your stay. We will see you again in December!  Best regards,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Acceptable for Multi Nationalities
review: Just checked out from the hotel, decent hotel in Pattaya, not the worst but not the best, I think I already had worries about the hotel and Pattaya with its reputation anyway, but hotel is in a good location, you can easily get to beach road and walking street from the hotel with lots of other bars, restaurants and shops along the way.  Went to koh larn for the day which is about a 45 min ferry ride away from the pier at he end of walking street, got a motorbike taxi to take me to the beach which I loved. The hotel was comfortable, which also reflects in the price, if it's somewhere to stay as a base just to sleep then it's fine, if it's luxury you want then I would stay somewhere else, it was perfect for me, and I would return again to Pattaya and to the hotel.i used the pool…

title: Amazing Experience - Recommended for Indian Tourists
review: I checked into Centara Pattaya Hotel on 24 May 2016 and spent two nights here.  Although I did not use much of the Hotel facilities, I would certainly recommend the hotel primarily to Indian Tourists.  Staff Hospitality was excellent. Buffet breakfast was beautifully arranged and room ambience - magnificent.  Thank You for making my stay at Pattaya comfortable and memorable.

title: Not what we expected
review: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you very much for taking your time to write a good review with nice feedback to our staff and our service. Your kind compliments will be passed on to our team and this will certainly motivate them to keep up the good work. We hope that we will have another opportunity to welcome you back in the near future.   Sincerely yours,   The Management

title: Okay....
review: This holiday did not start out as we expected.  Even though we had no expectations,  we arrived about 10.30pm to find the reception staff all confused about our reservation and check in. They said they would sort it out the following day which  did not happen. The hotel is a very nice hotel but has a lot of maintenance  issues, which I'd say has been ongoing for some time. When booking this hotel we were going by the pictures advertised. Arriving at this complex, you can tell these photos are not up to date which is a shame. On the plus side of things this hotel is lucky to have some outstanding staff members which made our stay much more pleasurable. Just to name a few, there was Nick and Nit in the pool bar, and Ao in the restaurant - without these staff members the hotel…

title: Private Dinner on the Beach
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to write this comment.  We would like to apologize for your negative experience you had at our hotel as clearly this does not reflect the quality and standards we set out to deliver. We are sorry to learn that you found several matters unsatisfactory,  and would like to assure you that appropriate action has been taken to remedy, where necessary. Naturally, our intention is to give the highest standards of service possible and we regard all our guests  of the utmost importance to our future success. Once again thank you for your comments and we hope that we will have another opportunity to welcome you back in the near future.  Sincerely yours,   The Management

title: Just a bit disappointed.
review: This hotel is okay but the pool was filled with noisy tourists. The gym was not upto the mark. The breakfast buffet was a good spread. The location of the hotel though is convenient and you can easily get transport once you step our of the hotel door. The bathrooms weren't as clean and not upto the mark. Probably cos the hotel is an old hate.

title: Excellent Hospitality
review: We have Confrence in Hotel Centara Patya , Pattya for 10 days . During our stay & Confrence we never feel that we r out of India , All Hotel Professionla were very coperative Specially Jyoti , She never say NO , what ever we required she try  to give her best ,  I will suggest that when ever plan Pattya stay only at Hotel Centara Pattya 👍

title: Great!!
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay and conference with us. We have noted the kind comments on our staff service and specially from K Joyti. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: 2 week golfing trip with Prestige Golf Tours
review: Our second visit to Pattaya , after staying at a big expensive hotel the first time we wanted something a bit cheaper as a base for us to do a bit of island hoping,the centara was fine for that. Clean and nice room , comfortable bed and good shower and bath. Friendly helpful staff . Breakfast wasn't up to much and the majority of the pool was in the shade most of the day . The drinks at the pool bar were really reasonable. The road outside was very busy as its a narrow road but not a lot of noise .

title: A nice hotel and friendly stuff - espicially Paddy
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and have also noted the positive experience on our cleaning, room product, bed and showers, pool bar and value for money and for our staff friendliness. For the breakfast we try to have dishes for everyone and also offer to take requests in case any guests favorite is not on the menu that day. Thank you again and we hope to see you back on your next visit, and I remain,  Sincerely yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Its is not a hotel,much poor than a B&B
review: Our overall stay was greeted by loving people and made us welcome and since last visit they all remembered you. The staff went out of there way to make our stay complete, Beau and her staff were outstanding and made us feel proud. It was our 2nd stay at Centara since November our home base for Golf. Meals were very good as well.

title: One of the good Hotels In Pattaya
review: With it's clean and tidy rooms, Centara Pattaya Hotel is one of the best establishment in Pattaya City, It's location is in the center of 2. road and you can easlily reach to walking Street and Na Klau Beach. Staff in the hotel is helpfull and they all know english. Hotel has a good decoration and nice pool. Thanks for the staff such as Patty, Ao, M, Nit, Touch and many others who will make your stay flawless.

title: Pattaya revisited
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. I am very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. I have noted the kind comments of our clean and tidy rooms, facilites and friendly staff. I will share this with Khun Patty, Khun Ao, Khun M, Khun Nit and Khun Touch. Thank you again and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Valuable hotel whit perfect service
review: Friendly staff, Lovely room. Staff were excellent and Very helpful. Good position.  Nice swimming pool.   Breakfast was delicious. I would stay there again  but not during the water festival  in the middle of April.

title: Can be better
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for making this review. We are very happy to see that you enjoyed your stay and our staff service. Best regards, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Friendly clean lovely hotel
review: I had room on 8th floor.my room is perfect and spacious with great bath. The breakfast is delicious with lot of variety. The kitchen guys specially mr Nice is very kind and helpful. The receptionist Patty & Bom is very kind. The mangers Mr Jonas & Mrs Chu are too specialist and so hospitality to u all the time. I would recommend anyone to stay this hotel such as yre home and all the staff like your family

title: Avoid Centara Pattaya Hotel at any cost!!
review: Overall reception was bad; with very tardy staff to address your concerns. Room was horrible; with faulty and scary electrical connections in the bathroom and leaky aircon that spoiled the clothes in the cupboard. Very lousy ambient too. And to top it all unresponsive and "don't care" management.

title: Friendly Staff, great service, nice hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Please accept our apology that our reply has not been recorded. We are sorry to see that you were unsatisfied with your stay with us. We have not found any record that you been in contact with our reception or managers so we do not agree that do not care. You are welcome to contact me for any further assistance, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Worth a visit
review: Extremely friendly, kind and helpful staff. Great location and easy access to the markets and beach. Rooms are spacious, the breakfast is delicious with lots of variety for people of Asian and European origin. Facilities are great, we did not use the swimming pool or gym but they seemed nice. Rooms are spacious, clean and we had nice relaxing time. The receptionist Patty was very kind and gave us a room 2 hours early as we had a small child. Bell boy Oaf was also very kind and helpful. He would be always ready to help whenever we called him , he also got tissues and hot milk for our child when we needed them. I would recommend anyone to stay there. Patty and Oaf are asset to the restaurant and all other staff were helpful too.  Regards, Jignesh

title: Low for Thai standards
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank  you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are grateful and very pleased to see that you had a great stay. We have noted the kind comments about the hotel product, breakfast and our facilities. I will share the comments with all staff and especially K Patty and K Oaf! Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Nice Hotel, Amazing Staff, Great Location
review: Only a short review but honest..   room was not ready when arrived so was upgraded to large family room  .great room  just the view out of the front of the hotel was awful.  Breakfast and  round the pool was good a varied . Every employee had a smile on there face and seemed to enjoy there work .    Would i come again ?  Yes NO PROBLEM

title: Nice hotel very centrally located in Pattaya.
review: Nice rooms, good food (both Thai and Western) served at the restaurant - very good aircondition. Nice pool and private area to relax and enjoy a drink. One minute away from the nearest 7/11 in 2nd Road and the infamous Soi 6 if that is your cup of tea. If not, simply hop on one of the bath buses and you'll be anywhere in the next 10 to 15 minutes.  Only negative thing was that the room was not well enough cleaned with some peanuts and chips from the last guest on the carpet,  but the rest of the cleaning was good.   For those into Soi 6 and its like, the hotel is girl friendly.

title: OUR GROUP  TRIP TO THAILAND
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review. I am very pleased to see that you enjoyed our hotel restaurant with both Thai and western dishes. Also our pool area and pool bar. As you write we have a shuttle bus for free all day long to the beach, beach road and the biggest shopping centers. I have informed our housekeeping about the cleaning comments and we will address this. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Good Hotel with Good Location
review: Thailand is the most wonderful experience for a group enjoyment . The country , cleanliness , scenic beauty and the welcoming spirit of the people is just too good. People are also very open minded and quite forward as well . Food quality is also very  in the INDIAN RESTAURANTS  whether it is PATTAYA or  BANGKOK .  So many things to do , for all age groups . Whether family  holiday or bachelor's activities or children the entire country is just superb .  We went to PATTAYA and BANGKOK including coral island , safari world , temple and GEM factory and RIVER CRUISE . Each and every experience turned out to be just memorable .

title: Good
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review for us. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. We have noted the very kind comments on our hotel product, cleanliness and staff service. We are also happy to see you loved Pattaya as destination as much as we do. Thank you again and we hope to see back here soon. Best regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: Nice hotel with great service !!
review: This hotel will not give you Grand Fee; Lobby is small in compare to any 4* category of Hotel. The entrance is like a street budgeted Lodge. Hotel Rooms are good, small good  Swimming pool. Breakfast is like any 3* Hotel category. Staff are courteous and happy to help you. No additional charges for Joiner.

title: awesome hotel, good rooms , spacious lobby, close by to the beach
review: rooms good, well maintained hotel, free  WIFI in lobby and rooms, have a balcony outside rooms.A 6-minute walk from shopping at Central Center Pattaya, this upscale resort hotel is 7 minutes' walk from the beach

title: Nice hotel with buffet breakfast
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. I am very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and have noted the positive comments about our rooms, WIFI and location. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Very decent
review: Checked in on 23rd March 2016. Spent two nights with my family. Though most of the times we were out of the hotel but we liked the hotel. The swimming pool area was much adorable my children enjoyed a lot. The buffet breakfast was also pretty nice with lots of choices.

title: Great customer service
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make this review. We very pleased to see that you enjoyed our hotel, pool area and breakfast. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Stayed 4 nights
review: A simple and comfortable room - all amenities worked fine and was very clean, WiFi wasn't too slow. Room service is good; although you have to walk down to the bar to get ice unless you want to pay 50THB.  The breakfast buffet was pretty standard in our experiences in Thailand.  Close to the beach - 2/3 minute walk; walking distance to restaurants and some nice bars.  No wow factor; definitely not a 4 star hotel.

title: Good Hotel with all Basic amenities and services
review: We have stayed with our Group and all was fine only thing the Hotel is strict about check in time which is 14:00 Hrs so if you arrive early either you have to wait or Pay the Penalty for early check in.  The Hotel have strict rules for Toiletries and Bath towel , The room is cleaned once a day and Towels are replaced only once a day if you need any extra Towel or Cleaning of room you have t pay acordingly which we disliked the most.  The Breakfast have regular menu everyday . A room stink a bit which i believe the cleaning person should take care . Rest all its in best location .

title: great property with great location with great price
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We have, as most hotels in the world, check out time 12.00 and check in 14.00. If we have guest who arrive earlier we try to arrange to the rooms are ready, but the days we are fully booked we sometimes  cannot arrange it right away. If any guests want to guarantee and early check in, this can be booked for an extra fee (but no penalty). We clean ones a day but never charge extra for extra requested cleaning or amenities. There is an extra charge if you want to take more than 1 pool towel per day. I have noted your comment about smell in the room but we have not found anything. Sometimes when the it is raining there can be a smell from the drainage outside. Thank you again, and I Remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Great holiday for the price
review: a very friendly staff specially a lady dont remember her name but she was smart enough to handle all your problems  ,a very good ambiance ,rooms excellent ,and last the best thing is its location superb 10 minutes walk where ever you wanna go to pattaya ,centrally located

title: Great time great hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We noted the positive comments about our reception staff, room product and location. Thank you again. Kind regards, Jonas Sjostedt

title: good hotel
review: FIrst time to Thailand and we chose a great hotel. Rooms clean, beds AMAZING, staff fantastic. Nit was a wonderful leader of her impeccable wait staff. Nothing is too much trouble all staff happy to assist. Good location central to markets and bars. Thanks Nit, Ao, M & Art you all gave us a wonderful holiday to remember. Your staff and hotel Jonas are a compliment to you. Many thanks we will be back :) Trevor & Leanne Jones.

title: Good Hotel
review: We stayed in a suit in March. The AC, fridge, tv and all other in room amenities work fine. Bathroom clean. Simple, comfortable room. The corridor to the rooms are very poorly lit. No safety issues though. Good location..3 minute walk to the beach. The breakfast spread needs improvement. Room service is good. Pool is nice for a dip.  There is no wow factor here but there is no problem either. I would not mind staying here again! And yes.. free wifi!

title: Great stay
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and have noted your great comments on our hotel product with room, breakfast, pool area and the free wifi. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Average Hotel, Not 4 star
review: I alongwith my friend stayed in this hotel in February for 3 nights. The hotel have great location , friendly staff, quick service, clean rooms. For us being vegetarians, breakfast is okay but need some improvement in terms of items. The hotel should add more variety of Veg. foods. The wifi in this hotel works extremly fast. I wish to come again in the hotel.

title: I love centara pattaya
review: Dear Valued Guest,  thank you for taking the time to make this review with all good comments. We have a vegetarian corner with 4 dishes daily. We also can take requests as we mention on the big black board at the restaurant entrance. We will check again how we can make this more visible. Your kind comments on our staff friendliness, service, rooms cleaning and location is well noted. Thank you again and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Good hotel to stay away from noise/madness
review: Just stayed at Centara Hotel for 8 nights,  Good points are =  Good location, Clean / spacious bedrooms. Breakfast OK!! DEFINITELY NOT 4 STAR!!! Pool area is dirty, not cleaned in my 8 night stay as the dirt & leaves where in same place every day? Be careful as very slippery on steps into kids pool, also broken grate in the kids pool. OK Hotel for a 3 star, possible 2 star in the furture if the standards i saw are not impoved.. Was not impressed at all : ( The prices at the pool bar are well over priced...

title: GOOD HOTEL NEAR BY BEACH ROAD
review: well with this hotel i have good and bad both experience. bad starting from when i checked in to the hotel the lady who was there in the reception don't know how to talk with guests and she was talking rude like i am staying free of cost there. and even i didn't got the room which is i wanted and i had to stay on twin bed room.and next thing which was not according to my expectation is food as i am Indian vegetarian there was very less option for me. well there is some good point also with this hotel. expect  one lady i found rest of staff very good and always with good smiley face. and the location of hotel also good near by beach road and many attraction and near by many Indian restaurants.

title: Second Time Here
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make this review. We have checked the record and found that you upon check in requested a room with pool view. We did inform you that only available was with Twin Bed. We are sorry that you thought our staff was rude, they did try to give you some options what was available. For the breakfast we have several Indian vegetarian dishes daily and also take requests. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: downtown hotel with comfortable stay
review: This is my second time to Thailand within the past year. I stayed at the Centara Pattaya Hotel last time and wanted to stay here again this time. My wife and enjoyed the area but we were only here 3 nights and it wasn't long enough so here I am again. This time I stayed for 9 nights. I had plenty of time to take in the sights. As far as the Centara hotel, I have really no complaints. The staff are always friendly and go out of their way to assist you. The amenities are everything that I need. They have a great restaurant and pool side bar. They also have a well equipped gym that I take advantage of. My departure pick up won't be coming till 2pm tomorrow and the front desk extended my checkout time from 12 noon to 2pm. In my books, that's great service. So if you're looking for a…

title: Excellent choice in Central Pattaya
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review with all great comments. I have noted you were very satisfied with our staff service, room product and amenities, restaurant, pool bar, gym and reception. I will share this with all our team. Thank you again, and we hope to see you back here a third time, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Vacations
review: it was nice stay at Centara Pattaya  during our visit . Early Check in was denied by the front office which makes us upset . we were able to get room after four hours of waiting in the lobby. however rooms are good , location was also fantastic. we enjoyed our stay ..

title: Book this hotel for your Pattaya stay!
review: The staff were exceptional.  Great sense of humour, fantastic English and nothing was too much trouble.  Room size & décor was perfect. Plenty of comfortable sunbeds & poor area staffed well.  Food & drink was very good value for a hotel.  We go to Pattaya every year and will definitely book this hotel again.

title: Good Hotel but poor sound proofing
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We have noted that you enjoyed the stay, liked our rooms,  pool area and our food & beverage. Thank you again and we are looking forward to welcome you back as our guests, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Centara Hotel Pattaya.
review: Stay : I stayed only one night.  Food : Tasted only breakfast. For vegans limited option.  Location : Perfect , walking distance from Alcazar , Pattaya beach etc.  Pros: 1. Location 2. Reception Staff (Lady was very helpful)  Cons: 1. My room had worst sound proofing. We had common door with adjacent room. 2. Lobby design/lighting/decoration was very dark 3. I had non smoking room but still room was smelling like some one already smoked there.  The lady tour operator at reception lobby had all costly deals. Better to book from tour operator having stalls at roadside.

title: Cosy and good location
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make this review. We will noted your comment about the noise from the neighbor room and the lightning and will look into what we can do to improve this. All our rooms are non smoking, please accept our apology if the previous guest has not followed this and it still smelled. We have special ozone machines for these issues and i will follow up so it is not missed again. We have also noted your satisfaction with our breakfast and hotel location. Thank you again and we hope to see you back here soon, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Awesome experience
review: Good location close to most things eg 7 elleven Bars,and shopping. The bathroom could of been cleaner mould on tiles. Breakfast good but to many people there at one time eating area to small. Only had one person cooking eggs,ommelets for all the people.

title: Good for the price
review: The hotel is at very good location very close to bars, pubs massage centres and alcazar, beach road is also very close. Rooms are of good size and comes with a balcony and Bath tub, you can't smoke in the room but in the balcony which makes it no difference for  smokers. Breakfast spread was OK but delicious and the live eggs counter lady was extremely pleasant.  All in all this is one of the best choice for what we pay, I recommend this hotel.

title: Beautiful and perfectly located hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We have noted your satisfaction with our location, room and breakfast with K Lek at our omelette station. All our rooms are smoke free, but ash trades are provided on the balcony. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: It's the people, it's the people, it's the people
review: Went to Pattaya with my friends on 25th of January 2016. We booked 2 deluxe room online, yet upgraded to suite and family room. This is my first visit to Thailand and I stayed at Bangkok fist but want to stay 1 night on Pattaya. I was very happy with how well spoken in English the staffs were. They were nice, helpful and accomodating.  Both the room were spacious (obviously), clean, balcony were large as well. The hotel was only walk distance (300 meter) from the beach. I can easily find place to eat since it was on the centre of Pattaya. Will definitely stay in this hotel next time I visit pattaya

title: Nice place to stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for making this review with all good comments. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed our staff service and communications skills. Our location is as you write with walking distance to most attractions around Pattaya. Thank you again and we hope to see you back with us soon, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Very nice this was my 5th stay
review: This hotel has got it absolutely right in the their human capital, they have a staff that will do anything to assist. From Nam and her staff on the front desk, to Suzi on the tour desk and not forgetting the amazing waiting staff and chefs, they are wonderful. I use this hotel 3 times a year and escort groups for cosmetic surgery, and my clients just love the hotel, its clean, its far enough from town not to be hassled but close enough to jump on a song-taews (baht taxi) for 10THB and be in the centre of the shopping and nighlife.

title: Read my full description A++++++++
review: Lobby is small but tidy with The Best Reception smile and hospitality ever seen.  Then let's go to the Room not large but clean tidy with balocony seeing the pool .Bathroom is more than excellent with both shower enclosure and bathtub also very clean.Then we go to swimming pool super clean and good service. Then fittness center ok with Sauna and Steam Free of charge. Let's go to The Restaurant super excellent with more than accepted breakfast buffet And when u enter the restaurant ask about Mrs.NIT super super super star excellent professional and very cute...

title: Good for a short stay
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review. I am very pleased to see that you were so satisfied with our product, cleanliness and our staff service. I will inform our reception and service staff with special thanks to K Nid. Thank you again and we hope to see you back with us again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: nice place to visit
review: Its a nice hotel for a short stay in Pattaya, so it was perfect for us. Breakfast was standard, the room was nice but we did have some cleanliness issues with the bedsheets which came with room which should not have happened in a 4 star hotel.  The reception staff were friendly but seemed to be understaffed, everything we did through reception took a very long time, including checkin.  Some guests at breakfast were not so hygienic, dropping food on the ground then putting it back on the buffet plate for some other unsuspecting guest to eat. I dont know but what the hotel can do about that, but it was abit unsettling.   The tour, bellboys, and restaurant staff were friendly and helpful.  We didnt use the pool but it seemed adequate.  We didnt book a room with a view, but still…

title: Very nice stay and facilities
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make this review. We have noted your comments about the cleaning and reception and have addressed this with the teams. Regarding the breakfast incident, We cannot always control every guests manner and hygienic thinking, but we try to keep the policy and standards. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We are very pleased to see you enjoyed our staff friendliness and the room condition and standards. Thank you again and we hope to see you back with us in the nearby future, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Great for all
review: To refresh  pattaya is very cool to visit   The beach on Soai one very good   Price wise Pattaya is cheap and you get value of money   Central Mall Food center has variety   You can also visit lot of islands around    walking street has its own charm    During water festival  the whole town is full of fun and     entertainment

title: Unlimited enjoyment
review: Very nice place to stay in the pattaya, we recently dtay here for been such a good holiday we r 8 but really full of enjoyment n the rooms are A one class, Hotel management was very very good n the pool side bar was very nice missing those days which spend in this hotel

title: Excellent Jewel!!!
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for making this review with all good comments. I am very pleased to see that you enjoyed the room standards, pool side bar and our services. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: good sauna and steam clean bedding
review: Great overall stay. I stayed in room 230. No complaints at all. Quiet and very confy. Breakfast is great too! Hotel staff very helpful. Special thanks to hotel staff AO, Kwan and Kat! Best customer service ever. Short walk to the beach. Close to 7Eleven, food, bars, etc. Cheap transport close by. Will stay again!

title: Great value for money
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for this review with all kind comments. I am very pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay and specially the breakfast, location, staff service. I will inform K Kwan and K Kat the great feed back, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Enjoyable stay at Centara Pattaya
review: nice roomy room .. immaculate bedding.. great shower ... below average breakfast.. fruit boring and repetitive.  not bad cup of tea....rocky tables in restaurant.... VERY NOISY INDUSTRIAL MUSAK in breakfast time ..... far too noisy..and LOUD.  People SMOKING AROUND THE POOL   NOT GOOD ....  STAFf  GOOD......

title: Lovely clean hotel
review: I stayed here in july after booking with Hayes and Jarvis, Very impressed with friendly staff and could not fault how clean the rooms were, totally immaculate.  Large comfortable king/double bed with soft white linen changed every day.  Evenings were quiet even though near the Thai second road over from Soi 6  I bought a guest to stay and hotel charged no joiner fee  Breakfast many choices of buffet, American, Thai, Fruits,yougurts etc, the only issue was the separate Muslim breafast area, this caused a little over crowding in the main breakfast room, also a large queue for eggs, where some people did not understand  how to queue correctly without pushing in.  Overall a great welcome, lovely stay a place i hope to use again soon

title: Centara Pattaya
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review with all positive comments. I have noted that you were very satisfied with our rooms, cleaning and breakfast. Thank you again and we hope to see you back here in the near future, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Ok but not for us
review: Good value for money, centrally located, good facilities (Restaurant, Swimming pool, Gym, Sauna and Steam room) and very friendly welcoming staff, who really appreciate guests trying to speak a little Thai. Good way to get even more smiles in Thailand (if that is possible). Thank you to all the wonderful staff (especially Kun Patty in reception).

title: Second visit
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review and give all the good feed back, we appreciate this a lot! I have noticed that you liked our facilities and specially our staff services. I have shared your kind compliments to our team and also K Patty in our Front Office. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: An all round great stay and will be returning
review: We stayed here for 6 nights in November The hotel and room were fine but there were too many large groups of men. The last morning when we went for breakfast it as more like a football match with these large groups of men pushing and jostling for the toaster then the egg station Luckily the lady making the eggs told them I was first or I may have been still there now! Just because you are on holiday it doesn't mean you have to leave your manners at home! For us this hotel was in the wrong location but the main fault is the buses full of men

title: Gone Downhill Somewhat
review: Stayed here last year and all was well. HOWEVER, on this visit, things have gone downhill!   Call me fussy, but my ideal holiday is where my bedding is changed everyday, on odd occasions every other day. I was expecting the linen changed after the second nights use, but came back to find that all the maid had done was to top and tail the sheet and turn the duvet over! (I had secretly hidden a tiny dot on inside of sheet and duvet!) had to ask reception to get maid to change linen. After this, to ensure they were changed, I stripped the bed and left dirty sheets on floor. On our second to last day, room hadn't been serviced by 5:00pm, so grabbed clean sheets and towels from maid and made bed myself! The room was left dirty on several days, as marks on floor hadn't been removed.…

title: not for me
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for making this review and bringing your Housekeeping comments to our attention. We are sorry to see that we could not met your expectation in this area, this time. We normally change the linen every second day, same as most hotels in this category, same as we inform about in the directory. We do take request for this in case someone want to have every day. We also have an environment card by the bed table that guests can put on the bed in case they prefer linen not be changed that day. We have a record in the log book, you put this one up one day. Also that you hand your towels in the bathroom, meaning no change requested. Also the Room maids does not enter the room in case the "Do Not disturb" sign is pressed. As per arrival information and in our Guest directory we ask the guests to inform our front office in case there is any specif time the guest want to have the room cleaned so we can make the schedule accordingly. In our log books we do not have any records that you been in contact with us about any of these comments. Rest assure our standard are set to be to met all expectation on this area and we apologize if we have not been able to this time. We have addressed all with the concerned staff and we hope you give us a chance on your next visit to show our improvements. Your kind comments on our Food&Beverage staff and service is noted. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Good stay in Pattaya
review: I had booked the centara on line but was disappointed when I arrived it was clean and the staff were very nice, and I had stayed at centara in Phuket and really enjoyed it ,but pattaya had a very small pool it looked squeezed in,the room was nice but the whole place had the feel of a hostel so I went elswhere

title: accomodation for 2 week golfing holiday
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your feedback on your last stay. We are sorry we did met your expectation this time. Centara Hotels & Resorts have several different brands where example Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket is our 5 star product, with several pool areas, lazy river and so on. The pool we have in our hotel is the same size we mention both on web pages and all information, 192M2. I see you were satisfied with the cleaning and staff service which i will inform all concerned. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Shady Hotel - not recommended for families!
review: Hello,  I stayed in Centara Pattaya Hotel last week for 3 nights, This is a good property at good location but not upto my satisfactory level, Although i enjoyed my stay here but the long list of "Linen Charges" and very basic level of housekeeping service made me not so impressed.   Housekeeping was not done on time whenever requested, Toiletries were not properly given every time we need to call the housekeeping and ask them for it. We have given room 808 which is on top of the building A, it was nice the view from the mirror was awesome.  About the breakfast,  I should rate this hotel 5 out of 5.. It has a nice breakfast menu where in you can get Indian breakfast (Poha/Paratha) added to normal English breakfast.   The staff at restaurant/pool area is not so friendly and…

title: Pleasant Holiday
review: I have stayed at the Centara Hotel, Pattaya for the past 12 night's. The staff are very courteous, well mannered and very helpful. Would bend over backwards to make your stay comfortable. Cleaning staff excellent and bar staff excellent also. Highly recommend.

title: A very pleasant stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review and share all your good experiences during your stay. We are very happy and pleased to see that all your expectations were met and we will share this with all our staff.  Best regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: Nice hotel good location
review: we stayed for 3 days recently at the centara pattaya hotel.. and had a very pleasant experience. lovely cosy spacious room, good location, very friendly staff (we didn't have to tell them that we were 3 ppl - they kept an extra towel ion their own).  the front desk was very helpful - esp Mr. Top who guided us well.  also, if you are an Indian, do visit Crown of India close by - awesome indian food. they have a shuttle to the beach / mall which was also quite useful.  would definitely recommend this place for staying in pattaya.

title: Very good holiday
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make this review. I am very pleased to see your good comments about our room product and staff service and will share this with all concerned! Most Family Studio have a Bunk bed for the kids, but it can also be a sofa bed in case anyone request. Our Complimentary shuttle are going every half an hour or ever hour all day long. Thank you again, we hope to see you back with us, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Great location, friendly staff
