review: Stayed at this hotel for 2 weeks as part of a group of 6. The hotel is well located for central pattaya. The rooms were nice and clean and the food fine. The pool area is smaller than it looks on the photographs but sufficient for purpose. The only slight winge was several fellow guests decided it was good to swim in jeans and underwear, despite signs up around the pool area. Luckily the manager was around and sorted the problem there and then. The staff were excellent and very helpful. Having travelled extensively I would recommend staying at this hotel, and may even return myself next year!

title: " Great location with a friendly excellent staff"
review: The Hotel has a super location. Working staff is very kind and helpful. Food and drinks are super good. Pool and the gym is just the correct size for the Hotel and its been maintained very well. I truly recommend this Hotel for all types of travellers.

title: Arrogant & Rude Staff,  Poor Customer Service
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review to us. I am very pleased to see that you enjoyed our rooms, facilities, food&drink and our staff service. I will share with all concerned. Thank you again and we hope to see back here soon, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Inconstant but with a great location!
review: Stay away from this hotel.  Staff is Rude and I think they have the word " Service " and "Humility" in their dictionary.   RIght from check-in till we checked out two days later - it was one bad/terrible  experience after another.   I am asking my travel agent not to refer this hotel to any one.

title: Awful, like a brothel not a 4 star hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make this review. I have investigated with our teams about your unsatisfied experience and I have called your tour guide you had here in Pattaya to try get more details as we dont have any record that you have contacted us.  Your group arrived in two minivans and your tour guide was in the second one that arrived a bit later than yours. Your Tour guides had your vouchers and confirmation that we needed to be able to check in, this is the reason why we could not check you in right away when you arrived. We are very sorry that you experienced our staff as rude and not service minded. In our record the only incident we have was when our staff around the pool area informed some guests that they needed swimming suite and not their underwear to swim in the pool, which we also have information boards and signage about. Thank you again for you comments, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Much much better..the staff are excellent.
review: The hotel has a great location as its right smack in the middle of everything. The people who work there are also amazing, so sweet & caring. The service is indeed acceptable.  The food was good as were the drinks.   The hotel caters to a large Indian clientele due to the mid range price range, nice guys, but not always in sync the Thai culture as wanting to swim in the hotel pool in dirty boxer shorts because "loom" not ready or washing your jeans in the hotel pool after dark. Also haggling at the pool bar price " why beer cost double price 7 / 11? " ( overheads my friend) These experiences impacts your overall impression.   The basic rooms are very basic, so much so, its not considered very comfy. They show considerable wear & tear despite not being that old.   The pool is…

title: staying 0n october 2015 and my exprience
review: Pattaya was my second destination after Bangkok. Although the hotels in Pattaya are not as good as Bangkok's but as my first experience in that hotel, I can mention the below points which encourages me to choose this Hotel again: 1-Although it was before 2 p.m, but as soon as I arrived the receptions part did their best for check-in of the room as soon as possible. So after a short time my room was delivered. 2- The whole staff were friendly and patient to answer my questions. 3- The break-down of my cell phone due to high percentage of sea humidity was really terrible for me.Although I lost my connection to my family in Iran but a nice lady named "Phatsaramon" lent me her own new cell phone during my settlement and helped me change the phone language to English, so I could make…

title: We enjoyed our stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for this review and all good feed back! In case we have room available we always try to give when our guest arrive. I am very pleased to see that you were very satisfied with our staff service and also the room and facilities. I have noted the comment about the rooms service and have discussed with the team. Thank you again for this review and we hope to see you back here with us in the future, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Never again
review: We stayed here for two nights. The price was cheap, but the room, service and food were great. Staff were very helpful and cheerful. We enjoyed the pool bar a lot. The hotel was very clean. Do not compare it with five star as when the time you booked it, the price already told you it's only up to four stars.  we enjoyed a lot during our stay. The Breakfast was good too. Pool was a bit small, but there weren't many people swimming, so we enjoyed it a lot. We joined the tour trips via the hotel agency. Price was reasonable. I would recommend this hotel to my friends.

title: Loved it hidden away oasis
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review with all good comments. I believe we are a great value for money hotel and in case there is guests who request 5 star we recommend our Centara Grand hotels. Your kind comments about our room and staff service is well noted and we hope to have the chance to welcome you back with us, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Amazing staff and service
review: As we entered the hotel we knew it wasn't up to standard. Our room wasn't ready we waited nearly 3 hours I don't know what for as the room was not clean the headboard was disgusting the bathroom walls floor and toilet needed bleaching I informed reception who did nothing ..I spoke to lady in the corridor and showed her the state of the room she agreed to put it right which she did immediately. .pity the suits in reception don't have the same work ethic

title: Stay & location
review: It is located near the beach & the market.Quickly reach all the activities of the city. The rates are reasonable/Food quality is good. Staff is cordial. Rooms are spacious & well maintained. All type of food even for vegetarian is available

title: Do not book room at this hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest , Thank you for your taking the time to make this review. Based on your comments both here and also upon your check out we are surprised that you rated us with 1 point only as we understood that you were satisfied with us. Kind regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: Bad service
review: I would tell everyone not to book this hotel unless they are looking to be disappointed . We arrived at the hotel by car having travelled overnight from London only to find there  was excrement on the toilet wall as the room had not been cleaned properly . Added to this was filthy head boards  and the remains of semen on the wall !  Unsurprisingly  we moved room . Though the issues of cleanliness of the room was an issue for us a far greater issue is the Indian clientele that predominates at the hotel . The hotel is predominantly been used  male indian tour groups . They take over the lobby of the hotel  and push and shove there   way around the fellow hotel guests pretty much making their life a misery. they do not have any normal manners .  Do not have breakfast before 9 am .…

title: Value for money
review: Dear Valued Guests,  Thank you bringing these comments to our attention. The room you first was given was not cleaned as per standard and this we apologize for. I know that our Duty Manager, Assistant Front Office Manager and also Sales Executive all were in contact you to fast change the room for you and apologize to you and your brother. In our records you were satisfied with your new room that you were given and this you also confirmed to our Assistant Front Office manager who came to see you directly after to ensure you were ok with the new room, with a tropical fruit plate and apology. We are sorry to hear that the Indian group staying there during your visit was disturbing you. Rest assure we are asking all guest, groups or individuals to follow the hotel policies and not to disturb others and we have informed the tour leader for this group that some of the behaviors was not ok. We are hosting guests from all over the world and have families, couples, singles and groups, with many returning visits. We are sorry we could not met your expectation this time but hope we will have the chance to welcome you back another time, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: England boys on a Thailand holiday
review: Its a new hotel, i am regular to Centera chain and like it but was not satisfied with this hotel,water supply to our floor had problem in morning and despite requesting hotel staff for room change they took 2 hours for that, staff is non courteous.on the positive side is the pool and bar

title: Better Than Expected by the Outside Appearance
review: This is my wife's and my first time in Pattaya Thailand. We were booked at the Centara Pattaya Hotel. When we arrived by shuttle bus we actually thought we were checking into the seedy end of town. The streets were narrow (just like back allies) and when we pulled up to the hotel we were surprised by the location. When we went to the front desk to check in we were pleasantly greeted by the hotel staff who were more than willing to help and serve us. When we checked into the room it was actually very nice. We were on the 8th floor over looking the pool. Note: there are only 8 floors to this hotel. Once we settled in we went to the hotel restaurant and had lunch. Very good food. The rooms included free breakfast buffet. They have a fitness center that is well equipped and a pool…

title: A week away
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for staying with us and write a good review and comment. Your very kind comments are much appreciated and will be relayed to the team. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and happy with our room, services and facilities as per your positive ratings. Once again thank you for your feedback and We look forward to welcome you back in the near further.   Sincerely yours,  The Management

title: Not great
review: Stayed for 7 nights, hotel comfortable, clean and staff very efficent, pool on the small size but always had a sunbed when required, only downside was I found the Lobby Bar to be quite un-inviting, but room standard hotel room so sufficent for a weeks stay overall a good hotel for the price paid.

title: Best hotel in Pattaya. You'd be mental not to stay!
review: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you very much for taking your time to write a good review with nice feedback to our staff and our service. Your kind compliments will be passed on to our team and this will certainly motivate them to keep up the good work. We hope that we will have another opportunity to welcome you back in the near further.   Sincerely yours,   The Management

title: wonderful hotel with mind blowing facilities
review: Location is near to the hot spots. Too much tour groups in the hotel, resulting in loud and grouchy people on the property. If you are travelling with kids then avoid this place. Food ordered in the room was okay. When booking from booking.com booked a suite but instead got a connected double room. Hotel upkeep is generally lacking. Front desk staff helpful.

title: Nice and comfortable
review: I stayed two nights with group 39 members. Glad to have my choice of breakfast. Rooms were designed very smartly. Rooms are at distance from corridor disturbances and balcony give you a sit out area, in case you wanna smoke. Friendly staff. Almost block away from beach. Great stay.

title: Amazing
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review with all the good comments. I am very pleased and happy to see that you enjoyed our Vegetarian corner and specialties. We hope we have the chance to welcome you back another time again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: What a great hotel!
review: As I write this I am currently sitting on my balcony at the centara looking at the amazing view of the sea, we are heading home tomorrow and are sorry to be leaving, the hotel is situated right in the centre of pattaya but still very quiet and tranquil, hotel, grounds, pool and rooms are immaculate. Staff amazing especially M the pool bar guy and susi and her team on the excursion desk. I cannot fault this place or stress enough how good it's here. We will return to pattaya and the centara.

title: Great stay
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for this review. I am very pleased to see that you enjoyed our hotel service and product so much. I will share it will all concerned and specially Khun M who is running our popular Pool bar. Thank you again and we hope to see you back here soon, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: We love Centara!!
review: Well what can I say, this is by far the best holiday I have been on! The hotel is beautiful, in a great location, the staff can't do enough for the guests and the food was to die for! I will be returning next year. Thanks to all the staff at centara pattaya hotel for making our stay so special

title: great hotel to stay
review: great hotel to stay, nice and clear room and center of the pattaya you can roam around by walking to get good stuff to buy, food is ok if you're vegetarian will be little bit trouble for you else you will enjoy ...

title: Excellent hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We have a separate vegetarian corner with rotating dishes daily. Further more there is a separate side by the omelette station, a salads bar and pastry corner also available. I believe we offer enough dishes but will look into this again.  Kind regards, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Excellent hotel with a few drawbacks.
review: Very nice  beautiful pool, cozy room, friendly staff and balcony with a pretty view. That being said, if you are looking for a veg breakfast option, you would probably be starving. The location is great for shopping, massages, etc. One can hop on the tuk tuk passing by on the one way street. A new and helpful development is a free shuttle on a hotel tuk tuk to the main Central Festival Shopping centre in Beach Street

title: overall a very good hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed our product and service. I have noted your comments about no vegetarian food, same as the previous review from your friends. We do have an vegetarian corner with rotated dishes. I believe you must have missed out on this during your visit as it is located under building B, around 10 meters from our fresh egg station. We are sorry for this inconvenience and hope to see you back here on your next visit, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Small but personable hotel
review: Very nice property, beautiful pool, cozy room, friendly staff and balcony with a pretty view. That being said, if you are looking for a veg breakfast option, you would probably be starving. They have absolutely nothing (edible) for veg breakfast option though their non-veg breakfast spread looked splendid and varied. Such discrimination is highly unexpected from a hotel of this category. We had breakfast outside afterwards :( For non-veg category (non-halal), the place is quite good.

title: Very Nice Hotel
review: A hotel near pattaya beach and with good facilities. Nice Rooms and good room services. Pool side tables for breakfast, lunch and dinner. They offer Veg Breakfast keeping in mind that many people do not wish to eat anything where pork is served. Very Thoughtful! Great Sea view from the balcony.. Will surely stay if I ever visit pattaya again.

title: Good value good location
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very happy to see that you enjoyed our product and service and specially our breakfast with the vegetarian selection. Thank you again and we hope to see you back here with us soon, and I remain,  Sincerely yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: We'll Be Back
review: Friendly staff and we all had a pleasant stay. Highly recommend Family Studio if you are traveling with kids as there a bulk bed with separate door and closet. Ideal for couple with 2 kids. Housekeeping could have been more attentive to replace towels and complimentary bottles of drinking water.

title: Review
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for making this review. We are very happy to see that you liked our hotel and Family Studio room type. Our housekeeping are informed about the towels and water comments. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Really helpful staff
review: This property has it all. Relaxing Pool Area; Professional and always happy Staff; Location; Spacious and Clean Rooms.  We stayed in a 1brm Suite and it was huge.  We holidayed with 3 other people and had them over for dinner (room service) there was plenty of space.  Location: its far enough from the hussle and bussle but also close enough to be at Walking Street within 5-10mins (with a Baht Bus) There is a massage place across the walkway - we visited there every day. Most guests were polite but we encountered some that were not. I witnessed a guest being rude to a staff member however, she handled the situation with professionalism - all with a smile on her face. The biggest asset this property has: its staff.   The Manager, Jonas, introduced himself and whenever he saw us…

title: Fantastic hotel !
review: It start when you just arrive the service people run to take from you the cases and all the service team allways smile to you and help you.. the rooms are great and the pool too.. the prices of the room service are cheap

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review. We are very happy to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and liked our services and thought our prices on food was value for money. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Nice Hotel and Friendly staff
review: This hotel is great. I stayed here with some friends for five nights during New Year's 2015 and we had an amazing time. The breakfast buffet is excellent. The location is convenient- the beach is only a five minute walk. I would highly recommend staying here.

title: Good hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for making this review for us, we really appreciate it! We now also have a beach shuttle all day long from the hotel to Soi Bukao, Beach Road, Beach, Central Festivale shopping center, Tops Supermarket and Big C. We hope to see you back here soon again! Best regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: Fantastic second visit
review: I been stayed in this hotel for 2 weeks with my friend ,we really really love this hotel ,nice swimming pool and restaurant,room very nice,room service good,staff at the front desk team they very nice to us ,however we will come back again next year ,Thank you for your of you, Kevin & Barry

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Visited Thailand for the first time and staed at this hotel in Pattaya. The staff were excellent and very helpful. The rooms were cleaned every day and there were fresh towels every day too. The food was also excellent with a different Chefs Special every day. Wifi available in the rooms as well as the reception. Would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Pattaya.

title: Highly recommeded
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review. I am very pleased to see that you enjoyed our services in housekeeping, kitchen and front office. Thank you again and we hope to see back here soon again, and I remain,  Sincerely yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Exceptional service
review: Located just five minutes from Beach Road it’s a perfect location for those who prefer to be away from the noise of the central Walking Street area. We would regularly walk from the hotel to Walking Street taking in the sights and atmosphere, however a 10 baht 5 minute local taxi ride maybe be a better choice for some . The hotel room was clean and spacious complete with fridge, kettle and balcony (overlooking pool). Staff were always friendly and the concierge allowed me to use their printer to print off my next hotel booking voucher. No complaints, good value for money as long as you are not looking for sea view. Although we didnt use the pool, I did feel it was a bit small but as we were there in low season, this was not a problem. We didn't take the breakfast but it looked…

title: Absolutely amazing!
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to make this review with all nice feedback and good comments. We provide a free of charge shuttle, all day long, with stop to the Soi Bukaw, beach road, beach, Central Festival, Tops Supermarket and Big C. Our hotel location is in Central of Pattaya and around 9 minutes walking to the beach. We dont have any rooms you can book with sea view, even if the ones on the 8 floor have some sea view. Thank you again for the nice comments, I have shared with our Front Office team. Best regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: Exceptional  Service by Rose and Joyti
review: Hey,One of the Best clean neat and Beautiful Hotel in Pattaya. Great food, Ambiance.great service.Staff was very kind.Front office helped us to Check in faster.Room was spacious and clean.well maintained Hote.lThanks to the whole Team

title: Average hotel, centrally located
review: Stayed for one week. Hotel close to "everything" you need or look for in Pattaya. Very good food in street restaurant just down the road on left hand side on beach road. Hotel staff polite and helpful, special thanks to receptionist Rose who were especially helpful and surprised us by speaking fluent Norwegian. Breakfast buffet would benefit from more variety, and starting to clear food and cold drinks from buffet 15 minutes before closing show lack of understanding for customers that choose to come late to breakfast on their vacation. Staff responsible for the pool area need to be much firmer in upholding the pool regulations. As some tourists comes by the busloads it is not nice to witness from the sun bed men jumping in the pool, straight of the bus, wearing only underwear,…

title: Great value hotel close to beach road
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review. I will address the pool rules policy with our staff again. We do have signs and information to all guests that it is not allowed to swim in their underwear, to shower before they enter the pool and that they should use swimming wear/dress. We have a breakfast collection for all markets and nationalities, such as Western, Chinese, Indian and Vegetarian, we try to rotate some dishes depending on the nationalities in-house. We also have a signage by the restaurant entrance now, asking our guests to inform us in case they have any special request for the breakfast. I am sorry to hear that the breakfast was closed earlier and this should not happen. I am very pleased to see the good feedback on K Rose and our Housekeeping team, i will share this on our staff board. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Centara Pattaya Hotel is the place to stay
review: 2nd time i have stayed at this hotel,2min walk to beach rd and beside soi 6 Great pool with bar and restaurant with promotions everyday Also have a new 7/11 across the road Staff are great and late check out means you can rest or shower before a late flight Chris thompson

title: Perfect
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your second visit, we really appreciate that you take the time to make this review for us with all great comments. We are very pleased to see that your stay was to your satisfaction again and that you were so happy with our services. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Not pleasant
review: Centara Pattaya Hotel!! WOW!! Definitely one of the best hotels I've ever stayed in. Centara is amazing and luxurious hotel. Their facilities are world class and more importantly their friendly staff always put a smile on your face :) Thank you for the wonderful stay and looking forward to coming back. Also, a big thank you to Rose for always making me feel at home ;)

title: Near to Beach
review: Hotel staff are very polite and helpful... Well would like d property and its well maintained by d staff.... 👍👍for hygienic and clean. Rooms r clean and well maintained... WIFI is working very powerful... S dis hotel is near to beach so it's easy to operate frm here.... Market and malls are easily accessible 4m dis place...  Even Jain Indian restaurant are near from dis hotel... Breakfast is good.... 7/11 store is just near to hotel so it's bcum easy if wnt to buy sumthng local stuff.... Situated near to beach so definitely would like to extend 1 ngt bt its houseful... Next time definitely would stay here 4 more days...  Thanks to staff for making our stay memorable and relaxing.... Would recommend to fly and frnds...

title: Spacious!
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review and give us all good feedback. I am very happy and proud to read you comments about our staff service and our product. We did upgrade our WIFI system not so long ago and it is now working without any problems. I will inform our Housekeepers about your comments, which will make them very happy. Thank you again and we hope to see you back here with us soon again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Vacation
review: Spacious rooms with well maintained interiors. Value for money. Centrally located. With friendly staff. But very few choices of Indian food.. Choose rooms with the pool view, away from elevators. Few of the receptionists didn't understand English..

title: Pleasant stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank for this good review and comments. I believe all our Front Office staff can communicate in English, some fluent and some not. I am very pleased to see you liked our room, standard and services. Thank you again and we hope to see you back here with us again soon, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: PERFECT HOTEL WITH EXCELLENT STAFF!
review: Amazing hotel in its class, great staff, good food . We ordered Thai food and it rocked. We took family room and it was spacious, clean and perfect. The only hitch was the room service, we ordered beer at 5 pm and got a response that they are short of staff and it will take another 20 mins to serve ! I can understand that being low season staff must be on leaves ! No worries , the hotel rocks , thank you guys for making our holiday awesome .

title: nice stay
review: Hotel is close to beach so you have all you want, I love to stay near by beach where we have easy access - the hotel has lot many facilities for indoor relaxation - staff is very friendly and polite and thumbs up for their services - they will take some time to understand you English but their readiness to service you is always appreciated.

title: still a fantastic hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for making this review with all good comments!  As you mention we are located around 9 minutes walking to the beach. We also offer a free of charge shuttle, all day long, to the beach, beach road, Central Festival shopping center and some other attractions, in case our guests prefer. We have weekly English training and we have always 24 hours English speaking staff available in the reception that can be contacted at any times. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Small Hotel, Very Good Service
review: just back after spending seven nights in this hotel my fourth visit what can i say it is first class read some negative reviews about this hotel all i can say is these people must be very hard to please. The rooms large and cleaned to a high standard every day. The food used the bar food most days and it was excellent and good value also drinks at the pool bar were great the pool was great and always CLEAN the music was fine and not to LOUD reception staff were first class special mention to Patty who was always helping us and is a great asset to the hotel also M on the pool bar who always had a smile please give the pool bar guy and the maids a little tip each day as they work really hard and deserve it. I had sent a e-mail in advance asking for the same room as my previous…

title: A very comfortable hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review with all great comments. I am very happy and pleased to see that we again could met your expectations. I will share the positive comments with all concerned departments and also our staff mentioned, Khum Patty and Khun M. Please mail us again before next visit so we can prepare accordingly. Thank you again and we hope to see you soon! Best regards, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Good and nice hotel
review: I have visited Pattaya for a Cycling Event on June 12-14, 2015. This time I was with my baby. I had informed hotel early for the Baby Cot. When I arrived, I surprised for the hotel's compliment baby amenities. There are a Baby cot, Bath tube for baby, and the bottle steriliser. That was very good service offered more than I expected. I want you to keep this good matter. For the breakfast was good. Swimming Pool quite small and not private. Staff are helpful.  Thanks and will c u again...

title: Never again!!!
review: Most of the staff speak little or no English and are rude and arrogant! The managers that wear the white shirts with the stripes are the only people there who seem to care and want to help you. They couldn't order us a taxi from the hotel for some reason which makes no sense whatsoever. Cleaners were rubbish, food was rubbish and pool area was so small it might aswell not be there. Do not stay here.

title: Good rooms but THE WORST SERVICE
review: Dear Moynese,  You and your 3 friends had ordered your transportation with your agent. You came to our reception and wanted us to call them as they were late and you had to go the airport. They did not pick on the number you gave us. You wanted us to book a new taxi, via our Tour desk counter, and you wanted the taxi to come directly which was not possible. We could get one within 10 minutes. During those 10 minutes you wanted our bell man to catch a taxi for you by the street. This we also tried for you. When your transportation came (very late) you left directly and we had to pay for the new taxi you booked. We are sorry you left with stressed and upset but  I dont agree with your comments. You are welcome to contact me for any further communication, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Okay, but not a highlight
review: I visited pattaya and stayed in centara pattaya from 6-8th June 2015.the rooms was good and maintained well but the services was below par and the staffs were too arrogant.I asked for extra tea packets early in the morning as I was going to check out in the morning but he was not ready to listen and simply said that it was their company rules that they would provide only after 10am. This was not the only problem they are not ready to provide extra towels also.I wish they were quite flexible

title: what a "city" hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review and bringing this to our attention. We provide extra tea or towel amenities on request. Please accept our apology for not receiving and contact me direct for your next visit, so i can arrange something for you, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Lovely hotel
review: A group of friends and myself stayed at the Centara for a week in early May. The accommodation was of a good standard being clean rooms a good size and well maintained. We were lucky enough to have ground floor rooms with access to the pool. There was a nice pool with a bar attached, this however had limited hours of use, again the gym was the same. Shame because good facilities. The food, especially breakfast, was somewhat dissapointing. Having travelled a number of times in Thailand, I would say the breakfast in particular was medioca. The booking service closed early when I wanted to arrange transport,, even though staff still there, there was no offer to provide any service. The front desk staff and the house keeping staff were very good, always smiling, polite and ready to…

title: Mehdi from iran
review: I love patty & mod.She's very friendly and helpful nice girl.  Hotel very good and near the beach easy to go to shopping.I will back to this hotel and i will tell our family, my friends to come here.See you soonnnn centara pattaya.

title: close to center and great rooms
review: Dear Madhimod,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review and with these great feed back. I am very pleased to see you was so satisfied with our Front Office staff and i have shared this on our staff board. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: centara pattaya
review: We have stayed here twice because the suites are very nice and spacious. They have a separate room for the kids with bunk beds and a sofabed so sleep quality is good for the adults. Bathroom is disappointing, breakfast is average for Thailand standards. Internet service is terrible. Pool bar is fantastic.

title: Not Per Expectations !
review: Dear Nihal C,  Thank you for your review and comments. We just invested in a new WIFI system and equipment and its been on test now for 10 days. I have checked the connection and speed in the room where you stay and it is working now after we have restarted it. If you have the same issue on your next visit, kindly inform our 24 hour reception who can assist you right away. Thank you again for choosing our hotel on your stay, we hope to see you and your family again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Centara hotel
review: Hotel very clean, beds and towels changed daily. Breakfast good, plenty choices. Restaurant ok but slow to serve. Staff friendly and attentive. No topless sunbathing although does not say on pool rules. Mini bar in room costs except for glass bottles of water, 2 per day. Pool small and limited sun beds Area very sleazy, not really a family area, too much sexual innuendo everywhere. Costs £1 upwards for a beer or soft drink. eating out about £5-10.

title: Wow! Best room yet!
review: Travelled here on a week holiday with my 2 boys and have to say this is one of the best rooms we have ever stayed in! We upgraded to the penthouse suite on the top floor and all I can say is WOW! This totally made our holiday aswell as the exceptional service, brilliant pool areas and gorgeous restaurants and bars! One of the best trips we have had! Hope to return some day x

title: Amazing Time With Friends
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking time to write this review with all great comments!  I am very pleased to see that you enjoyed our hotel product, services and bar/restaurant. Yes our One Bed Room Suite, up to 60m2, are a great value for money. Thank you again and I hope to see you back here with us soon again. Best regards, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Close to beach road
review: We the gang of 8 friends stayed in this hotel for 4 days. The hotel is just superb. Very good location and service. staff is quite good and attentive to your need. Highly recommended for stay in Pattaya. Only disadvantage is that it is little far from Pattaya night life which is fine if you are also looking for quite place

title: Missing Thailand
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments and review. We are happy to see that you and your friends enjoyed your stay with us. We are located in the central Pattaya and have all restaurants, bars, entertainment just around us. Walking street is around 10 min away with local taxi (Tuk tuk). Thank you again! Best regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: My First Visit
review: I booked this hotel after the travel guy said it was close to walking street. Not really it was about a 30 minute walk but was close to beach road(about 5 mins down soi 6). No smoking in the room but could smoke on the balcony and an ashtray can be requested from room service(prompt service). Room was large with a king sized bed and bath and shower option in the spacious bathroom. Fair amount of storage space. Complimentary water, tea and coffee facilities. 7 eleven close by and a laundry and bar/pub serving food. Buffet breakfast was plentiful and varied enough to satisfy all tastes. Pool looked nice but spent enough time wet due to Songkran without swimming. Would look at staying again the only issue is the walking distance to Walking street

title: My second stay, just as great as the first
review: I stayed here between 13th and 23rd of April. Upon arrival was informed that due air con issues we were going to be moved, just for the one night, to their sister hotel Centara Nova Hotel and Spa. These things happen so I agreed. Upon checking out the following day I came across a member of staff called ''Shirley'' who quite frankly I found to be a little bit on the rude/curt side. This was my only bad experience. Once back at the Centara I felt at home. Due to the inconvenience suffered I was offered a free upgrade and gladly accepted. A lot of staff recognised me and were very welcoming. I want to take this opportunity to thank Maria. She is a true asset to this hotel. Always smiling, very professional and most helpful. ''Jap'' the bell boy and ''Chalee'' the security guy - I…

title: Awesome...
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to give us this review and all the comments. We will talk with all concerned person about your comment in order to improve ourselves. Thank you again for sharing and see you in October! Best regards, Jonas Sjostedt

title: One of the cleanest friendliest hotels in Pattaya
review: Pool bar xellent ...room ,bathroom ,n balcony very good ...staff superb....in affordable price ..😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😉😉😉😊😍😍😍😍😜😜😝😝😝😆😆😆😆😝😝😝😝☺️☺️☺️😛😛😛😛😄😄😃😃😃😝😝😘😘😘😘😘😘😘😘😘😘😘😝😝😝😝😍😍😍😍

title: Pleasant stay
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for giving us this good review and comments. We hope to have you back to here with us soon again.  Best regards, Jonas Sjostedt

title: excellent staff in every department
review: having just returned from 10 day staying this hotel I cannot fault the staff the maid service or the food  all were excellent. my only criticism would be mind your ankles on the corner of the beds I was forever catching mine.I liked it so much here I have booked another two weeks later in the year

title: All staff very friendly and helpful,
review: just arrived back from 10 nights at the Centara. Lovely clean hotel where ALL the staff were friendly and helpful. my husband has mobility problems and staff went out of their way to assist wherever they could and advise on trips etc so that he could still get the most out of his holiday. Our teenage son and daughter also enjoyed the pool and the gym. Lovely food from both the pool bar and the restaurants and we would love to come back here again

title: Horrible experience
review: Dear Valued,  Thank you very much for making this excellent review with all great feed back and comments. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed our staffs service and also the hotel hotel product. All our staff send their regards and hope to see you and your children back here soon again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Excellent location with friendly and helpful staff
review: It, in simple words, was the worst hotel I have experienced in all my life. Due to terrible room service and lack of efficient maintenance, many appliances like the mini fridge and tv remote had malfunctioned. There were protruding nails and screws in the bedroom door which injured my son. A major incident included myself being injured severely with bleeding bruises and cuts throughout my body due to a dilapidating shower door. The response of the front desk was extremely slow as it took 30 min and two calls to get a medic in the room. Even though it was clear that it was their mistake, we were forced to pay a heavy compensation for no relevant reason whatsoever. The duty manager was very rude and incompetent when the matter was brought to him.

title: Excellent
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you making this review and giving your comments. We are well aware of this incident but  do not agree with most of your points. On your second day your shower glass door was pushed with force so it broke. Our staff was at your room maximum 15 minutes after we were informed. We brought our First Aid kit and assisted you with the few scratches you unfortunately received. Rest assure that we take the safety very serious and also all comments on our staff. We are constantly trying to met all guests expectations and find solutions if any issues happens. If our service have been slow or any mistakes has been happening from our side we are always trying to solve it before our guest go back. . I would be more than happy to send you the incident report with, time frame and photos, so Please contact me direct for any further communications on this matter, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Nice and very friendly hotel
review: I stayed at Centara Pattaya Hotel for 10 nights. The facilities were excellent ranging from clean modern rooms, good gym, pool and dining room. The staff were very accommodating and helpful. They even helped me and my friend relocate to another quieter room.  Buffet breakfast is good with all the usual trimmings and you can get an omelette cooked to order.  My bedroom was clean and tidy, modern and housekeeping done everyday.  Most of all my Air Con was super cold which I wanted.  Big thank you to staff members, Maria, Rose, Mod and Jonas who made the trip more enjoyable. They run the Hotel the best it can be.  Highly recommended

title: another satisfying stay.
review: Fourth time at this hotel. went with two friends, their first time but they thoroughly enjoyed their stay... liked the rooms which were spacious and clean with a great shower and balcony, also the gym sauna and pool which are  all close together which we made full use off.   great position in resort. great front desk esp Maria. who managed to get us our rooms all on the same floor.  overall a great time here.  My friends said if they come back to Thailand they will def stay here again.

title: Value for money and location are convinient to access
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for this review and great comments. We will share it will everyone concerned and specially to our excellent Guest Service Agent, Khun Maria, thank you again! Best regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: This hotel downgrade the overall brand Centara
review: The room was clean and location of the hotel are convinient to beach,night life spot and shopping.  The breakfast have no much of choice. front deck staff and restaurant staff service are superb and friendly.

title: Excellant place to stay
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review with the positive comments. We will look into the breakfast selection again, but have over 45 items to cover all nationalities. I am very pleased to see you liked the hotel product and service from our staff, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Nice Hotel
review: I give lower than 3 stars for this hotel because very small room clean but not well maintained. Very old towels are provided. Room is a bit small.  I know and understand that this is budget hotel compare to normal central hotel brand or even other hotel in pattaya but management have to keep in mind that you are still name Central which normally customer have higher expectation when they decided to stay with you.  Hotel have limited car parking. It is not suitable for local people who come here with private car.  However hotel staffs are kind and helpful with service mind.

title: Amazing hotel
review: This is my 3rd visit to pattaya and I also stay in hilton, dusit thani both are 5 star but this hotel is amazing great value for money. A very co-operative staff and bigger rooms with very nice house keeping. Our room always look like garbage but when we come back hats off to house keeping so clean room. Travel guide, money exchange, gym,pool everything available. This is my last day here and I will definately come back here and again want to say thanx to gm and all staff of the hotel to make my stay wonderful and amazing

title: KNOW YOUR CENTARA
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the excellent feed back and review. I appreciated the comments and that you went to see me. We hope to see you back here soon again on your next visit and please mail us before so we can prepare accordingly, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Average hotel
review: I booked a 2 night brief stay at Centara Pattaya Hotel between March 20th and March 22nd basis reviews from the trip advisor community. When I reached the hotel, the reception promptly whisked me via a tuk tuk to another sister property named Centara Nova Hotel & Spa Pattaya. Now, Centara Nova Hotel & Spa Pattaya is a bit more in the interiors (5 mins via tuk took from Centara Pattaya Hotel) as compared to Centara Pattaya Hotel which gives you easy accessibility to Beach Road. I entered the wash room to be greeted by huge roaches, most of them dead but a couple of them alive. After a couple of selfies with the roaches, I tried posting it on Facebook, but realised the wifi provided by the hotel was really  poor.   The shuttle service for the tuk tuk is freely available which…

title: Good location, nice suff but some little problems
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your comments, they will help us to improve our services in the needed areas. We apologize for the inconvenience that you were accommodated in our sister hotel that is 3 minutes driving from ours. To my information we offered some guests to move to our sister hotel and then we gave free breakfast as compensation, which was accepted. We offer a free shuttle 12 hours a day for guest who wants to go between the hotels. Both hotels have the same facilities. For wifi problem we have temporary solutions from our Front Office if needed. It is working ok now again but we have also ordered a new system that will start to be installed next week. Ones again, we are sorry for this inconvenience, please mail to me for further contact, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: exellent
review: Not sure if it is actually a 4 star hotel 1) very limited veg food available. I reached at 10 am for breakfast and found that veg section was closed. When enquired, staff told me that since no one was eating they removed the veg food. Not sure how they can shut veg section at 10 when breakfast timings are till 10:30 However, on next day, the section was open till 10:30 2) lot of connecting rooms are there. Obviously, no one can open door but tourists of 1 room can hear voices from 2nd room very clearly. Do not opt for them 3) they give a voucher for welcome drink which states that get thai ice tea from bar Instead, they gave me an orange juice. When I asked them to change they politely told me that only this is available. Not sure what was the purpose of the voucher  Only…

title: Excellent ....
review: I stayed in Centara for the first time , good location , beautiful hotel and courteous staff , the rooms are spacious with all amenities and the bathroom large . Great value for money hotel , near the beach , the pool is also great , they have connecting rooms for families . 24 hours Mc Donalds just outside the hotel , 3 seven eleven in the vicinity . Will definitely stay here in my next visit .

title: Very good
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for making this review and give us all these great comments, we really appreciate it! Yes our location i perfect for everyone who like to be walking distance to the beach, shopping, markets, restaurants and other attractions. We have room types for singles, couples, families and groups. Please see more details on our web page, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Very good stay
review: Excellent staff, very friendly and willing to help. Breakfast is decent enough but could be a little better. Nice pool and gym. Rooms are excellent and very clean and modern. The only down side is the wi-fi can be very hit and miss.

title: Nice one
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to make this review with the good comments. I have noted the comment about that the breakfast can be improved and have shared this with our Chef and kitchen team to see what we can do better. Regarding the WIFi comment we have ordered a new system that will be installed within the next 2-3 weeks. We have some areas around the hotels that has a problem from time to time. We have temporary wifi solution for guest who inform us they need better. I am very pleased to see the great comments about our staff and their service mind and also our produce. Thank you again and we hope to have the chance to welcome you back. Best Regards,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Great stay
review: Nice property, good location. Easy to get around in Pattaya. Very friendly helpful staff. The western food in the restaurant wasn't very good at all but the Thai food definitely was. I would stay here again for sure. Especially for the price.

title: Befare of these cheats
review: The hotel is not that great. It is not as per standards of Centara, above all these guys charged us for some stuff from Mini Bar which we never consumed. The staff is not at all courteous. When we asked for the manager on duty - the person was not available to sort out the issue. My advice would be to stay away from these cheats. There are far better options available.

title: Love this hotel:)
review: Dear sahilarora86,  Please contact me on gmcpy@chr.co.th for more details on your review as the information I have on record is that you requested to have the item you refer to from your minibar as complimentary. We have several items in our minibar that we charge for, which is also mentioned on the mini bar list. We cant give them away as complimentary and I dont know any other hotels who would offer this free of charge. You did met our Front Office manager who was the duty manager at that time so I am not sure who else you refer to and I cant agree on the word you describe our hotels as. I am sorry that you left with a feeling that our staff is not courteous, rest assure that we work hard to try to meet all expectations. I look forward to hear from you, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Mac,  cruciverbalist
review: We stayed for 10 days(12-21feb).Great service, good food  breakfast / dinner, clean rooms, kids love the pool, specially thanks too Bowey ♡ we miss this smiley and helpful lady. This hotel is  the best in pattaya.

title: Did not met expectations as they charged for per night.
review: Dear Guests,  Thank you for taking the time to give us this review and great comments! I have shared it with K Bowie as well.  Best regards,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Don't Bother
review: Probably the best and friendliest staff anywhere in the world. Thank you all so much, especially to Maria and Rose in reception who have been very, very helpful. I have enjoyed my stay at the hotel a great deal. Thanks once again.

title: awesome stay
review: good rooms ,good location ,Excellent room services they wont let you wait for minute for your needs.nice Balcony view from rooms.This is a hotel that is excellent from the front desk to the housemaids. It is located just off second road . The hotel is nice and clean with staff that bend over backwards to help with any problem that might arise during your stay or departure.

title: One of the best value for money in Pattaya !
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for this review. We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed our food and our room service. We shared the great comments on our Front Office and Housekeeping our staff board. Thank you again and please come back to visit us soon, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Great 9 nights at Centara Pattaya
review: We spent a week in this almost perfect hotel is very well located near the city center but quiet.  Do not hesitate to book a suite Because prices are really interesting.  The restaurant of the hotel and the breakfasts are excellent.  The staff is perfect: polite and helpful as most of the Thai people  I insist on honesty and sympathy of the Director and his assistant Mrs Rose who repaid us one night (although our reservation was non-refundable) because we had to come home early in Bangkok!  The only negative thing was the poorly educated Russian as everywhere in the Pattaya area!  Thank you again, we will return to your hotel for our next stay in Pattaya

title: Good quality hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for this review and great comments! I am very pleased to see that you enjoyed our staff service and also our 1 Bed room suites which really offer a great value for money. Thank you for the good comments about our breakfast and also our service minded staff. I have informed Khun Rose about the great feed back, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Good staff and trip advisor
review: I had a really relaxing stay at this hotel. The staff were very helpful, discreet and responded very quickly to requests. Special mention to the Assistant Manager, Rose who handled a situation with classic Thai charm. Will definitely stay at this hotel again as it was the base of many great experiences in Pattaya.  Ken

title: Hotel was not too bad but the building site and the cockerel!!! aarg!!
review: The hotel was average, the swimming pool area was so small it had about 10 beds which only two only ever got the sun, I never got on a sunbed as the Russians dominated the area from dusk til dawn. The noise from the building site at the back was so loud I had to wear earplugs when they retired to their tents on the site the cockerel started crowing all night (I thought they didn't start until 5am!!). I was staying three nights but cut short my stay.

title: Best in best price
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your comments, this will help us to improve. Our Pool area have 30 Sun beds, 40 chairs and 10 tables, 6 bean bags and 5 concrete chairs inside the pool by the pool bar. There are  some days when the sun beds are occupied faster than others, but we normally can assist with a solution if you inform us. The 3 floor new construction behind the hotel does not belong to us and we cant control it. If they are not following the normal rules with noisy construction from 9AM-6PM, we can send a complaint letter to the Municipality. We have not heard any complaints on any cockerels yet but i will follow up on this.  Thank you again for making this review so we have a chance to comment and take actions, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Good quality Hotel in Central Pattaya ~
review: I stayed for 2 nights in Jan 15 before reaching to hotel I called to hotel's reception for early check-inn they said we can not say now if it is possible then we can accommodate. I reached at hotel by 8:30 AM somewhere before me one group for 10 people are also requesting for early check-inn but they refused them I felt same may happen with me but when I shown my booking documents she said I was waiting for you I got surprised and that lady her name was miss Naem she helped me for early check-inn and said sir pls don't say to any one.overall it was good hotel with amenities...

title: michael garfit
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We are very pleased to see that you were so satisfied with our product and service. If we can offer early check in we always try. Thank you again and we hope to see you back here soon.  Best regards Jonas

title: Family Holiday
review: I stayed in a 1 Bedroom Suite... Very spacious with all amenities... Free WiFi & H2O.. Good breakfast & the front office staff are very helpful... Especially Sukhontharose Kantalee (asset to the organization) & Namei Namei, &'Maria Semenova ...Definitely would stay here again..

title: GOOD SERVICE, LOCATION
review: stayed 3 nights at Deluxe room.  SERVICE: Prior to arriving, I made some requests, and hotel provided all upon my arrival.  After check-in, I requested for a plastic chair for my old man, which I deem, is a real special request. They didn't turn me down, but, promptly found one, and sent it to his room. This impress me. Prove of good service. All staffs are friendly, approachable. Front office staff are patient too.  ROOMS: good cleanliness, good beds, spacious restroom. Only cons is, the hot shower sometime is not hot enough. I like the balcony, where u can just sit there for a drink, and admire the atmosphere.  Wi fi is free, and ok for, surfing, emails, what's app, messenger, etc. But can be improve, on the need of logging in always.  LOCATION: very near to 2nd road and soi…

title: Centara Pattaya Hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very for making this nice review and taking the time to give us all these great comments. I am very pleased to see that you enjoyed our service and prompt handling on your request. I have noticed the comment about the hot water and the door issue and our Engineer has been fixing this already. Your positive comments about our staff service and attitude is well noted and has been shared on our staff board. Thank you again and we hope to see you back here soon! Best regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: Good hotel nice staff and great facilities
review: Excellent hotel, friendly helpful staff, clean, great location, easy use of taxibus for getting to Beach road and Walking Street. My first room on the second floor was overlooking the pool which could be noisy and intrusive because of loud music being played during the day. When I mentioned this to reception I was moved to a similar room on the eighth floor which was less noisy. Hotel is highly recommended.

title: 2nd time and Love It Just as Much as 1st Time
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for making this review and sharing your good experience from your stay with us. We have rooms with balconies facing both pool, garden and nearby surroundings.  I am very pleased you were so happy with our service and cleaning and i have shared this on our staff board for everyone to see. Thank you again and we hope to see you back here soon again! Best regards, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Normal good
review: Lovely stay here .. Nice staff .. Good restaurant .. I would defiantly recommend .. We were greeted nicely on check in and throughout our stay .. Lunch is reasonable mixed menu something for everyone .. Pool is kept clean .. Location is good ..

title: Top Hotel
review: Estimated Centara Pattaya Hotel Team,  Staying here is excellent, the service first class, very nice friendly staff! I can recommend all Pattaya traveler the! Price-performance ratio is first class! I want to thank me for the very nice friendly stay at the hotel!  Sincerely, Mr. Martin from Austria

title: enjoyable trip
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for this review! I am very pleased to see you were so satisfied with your stay and our service! Thank you again and please mail us before your next visit so we can block your favorite room again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Excellent
review: our friend  recommand this hotel from and we had a great time there  the dinning room was great for the kids and the swimming pool for the kids was excellent the room was big and comfortable  the service was very good  i sure i will go back again  hope next year ( - :

title: Hope to return soon.
review: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review! Yes our Family Studio room are perfect for families travelling with younger children, also as you mention we have one part by the pool that is separated for the kids. Thank you again and we hope to see you back with us soon! Best regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: Too Much Like Vegas
review: This is my first stay at this hotel with my husbAnd and children, I have stayed in most of the 5star hotels here, and I have to say we are very happy , the studio family room is perfect for me and my children they have there own little room with bunk beds which they love, staff here are excellent they have made our stay so welcoming and enjoyable, breakfast is lovely everywhere is spotless clean, the pool isn't massive but lovely for a quick dip as my father lives here the pool area doesn't matter to us as a lot of the time we are out and about, both my children have been entertained by the staff in the pool bar with board games while we have been here, I can not fault this hotel at all , you get a lot for your money as I normally pay triple the price for a suite in the dusit…

title: Will come back
review: My first visit to Thailand.Really nice airy air conditioned large bedrooms with the best showers and baths I have experienced----also modern safes and tea making facilities and free bottles of drinking water provided. Quality of breakfasts need to be improved though, especially for those with European tastes. Loved the swimming pool----which is partially shaded----but should be available to be used later than the current 7.00pm cut off time. Reception really friendly and helpful. Location great-------about 10 minutes from the beach. And just round the corner from shops and exchange kiosks. No charges for late night visitors.

title: First trip to pattaya
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to give us this review. I have noted the comment about the quality on the western breakfast dishes. We have changed supplier for our bread and pastry and i believe the quality has improved now. Thank you again and see you on your next visit!  Best regards, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Centara in a boutique version
review: First trip to Pattaya , package tour, stay one week at the centara Pattaya . Food good , staff helpfully (after hour staff English language not good) , room reasonable but lift small for large hotel, mostly set up for Russian and Indian travellers . Wi fi the hopeless - nil in rooms and only able get email front foyer area

title: Excellent stay at the Centara
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your comments. I am happy to see that you liked our food and service. All staff in the Front Office night shift speak and understand English well. I have noted the comment with the wifi from your room and have followed up on this. It happens that some of our routers must be restarted from time to time, this has been done now again. Thank you again and we hope to see you back with us soon again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Great hotel for family
review: Very modern and clean boutique-style hotel in walking distance to the beach in a quite street.  At first we were not sure whether this would be the right standard but it turned out to be perfect. Not only was the staff extremely friendly (with very good English skills) but the entire hotel was stylish, modern, and very clean.   We were lucky and got an upgrade into a 1 BR and if I would have known what to expect I would have booked it straight-away. You won't go any less if you like separate and spacious rooms with a large terrace where you can relax and enjoy the sun rise and sun set. Wonderful! Just across the street one has to walk through another small house that belongs to Centara to get to the beach. It also serves as a restaurant that service cocktails and small dishes. …

title: Centara Pattaya
review: I recommend this hotel to those who would like to spend quiet nights in otherwise noisy Pattaya. Plus the excellent service provided by the staff from the reception, / especially Maria!/, restaurant, pool bar, tour desk, the staff cleaning the rooms you will definitely have the desired holiday.

title: Fantastic
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write this great review with all good comments. I am very pleased to see you were so satisfied with our services and standard in Front office, House Keeping, Kitchen and Restaurant.  I have informed Maria about your kind feed back. Thank you again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours. Jonas Sjostedt

title: Great hotel
review: Just come back from this hotel today 21 st november it is great hotel food fantastic it is so clean the staff are so friendly and happy and it is situated in great area the soi this hotel is in is ideal very quiet at night

title: centara pattaya
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the great review and comments. I have shared it on our staff board and also to the kitchen team. I am very pleased to see that you were so satisfied with our food menu.  Best regards, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Happy happy
review: Hotel stuff are Really friendly. Especialy at the counter desk. Hotel is well decoreted and close to the sea. It is close to main attraction areas . It is worth the money! Breakfast was good. Hotel is strongly recomended.

title: nice hotel
review: very good rooms.. hotel was very nice.. staff is courteous, and the rooms are fantastic. very comfortable rooms, very clean and tidy. breakfast in the restaiurant is perfect to all different nationalities.. western,chinese, indian nationals are been taken care very well. few must to visit destinations are at a walkable distance. very much impressed with the hotel.. thank you very much for the good service..

title: Excellent Hotel, Excellent staff, Excellent Manager...
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review with all the great comments. I am very pleased to see that you were so satisfied with our service and standards and have put your comments up on our staff board. Thank you again and we hope to see back with us in the nearby future, and i remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Not too bad
review: Stayed in Centara Pattaya for 3 days, Hotel Manager Mr Veerapoul came specially to meet me which was just excellent, while checking out again he met me & asked if my stay was fine, what more could i have asked. Had amazing coffee session with him Khun Rose you are amazingly beautiful & courteous Breakfast spread was large & had variety & never had repeat items Hotel rooms have individual balcony & swimming pool view which is just amazing. Rooms are pretty big & spacious, also order food from room service which came on time & was just delicious, my Personal thanks to Chef who made my order since i love Thai Food Excellent communication, all my emails were answered before coming to Pattaya & was assured of room booking  Centara Pattaya staff is just excellent, all of them are…

title: another good stay
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to give us this great review and comments! I am very pleased to see that you were so satisfied with our teams performance and I have shared with everyone and specially to Khun Tom, Khun Rose and Chef Peter. We hope to see you back here soon again and before you come, please mail me on gmcpy@chr.co.th Thank you for the blessing and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Do find another hotel
review: Rooms are clean and the bathroom good.  Interesting shower comb but fun.  Wi Fi is a pain in the backside but they are aware not that that guarantees action.  Breakfast average and way too expensive if you have a guest.  Staff really good but sometimes good intentions do not translate into problem solving. Pretty well situated near most things Baht taxis are close.  If it pours the drainage system sometimes makes it interesting getting too and from the hotel. All in all Ok.

title: Good to stay :-)
review: Good Hotel to stay and relax..excellent tasty food with good cocktails n mocktails..tourist's can face language problem,because most of the staff don't know how to communicate in English..Mariya the front office receptionist is the ever smilling lady on the floor..Guest can enjoy their stay.

title: Peter. Wonderful
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review about us. We are very pleased to see that you were so satisfied with our product and service. We have informed Maria our Guest Service Agent the good comments. Thank you again. Kind regards Jonas

title: best with this price
review: This is a excellent hotel from the rooms to the staff.Had a great time will be back again.The price to stay was good.we had a balconies overlooking the pool.The breakfast was good.With a lot of choice.

title: Lovely spacious rooms with all modern amenities
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for making this review. We are very pleased you were so satisfied with your stay and I will share this on our staff board. We hope to see you back here soon again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Wonderful experience
review: this hotel gave me what ever i wanted with low price but remember that do not use any thing from minibar and bar in hotel and dont try to call from hotel phone is so expensive and also ladis are free here.

title: Great stay, with a few negatives
review: Hello to general manager,  we have just returned. From centara pattaya hotel ,  we had a great stay in your hotel,  very friendly staff and good service, a few little negative points you may want to have a look at,  1. Breakfast buffet very good, but you need to change  the position where the juices and cornflakes are, glasses and bowls are roasting with the sun,  2. My mother was in a wheelchair. And getting down the ramp was very dangerous, needs a railing I think, but your bell boys was excellent and helped with this every time , well done , 3. The corridors are very dark and with no air condition, felt sorry for the room maids in that heat, by the way we have stayed in many hotels in pattaya and the room maids are the best I have seen in keeping the bedrooms clean .thanks…

title: Love this place
review: Dear Andrew,  Thank you very much for these comments. I will look into this and take action where its possible. We have already checked how we can install the railings on the ramp. Breakfast item locations are being discussed. I have informed our House keeping team about your satisfaction, we are very pleased you taken the time to share this, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Centara amazing
review: I stayed here about 5 years ago now so it was when it just opened but at the time it was amazing. The hotel is incredible it is a planet of its own! Pools are Awsome so fun the one with the current is cool. Great pool aide service drinks and food rooms are good all the reasturants were awsome. Pattaya itself is not nice i would go here if u just wana stay in the hotel the whole timw

title: Great staff
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Than you very much for taking time to write this review and the great comments. We are very pleased to see that you were so satisfied also this time. I have shared this on our staff board so everyone can see. We hope to see you soon again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: 2nd time back - excellent value
review: First time visitor to Thailand stayed here September for 12 nights. Check in was fast, great assistance from reception in attempting to locate my luggage which was still in Holland. Shown to room 729, pool facing bright spacious great comfortable bed and great bathroom. Issue with shower and wc which when reported was sorted within minutes. Breakfast was amazing, egg chef was so friendly and went out his way to make sure you had everything you wanted.  Room service was great delivered quick hot and reasonably priced. Only negative pool does not get the sun for the entire day but this couldn't possible spoil your stay All staff were extremely helpful and friendly and we would definitely return.

title: New & nice
review: The hotel is located in a central place, just off the main road. The beach is 5 minutes walk & so is the Alcazar show. The hotel is quite new and clean, with a very good swimming pool. Breakfast served was good. We had rooms to the back of the hotel with a so-so view, but at least no tall buildings nearby so could sit in the balcony.

title: Nice holiday
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review and with all the great feed back and comments. We have two buildings with rooms facing all around the hotel, so there are views to the pool, street, city and also a few with some sea view. Hotel location are in the central Pattaya with walking distance to the beach, shopping, market, restaurants and bars.  Thank you again and we hope to see you back here with us soon again, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: holiday stay
review: The room style is modern, you can easy to go the city center shopping. However, my friend made an appointment for SPA, the staff has marked the booking. Then missed the booking when my friend come to the lobby ontime, my friends were very disappointed. The manger called me to apologize the booking missing.

title: 2nd time back
review: Dear DerrickCK,   Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review. We apologize again for our mistake on your friends Spa booking. Our offer still stand, so please mail us before your next visit (cpy@chr.co.th) so we can arrange the spa treatment accordingly, and I remain,   Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Awesome Stay at this hotel
review: This is a very nice hotel, reception staff were very welcoming ,and friendly ,The room was very clean and a good view,The wifi is ok for email and basic browsing, do not try and download any films, very slow, unless you are down near the reception, The food is very good,Breakfast  in the morning has a very good selection, would recomend the chef gets smokey bacon, but not bacon that was served ,  A short walk to the beach through soi 6 will do wonders for your ego(gentlemen only) sorry ladies!!  Stayed here late june .Give this hotel a go and you will have a great time. Ok for taking a friend back for a night cap,that is the censored version.

title: Wow
review: Great hotel, great decor, friendly staff, good food, walking distance from the beach & market.....what more can one ask for. Reception staff welcomed us quietly warmly, initially we got a road facing room but it was changed immediately to pool facing room (though it was available only at the 8th floor) on our request. The pool side was also very relaxing. An amazing stay.

title: Mediocre
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for this review and great comments. I am very pleased to see you was so satisfied with our service and standard. I have shared this on our staff board. Thank you again and we hope to see you back with us soon!  Best regards,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Very nice and comfortable
review: Breakfast buffet: frequently un stocked,  not good flavours,  not enough staff. Rooms clean. One movie channel in English.   Pattaya smells of sewerage. The balcony,  while fine,  is unusable save only for those without the sense of smell.   Pool is small and overloaded. Not inviting. The property has been expanded around the pool.   Not great.

title: Unpleasant visit
review: Dear TravelJezza,  Thank you for staying with us. I am sorry to hear that you found our breakfast not satisfying. I have addressed the issue with refilling the food faster and also checked the scheduling so there is man power enough. Our breakfast buffet offer 65-70 items daily, with dishes for both Asian and Western so i believer we offer dishes with good flavours. I understand you were staying during the heavy raining, which can create some flooding here and there all over Pattaya (and most areas around in Thailand). Most days and periods offer sunshine and blue sky and as Pattaya are by the beach, the air is fresh, specially comparing to Bangkok that is only 1.5 hour drive away. We have 9 TV channels In English, with 2 movie channels. We also offer DVD machines and a movie library from our reception. I am sorry we did not live up to your expectations, but hope you can give us a chance on your next visist, and I remain,  Sincerely yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Nice
review: Two bedrooms were connected. One for children and other for us. The beds very big and cosy and was very tempting with fluffy pillows. There was a TV and had a  good channel for children .It had a balcony with table and a chair. The bathroom had a shower and in the other room had a bathtub. There was a hair dryer also.....

title: the geelong crew
review: Rooms were great pool even better and the staff were excellent going back same time next year and cannot wait will stay at the same place thanks for a great holiday would personally like to thank all the staff for a wonderful stay .

title: Thanks for Warmth Welcome
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for the great feed back and review! We have to see you back with us soon again. Kindest regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: Not worth the price. The quality not meet 4stars hotel.
review: Thanks for Centara and all staffs  Me and my love visited Centara Pattaya on recently weekend. They provided very convenience place, car park, swimming pool, fitness, and many stuffs in the room.  My love really like soft and clean pillow (if you have time, come and try it). Their dinner is fantanstic meal for us too. Centara offer fresh seafood especially "Curry soft shell crab", we really love it.  every staff in Centara Hotel serve service with welcome smile and never too busy to response our request.  Thanks Centara Pattaya again, and See you again my first choice hotel.

title: Family stay
review: Dear Khun Ruangchai,  Thank you very much for giving us this great review. I am very pleased to see all your expectations was to your satisfaction. I hope to see you here soon again, and please mail me before so i can try to block your favorite room, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Aussie golf boys
review: -swiming pool is very dirty and small unlike the ads photos -a lot of mosquitos in the room -very bad security. The door linked between my room and connected room was not locked. You can just open the door to see a stranger! -bad reservation system. We travel as big family and requested for two connected rooms. I've booked and confirm room availability two months ahead. But when we checked in they just said rooms not available. So they just put us in rooms connected to other family (which unlock door as mention above!) -parking area is horrible. Very small ansld not enough for the amount of guests. Moreover the way down to underground parking was too steep. Every cars get scratch underneat when driving down this steep way.

title: Great!
