review: Centara Hotel was fantastic. The room was absolutely massive - the biggest hotel room I have stayed in! The bathroom was as big as some rooms I have stayed in before! Breakfast was nice, with a good variety of food. The location of the hotel is great, almost at the top end of Soi 6, but just out of the way enough to keep it quiet from the party and noise that comes from there. Great restaurants are within walking distance. All staff were lovely and catered for all of our needs. Swimming pool is perfect for cooling off from the hot climate. Once again a great place to stay for an extremely reasonable price :)

title: Amazing
review: Dear ix_Romanul,  Thank you very much for this great review! We are very pleased to see you loved our rooms and outlets. Our location is perfect for guests who do not want to pay to stay on the beach. It takes under 10 minutes to walk down soi 6 to come to the beach from us, 4-5 minutes to go to the shopping and restaurants. Thank you again and we hope to see you back here soon, and i remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: great hotel
review: We stayed in march first time in Thailand we met rose the girl on reception and she was amazing and made our stay !  Hotel Clean , modern and in the perfect location and best of all amazing staff !! We will defiantly be back in the future  We loved Thailand the hotel was great food was good too in and around the hotel !!!!

title: reasonably good location and value for money
review: Dear Natasha H,  Thank you very much for this review and great comments. I have shared it both with K Rose and our Housekeeping team. Thank you again and we hope to see you back here soon again! Best regards, Jonas Sjostedt

title: Value for Money
review: great hotel, rooms are great pool bar great, restaurant great, close to everything, restaurants and bars are a simple walk down the road, doesn't matter a tuk tuk will get you there, mini bar is so cheap, staff are brilliant will help with anything, want to go somewhere they will book for you

title: great hotel, best to book in low season.
review: Stayed 3 nights in Centara Pattaya during end July.  Loved the room, spacious and clean. Comfortable bed, double room equipped with bathtub and rain shower. I don't remember having a nice view at the balcony but not necessary for me as it was cosy staying inside the room. Security was strict and i thought this was a good point. Check-in had a little hiccup with me and my friends being arranged separate rooms in different towers when reservation was made together, but at the end they put us nearby each other on the same floor which was essential and came with free welcome drink too.  Wifi was not working on first day, when it restarted it started to work but very very slow. Not certain if that is because i stayed on 7th floor or wifi signal is not that advanced.  Location is…

title: Good Hotel, Good Price and Great Staff....
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your comments. Our security have direct orders to follow the hotel policy and Thai law to register all guest staying in our hotel. We have checked the Wi-Fi but can not find any problem on that floor. I could sometimes be the routers that needs to be restarted. We have upgraded our system in order to offer faster speed, but it will still not cover for downloading of movies or games. Our location is perfect for the guests who prefer to stay in the central with walking distance to most attractions. Thank you again and i remain,  Sincerely yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Not Good Not Bad
review: We just went back from our short holiday in BKK and Pattaya, and in Pattaya we stay at Centara Pattaya Hotel for almost 2 days (since we decide for late check out) till 5pm with additional charge. My opinion say that overall hotel is good in a scene that good location, good price, good location and good staff. The hotel itself is not big yet not small so it just good. We booked through OTA and we had last good deal specially during weekend almost hotel in Pattaya is over rated but we had last minute deal.  Staff were excellent, I found the Front Desk Staff (Ms. Rose) and other Front Desk is very helpful and speak in English very well and know what to do to pleased the guest who`s on queuing to check in since we come a bit early and the room was not ready but they know how to…

title: Pleasantly Suprised
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review with all great comments about your stay with us. I have shared with Khun Rose and her team already and they are very grateful. We have also discussed how to prepare the breakfast better those days we are fully booked and most guest decide to come at the same time, I believe we have solved this now. I am happy to see our upgrade of WI-FI has been notable to you. Thank you again and we hope to see you back here soon as our guests, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: NEVER seen that level of responsiveness
review: For a comfortable room to sleep Floor slightly dirty. not in mop The bathroom is large enough Conecting rooms are quite good because the system has 2 doors, 2 entrances, one main door The breakfast was very standard and a small dining room and the food is not much menu

title: Excellent service with a smile :)
review: Everything was perfect! We had a little trouble with the seawalking tour but the lady at the tour desk did everything she could to rectify the situation and provided a refund for the activities we were unable to do (the day was still great!). The staff at the hotel are all amazing; a special thanks to Bowey, Som, Toon, Kow and Nit for making my daughter's 21st birthday holiday even better than she had hoped for. The restaurant food is delicious (try the fetta salads!!); the restaurant offers a great deal of any 3,4 or 5 entrees to share for a bargain price and all are delicious selections! THANK YOU!!

title: Amazing staff - 5 star service with a smile!
review: Dear Nozza62,  Thank you very much for taking the time to give us this review: I have shared it with all departments concerned and with a special thanks to K Bowey, Som, Toon, Kow and Nit. I am very pleased to see that you enjoyed are friendliness and service, and also the food from our newly made menu. Thank you again, and I remain, Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Amazing Service and Staff
review: I would like to say a big thank you to the staff at the hotel for making my 21st birthday trip the best 15 days ever. A special thanks to Som, Bowey, Nit and Ta for being especially amazing. The staff went out of their way to make sure our stay was great and if we ever needed anything they did everything they could, as quickly as they could - WITH A SMILE!! The food at the restaurant was delicious and all amenities were great. Loved being able to sit in the nice cool pool and sip on one of Som's delicious cocktail. I will definitely be back as soon as possible. Thanks :D

title: Very nice hotel !
review: Dear Stephjxx,  Thank you taking the time to write this review. We are very happy to see that you had a great stay with us and i have passed on your special Thanks to Khun Som, Bowey, Nit and Ta in our Food&Beverage team. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again as our guest! Best regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: Perfect Hotel with great location.
review: I will definitely be returning as soon as possible. At no point did I feel anything other than completely welcome here! The staff was always easy to find and communicate with, and made a concerted effort to meet my needs!

title: Perfectly OK hotel in good location
review: We were travelling in a family of four, we booked the 2 bedroom apartment, which is just adjoining rooms. The rooms were spacious and clean enough. The breakfast was great, with a lot of variety for all nationalities. There is a nice bar around the pool area, which was handy, and you also get pool towels here too. Down-side -  the pool does not get any sun after 3.30pm. Some reviews complain about the charges for wifi. - If you register for a Centara 1 card (which is free) before you travel, you receive free wifi at all Centara hotels. Saved us 365baht wifi charges per day.

title: Great hotel.
review: Dear Owen Family,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write this review and share your great experience with us. Our 2 Bedroom (Two Deluxe with a connection door) is perfect for the bigger families who has children requiring normal bed size. I am very pleased to see that our new added breakfast items have been well received. It is correct what you write that by signing up the C1 card you will receive several useful benefits and free WIFI in all Centara hotels. Centara Pattaya Hotel offers free WIFI for both C1 card members and the one without. Thank you again for the great comments, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: You cant expect anything else for this price
review: This hotel was great.when we arrived we were met at the door taken inside then shown to our rooms.i had a room to myself and my brother and friend shared a room,all the people that worked there were so nice and welcoming always smiling and making sure we were ok.this was only my second trip over seas but to me I couldn't have ask for anything better. The rooms were nice and large,wifi worked well,the pool was nice and clean,outdoor bar was nice,meals were nice,and the big range of food we had to choose from for breakfast was good.i felt sorry for the cook as he was flat out doing eggs every morning Lol.would like to thank every one that worked there that we met and I think we met nearly everyone over our 2 week stay,that all of you were great and couldn't have been happier for…

title: The best hotell on my trip
review: Dear 21 Gazza,  On behalf of all staff, we are very grateful that you took the time to write this review with all great comments, it will certainly keep us pushing even harder to get more ones! We hope to have the chance to welcome you back when your third Thailand trip is planned, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Kabkoon ka! ☺️
review: We stayed as a family in july 2014 for 3 nights.  Pros:-  1) Nice location everything within radius of 1.5 kms shops , restaurants, shopping and it is just opposite to Notorious Sio -6.  2) Helpful staff -  I saw bell boy playing with my 1.8 month kid by the time i could check in hotel which made her very happy.  3) Clean rooms: The rooms were very clean and nicely made and quite spacious.   4) Breakfast: The breakfast had a nice variety of food and had options for every individual taste .  4) Spa: My wife went for a spa session and they have the only spa in pattaya to use dead sea stuff also we got around 25 % discount on spa services as well  Cons: None of them   Just avoid rooms in tower C as view from balcony is not great..  I am shocked to see people complain about staff…

title: Didnt meet my expectations
review: I stayed here for a day and checked out the next as it did not meet my expectations. I stayed in the 2 bedroom and heard that the rooms were very good however i found them smaller than usual. The bathroom was great though, but not these are not most hygienic rooms you will come across. I found a cockroach strolling in the bathtub, 4 - 5 spiders in my room, one in the bathroom, and one on the bed! How can i sleep knowing that there insects crawling on the bed. And btw, this all happened before i opened any windows so these insects were in the room before i checked in. I also asked room service to send up a couple of plates and bowls and it took them over 15 mins to get it. I don't think using a "we are very busy" excuse as ive stayed in hotels with 40 floors and fast room…

title: Decent
review: Dear Rayaan A.  Thank you very much for giving us your comments on this review. It will certainly help us to improve much faster. We are very sorry to hear we could not met your expectations this time. I have checked with all our departments concerned and their log books. We have not record over any comments from you during your stay regarding any cockroaches or spiders. Also our room maid and the supervisor have no record over this reported either by you or by them. Rest assure that we take this comments very serious as we certainly not want to have any kind of bugs or animals in our rooms. We have a contract with a Pest Control company that comes regular and spray all our outlets and rooms. In our record you already on the arrival and check in informed our Guest Service Agent, Khun Mod, that you only wanted to stay one night. This we accepted and arranged without any cancellation charge. After you entered the room, you came back to the reception and asked for room higher up as you did not prefer the ground floor. The record from your phone call and to it was delivered was 14 minutes according to our security cameras. We have discussed internally how we must do to speed this up and also how to inform our guests already how long time it will take to come to the room, to avoid any miss communication. Thank you again for your comments, we will address the areas we can improve, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: A very good stay
review: The location is very good - close to the convenience stores and restaurants. The staff was very efficient and had our key cards ready before we checked in.   The rooms were really good - neat and clean. The only problem I had with mine was towards the beginning of the stay - the room smelled funny. There might be a little language problem with the housekeeping staff during the stay.

title: Wonderfully Central Location
review: Dear Neha10012014,  Thank you for your review and comments. I am really pleased to see that you were very satisfied with your stay with us. Regarding the smell, after you checked out, our room maid reported that there was some smell from the drainage which was fixed directly by our Engineer. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back as our guests in the nearby future, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Great hotel
review: The hotel, as many have noted, is not by the beach, but it is oinly a few metres from Second Road, and just a five-minute walk to Beach Road. Baht buses drop you virtually at the door. My room was on the top floor and had views over rooftops to the sea as well as a less appeaking view over some building works and scrubby old buildings to the north.  The room was extremely comfortable and featured one of the best beds I have slept in. Everything was clean and housekeeping refreshed the room in a timely manner. Wifi worked well.  Breakfast was ok, although the room was a bit shambolic and not particularly well kept. Certain groups of people were making a lot of noise and being very demanding of the staff, who seemed quite harrassed. This was less the fault of the staff than that…

title: Very nice rooms
review: Hi visited in May this year my second visit here.   Breakfast very good although they could do with more variety of fresh fruit. only saw bananas once.. the sausages were a bit sus... more like cheap frankfurters from a tin.   nice fresh eggs.. fresh milk and juice... lovely cup of tea with hot milk.  the rooms .. my room very roomy very well cleaned all facilities.. absolute discretion from management.. they even phone you in room to make sure all ok.. staff excellent esp on reception.  didn't try any other food but looked ok.   had some trousers laundered but they came back with double creases .... this is a no  no for me..  great location very central 2 minutes to beach road by foot.    would i stay again... yes..but please how about some english sausages and more fresh…

title: Excellent stay
review: Dear Hunkedunk,  Thank your for your review and comments!  I have looked into the breakfast items with our you mentioned and we will consider another supplier. For our outside laundry, I have been in contact with them about this issue, and we must check all guest laundry better ones we receive it before returning it back to the guest room. Please accept my apology for this incident. Thank you again for bringing this to my attention, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Amazeing hotel
review: It was a satisfying experience . A good location along with a friendly staff.The family suite in which we stayed was perfect for a family if 4 as they had two well furnished rooms interconnected. The balconies facing the swimming pool was an excellent place to relax.

title: Lux
review: Dear Akanksha D,  Thank you for very much for the great review! I agree with your, our 60m2 Family Studio is a fantastic value for money for a Family of four! I hope to see you here soon again. Best regards Jonas Sjostedt

title: Verdict is still out.
review: Stayed in this hotel for 8 nights with friends 7 In total hotel was really good staff was excellent anything needed any time you would get clean rooms fresh towels and sheets every day and can bring guest back 😉 Wi Fi was poor would use hotel again

title: Excellent experience
review: Centara is "the" place to stay in Pattaya because of it's excellent location, friendly & care taking staff. We had one of the best experiences travelling abroad by staying in Centara. We were given a surprise by the hotel staff by sending a honeymoon cake in our room. The hotel staff was really friendly & supportive. I would like to especially mention "Elmira" who made our stay at Centara all the more memorable. She made sure that we received our honeymoon cake. So to all the travel enthusiasts, go ahead & stay at Centara, it's your life, make it large!!

title: Fantasic !!!
review: Dear Valued Guest! Thank you very much for your review and great comments! We are very happy to see this and that you had such a good time with us and in Pattaya. I have informed Ms. Elmira the nice comments, thank you again! We hope to see you soon back here with us, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: amazing holiday
review: I stopped here at the end of November beginning of December 2013 for 14 nights.    The hotel is just off the main stretch, however beach road etc is easily accessable via either walking or if you want to go upto walking street you can easily catch the baht bus.  First impressions - very professional but with a friendly touch as well.  Nothing was too much trouble for the staff, always a smile and the greeting sa wat dee.  I had booked a double room and on entering the room, I could not believe how big and spacious they are.  The bathroom had not only a bath but I walkin shower which was fab and the aircon which each day was a relief from the swealtering heat.  The bed was massive, I found it very comfortable and linen was changed when ever requested, if you wished each day,…

title: great place
review: Dear Ijustlovetravel,  Thank you very much for writing this review. I have shared it on our staff board  and to Khun Susy, and it certainly gives all staff extra energy to keep on giving great services. Regarding the free wifi we normally only get comments on the speed when guests try to download movies or play computer games, which the wifi does not cover. For normal usage and read mail etc it works just fine. Thank you again for the great comments and see you next year, and I remain,  Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Hamed k
review: we arrived at the Centara hotel on the 15 of april i walked in to the reception and was amazed how lovely it was the staff was very nice on greeting we was ascorted to our rooms and they was so lovely like a dream room. the bed was the most amazing thing so comfy  the pool bar was really good amazing service by ho   Rose on reception was amazing lovely person  all the staff had no problem in being polite always had a smile on there face  jonas the manager was really good aswell my friend had a infection in his ear and offered to buy him some ear plugs so that to  me was amazing customer service  but if i had to pull one person out the the hole staff at centara for being so nice for my hole holiday it would b tai who works on the lobby bar she was the best  thank you for my…

title: Awesome, the friendliest and most helpful staff along with a great location, you can't go wrong !
review: Stayed four nights before heading to Phuket. Had major problems with credit card booking a flight online and Susi and her friend at the front desk were invaluable. Organised everything direct over the phone for me, flights, taxis, things to do and all at least 25% cheaper than I had found or been quoted myself. She turned a potential nightmare into a dream holiday.. The rooms were fantastic and kept beautifully clean. ALL the staff were friendly and of constant help!! Will def be back!!!  Leigh & Bill from OZ!!

title: First Trip, Good Trip
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to send this great feedback to us and the Tour Counter. I have shared it to Ms. Susy and her team.  We hope to have the chance to welcome you back as our guest in the nearest future. Best regards, Jonas Sjostedt

title: 3rd visit
review: This was my First Trip to Pattaya. I realy enjoyed it. The hotelstaff had been very Professional and friendly and always had a smile on their faces. The room was nice, big and always clean. The breakfast was good and i also tried some good dishes in the Mix Bistro. If i could say anything Bad then that the bed was a little bit to hard for me, but i slept very good in it. so it is not a decisive Point.  I will come back to Pattaya, and back to this Hotel

title: Bugfest
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the great feed back and comments! I will share them with our staff. On your next visit please contact us before on cpy@chr.co.th and we can arrange an extra top mattress on your bed if you prefer to get it more soft, and I remain,   Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Good and convenience hotel.
review: 3rd time of visiting and the hotel never disappoints. We had a family studio this time and the extra space was great, although a mirror in the main room would have been nice.  Its the staff that make this hotel so enjoyable. Everyone of them are friendly and genuinely pleased to help. Looking forward to our 4th visit!

title: A nice hotel
review: Stayed here from 17th -29th of March. It's a good location close to transport & a short walk to the beach. We had a 1 bedroom suite which was very comfortable. Breakfast was the highlight of the day staff & food was awesome. We also ate at the Mix bistro often meals were always good ( and service thanks Golf ). We will stay again when in Pattaya.

title: An ideal location to stay
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to give us this review. Khun Golf are informed about the good comment and feedback. We hope to see you soon as our guests, and I remain,   Sincerely Yours,  Jonas Sjostedt

title: Close to everything
review: It was my second visit to pattaya, stayed in this hotel for 2 nights. very closeby to beach, central mall & big c shopping mall and much more things to enjoy near by. Hotel Rooms are very contemperory along with small balcony with smoking and no smoking room options. Clean and spacious bathrooms. Hotel staff was also very friendly, quick responding. Swimming pool with restaurant next to it. Morning breakfast buffet was served there. Food quality was also good. Enjoyed staying in this hotel. Good value for money.

title: want a good clean hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking your time to review our hotel. We are very glad to hear that you really enjoyed staying at Centara Pattaya Hotel and it is our pleasure to serve you. Your valued comment will be very helpful for our staffs in order to remain our standard services. We hope that our hotel will be one of your choice for your next visiting.  May we take this opportunity to thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again for a more pleasurable experience.  Sincerely Always,

title: bob aust
review: This was my first time at Centara and I had read most reviews before hand so I took a leap of faith. The staff are very good as other reviews say, and nothing is too much trouble. It is close to everything and the cost of the tours are very reasonable at the front desk.  Let them look after you -- we will be back again.

title: My  first  trip in pattaya
review: I was  been in pattaya  for  couple  days wacatıon was  amazing country my fist  trip is  excellent  with centara  hotel  and professional  stuff  especially General  manager Jonas Sjosted and  front  desk is  good  example   (Sukhontharose Kantalee)  very  warm  welcoming   with  helpfull and always  asking  for  any  point to  doit,  just  small  thing is we  hed  some  problem  with  travel  agency  and  in  lobby  area  was  full  with  moskito during  nigeht :) because  difficould  to  conneck  wifi in the  room we  have  to  conneckt  in lobby  is  faster then  room  specially 308  thats it  I  will  recomend this  hotel  to  my  friend Mehmet Siris

title: Pleasant Stay
review: Dear valued guest,  Thank you very much for taking time to review our hotel. We are very glad to hear that you had a great time in Pattaya and our hotel was one of your great memory. Your valued review will help us improve our services and attain our objective which is thoroughly delight all our guests. According to the mosquito issues, we have contacted the injection company and the problem is already solved. We also do apologise for the weak signal of internet connection and we will try our best to improve the internet system as suggested. We hope that our hotel will always be your choice for your next vacation visit.  Looking forward to welcoming you back again for a more pleasurable experience. Sincerely Always,

title: Great Stay
review: We stayed with our 2 little ones in Family Studio Room. (Bunker Beds for Kids). Room had nice balcony overlooking pool. Breakfast had little options for vegetarions, however, could have explored more options, if name of dishes placed in bufet breakfast were described with contents of each item. Decent gateaway from Bangkok. Walking distance to Alcazar Show, and Pattaya Beach. Bath rooms with both Tub and Shower options. Room on higher floors to be preferred for reduced noise levels.

title: Never again
review: Dear valued guest,  Thank you very much for taking time to review our hotel. Your comment will be very useful for our staff to improve our services and attain our objectives. Now we already place the dish names and some vegetarian options will be added in the buffet line as you suggested.  It's our pleasure to serve you and we look forward to welcoming you and your family back again for your next visiting.  Sincerely Always,

title: Good Value with Less Money Decent Property
review: We stayed at the Centara Pattaya over Christmas for 7 nights. The hotel staff were very welcoming on arrival. It was such a lovely relaxing place to stay. Short walk to beach and a little longer walk to shopping centers. The buffet breakfast was really nice and staff were really friendly. We had an issue with our toilet in our room as it couldn't be fixed so we were moved to another room. Internet was free. Swimming pool was lovely.

title: CENTARA CALLING....
review: Heya... My friend Mr. Saurabh stayed at Centara, he strongly recommended this hotel and made me cancel my bookings with Miracle suits and it is his suggestion that I have booked 4 rooms with the hotel for my forthcoming trip for the dates 15th March 2014 to 18th March 2014... looking forward for a great time and excellent service... Sajid Vanak

title: Great Property in Pattaya
review: Dear Sajid,  Thank you very much for sharing these comments. I hope you also had a great stay here with us and that we will see you soon again, and I remain,   Sincerely Yours Jonas Sjostedt

title: Susie @ The Tour Desk
review: A modern hotel with very good rooms both in size as well as in quality. We stayed in a room on the ground floor which was just next to the pool, although a little noisy but since we were with friends, it was all fun!!! Could be one of the better properties in Pattaya in this price.   Worth a stay!!!!!!

title: the best 4* hotel in pattaya
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for taking time to review our hotel for your recent stay at Centara Pattaya Hotel. Your valued feedback will help us improve our performance and attain our objective which is thoroughly delight all our guests.  It is always a pleasure to receive compliments on our staff. They were all very pleased to learn about your note.  May we take this opportunity to thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again for a more pleasurable experience.  Sincerely Always,

title: not for families
review: I stayed in June 2013.  The hotel was amazing. I didnt come across a single rude person or staff member.   Great Security, Felt safe the whole time in the hotel.  Now Susie was amazing! She sorted everything for us whilst we were there all with a smile and a great can do attitude.  You really need to award her or at least acknowledge,  Thanks and will see you again in the near future  Chris

title: Wow!!!
review: All I can : They upgraded us to suite without any charge. Nice people with amazing sense of understand of customer's need. Very Helpful staff, they found my almost lost phone. Excellent food. A MUST STAY !!!

title: great stay
review: Dear valued guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel for your recent stay at Centara Pattaya Hotel. It is always a pleasure to receive compliments on our staff and your feedback will help us improve our performance and objective which is delight all our guests. We hope that our hotel will be one of your choice for your next visiting. May we take this opportunity to thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming back for a more pleasurable experience.  Sincerely Always,

title: great property, great location and service
review: great location hotel nice staff very comfortable hotel to stay bed size very good swimming pool good very close to main road breakfast very good quality clean & big size room stay at hotel very comfortable overall a good hotel to stay

title: Comfortable stay
review: Dear valued guest,  Thank you very much for taking your time to review our hotel. It is always a pleasure to receive compliments on our staff. They were all very pleased to learn about your note and we are very glad to hear that you like our hotel's room and facilities. We will keep remaining our hotel standard services in order to make our guests feel delighted.   Looking forward to welcoming you back again for a more pleasurable experience.  Sincerely Always,

title: Great stay at the Centara
review: Stayed for a couple of nights, enjoyed the service and facilities available. Lives upto the brand, no complaints. We took two large inter connected rooms which were very spacious with all the provisions.

title: Great hotel!
review: We loved this hotel. Staff were friendly and helpful, especially the door staff....always a smile and a bit of chat. Cleaning staff were always smiling and friendly, and nothing too much trouble for them. Dining room staff always made sure we had a good table, and were again always smiling and friendly. The food is varied, to accommodate the different nationalities who stay there, but there was always plenty choice. Loved the chap who made the omelettes to order....he always remembered what I liked in my omelette, which made me feel he actually cared about the service he provided. Lovely large comfortable beds,and large rooms with plenty storage space. Large walk in monsoon shower, which always had plenty hot water. We loved sitting on the balcony in the evening watching life go…

title: Visiting in april 2014
review: Dear valued guest, wonderful to see that you enjoyed our hotel. I appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay and I do hope to see you again in the future. Best Regards, Austin

title: Stayed 7 days
review: Hiya all I've looked at all your reviews and my best friend stayed there this year and i must say what ive heard and sin this place sounds really nice so I have booked for April 2014 thanks for helping me make my mind up see you soon centara

title: Great hotel and facilities within walking distance of everything Pattaya has to offer!
review: Hello there, we are looking forward to seeing you again. The weather in April is quite warm and it is also the season for Thai New Year. Hope you enjoy. Austin

title: First time in Pattaya
review: Have stayed many times in pattaya,  rooms great, breakfast too cold.  If you have teenagers that rely on wifi this hotel is not recommended. Asked to move rooms after the second day due to the lack of wifi. Every day problem.  Will inform flight centre of  my stay.

title: when it comes to HONESTY & CARE….let’s say “CENTARA PATTAYA HOTEL”.
review: I want to say a BIG thank you to CENTARA Pattaya HOTEL. I lost a very valuable Gold jewelry at Centara Pattaya HOTEL. I was in BKK when I realized that jewelry is not with me. With help of my friends, we called Centara Pattaya Hotel and inquired about the lost jewel. They gave us the BEST news  that they have kept my jewel safe with them and they agreed to DELIVER it to me to BKK right away. I don’t know who found that jewel and handed it over to the “Lost & Found” department…but all what I want to say is THANK YOU VERY MUCH CENTARA PATTAYA HOTEL and its’ very honest, caring and kind staff and the management. The way you all coordinated and the way you understood the importance of what we’re saying…that was WOWWW..!!! We're very impressed and soooooo thankful to you all. I think…

title: brilliant  hotel
review: Dear valued guest, I am glad you enjoyed the trustworthy staff we have here at Centara Pattaya Hotel. The individuals concerned with finding your lost property have been recognized by myself and the management team here. I do hope to see you again in the future. Best regards, Austin

title: Great, say no more
review: we are staying in this hotel for 3 weeks, we have been here a week and cannot find anything wrong, all the staff are vey helpful and friendly.  We have been coming to pattaya for many years and have stopped in a lot of the top hotels  from the Amari Orhid to the Montien, but I have to say I much prefer the Centara, our room is fantastic we are in room 821 over looking the pool, it has a very spacious balcony and we are in a family studio which is a lovely big room.  The breakfast buffet is excellent, with a chef cooking fresh omelettes and fried eggs and plenty of other choice, you would be hard pressed not to find something you liked, even when it was raining there was umbrellas for you to use.  The room service is excellent and the cost of drinks and food by the pool is very…

title: Best best for your smart purse
review: Dear Valued guest, Thanks for taking the time to rate us and thanks so much for your positive comments. I will pass them on to the team here. Best regards, Austin

title: Good location!
review: Plan was to get a bus from the airport to Pattaya direct and then a local taxi. All good plans go astray!!! Our baggage took longer to receive so we missed the bus and had a two hour wait for the next bus so grab a taxi, two of us with another to fill a seat seemed ok. Problem came about because the taxi driver not being local, did not know where to go and despite asking locals he was directed to every other Centara hotel except the one we wanted so two hours later after driving all over Pattaya, seemed like half of Thailand, we arrived. No local phone no on our booking sheet, the number went to a call centre who were not all that helpful. A local phone no the problem would have been solved quite quickly. That was the first and last black mark. The hotel position was good, about…

title: go only if you have budjet or first time in pattaya
review: just came back from  Centara pattaya,  since my last stay last year the service has gone down, do not expect any help from management  /reception one male  reception staff seems to be the key to the problems, some issues from last year clearly still not addressed, despite Austin,s comment  (dear valued guest seems his motto) i would seriously contemplate the negative comments and can  agree with most of  them, the showers suffer badly from mold/ bacteria for a  recent place its really bad, the air con has no user instructions still, housekeeping did not bother to clean room for 2 days even though i had a sign on display and when it was done, it was a bad job i had to clean the shower and floor myself!   no toilet roll, and had to wait 1 hour  after asking for new towels, its a…

title: A WOW holiday
review: Dear Valued guest, What a shame you didn't enjoy our hotel. Sorry to hear of your experience. We have never met and yet you mention me twice in your rating. Some of your comments are quite personal and that's strange given you we have not spoken or even been introduced. Believe me, I respect your opinion and be assured I will investigate the issues you mention. As you can see there are many guests who enjoy the experience here and they have rated us accordingly. We don't charge fees for joiners so your comment regarding us putting commercial interests first is completely wrong.  Thank you for taking the time to rate us. It helps us to be the best we can be!!! Austin

title: Great Budget Hotel
review: I stayed for 8 nights and what a pleasure ! Rooms great . Staff goes out of their way to assist . The assistant manager Mr Touch even assisted me activated an International simcard . Wow , how is that for service ? I will recommend this hotel any time ! Like said in previous reviews, walking distance to beach . The Hotel provides maps and a pocket guide of Pattaya which makes it very easy to get to places of interest. Will for sure go back there .

title: Great hotel for families with kids
review: Dear Valued guest, I am really happy to see you enjoyed your stay with us. I am particularly happy to see that's our service was suitable to your needs. Your comments are very motivational for the team here and thank you for taking the time to rate us. We hope to see you again in the future. Best Regards, Austin

title: bob syme newborough australia
review: A great hotel for budget travellers. Good location as most of the attractions and eating places are walking distance on the Main pattaya road. To reach the beach front you can walk through the soi 6 which is just opposite the hotel main road which is like a MINI WALKING STREET as lot of GOGO bars are located here. The soi is vibrant and lively all through the night. The hotel is neat, with good staff and clean rooms. the breakfast spread is very good. For Indian travellers reaching Pattaya early in the morning, they need to wait for the room as the check in time is 2 o'clock and rarely does the hotel give an early check in. So try to reach pattaya by noon.

title: WORST hotel experience ever
review: It was rain last night, our room gets flooded, and we waken up 2 AM! All our bags shoes get damaged.  The manager has very bad attitude, the only thing he could say is “HE COULD NOT STOP THE RAIN!” feel no sorry for us!  With few minutes augments he just walked away from us, without solution.

title: Customer service needs attention
review: Dear Valued guest, You stayed in the hotel for a few nights without incident until the last night when the whole of Pattaya experienced a freak storm and FLOODED!!. There was a typhoon off the coast. During your stay ALL guests were inconvenienced. We managed as best as we could and we ensured flood water didn't enter the hotel. My management report shows that you demanded compensation for the inconvenience of the rain. In this situation the team here go out of their way to make the customers comfortable and given that I was here to witness this in the early morning of your final night stay I can vouch that my comments are true. We did this for all guests. We don't control the weather. AND we certainly don't refund the cost of a room because it rains.  Best Regards, Austin

title: Not upto the mark
review: Whilst location and resort itself was very nice, the biggest letdown was the customer service.  At check in staff seemed bored and did not explain any of facilities the hotel had to offer or where breakfast was. Susi at tour desk was great and very helpful. We booked a 2 bedroom room which was an interconnecting room and the rooms were very nice and modern. Pool quite small and poolside service was hit and miss. Wifi service worked well and you could walk to beach, about a 10 min walk.  Convenience store and laundry service all a couple of minutes walk.  Big C shopping is about a 10 min walk or just catch baht bus.

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: Dear Valued guest, I am sorry to see that the customer service wasn't up to standard. Please trust that I will investigate this fully and it is my aim to have an outstanding level of service here at Centara Pattaya Hotel. I thank you for your comments and I hope we can welcome you back to the hotel again in the future. Best Regards, Austin

title: Pretty good hotel in pattaya
review: Booked through yatra, we did not find our stay very comfortable at this hotel. The accommodation was cramped with very poor view through the windows. The staff also had a very detached attitudeand not at all forthcoming to help.Yes, the location is good.

title: Centara Pattaya Excellent Location Great service
review: we stayed at this hotel for 3 days , big rooms , clean , big pool , huge bathroom , 7/11, pubs  are very near ,   All in all an excellent experience in this hotel  Not recommended for family with children, as lot of night activity near by

title: First class staying inPattaya
review: Dear Valued guest, Its great to see that you enjoyed your experience at our hotel. Its also nice to see that you took the time to let us know of your satisfaction. This is greatly motivational to the team here. We hope to see you again. Best regards, Austin

title: Best Hotel to visit in Pattaya
review: I spent four nights here at the end of Aug. the hotel is very clean and modern, the rooms, likewise,, nice and big, esp the beds. For me, i judge a hotel on the bathroom, clean four piece with huge walkin shower! liked it so much, i booked an extra night on my return two weeks later before flying home. one negative, would be the wifi, but then you're prob doing Pattaya wrong if wifi is your biiggest concern! tthe location is good, set back a bit from Walking st, but only a2 min tuktuk away. The best thing i would say is the staff. Everybody is very friendly, and ever so helpful. in particular i would like to say huge Thank you to the Lovely Suzi, who coul not have been more helpful.

title: good hotel, great location, bad wifi reception
review: Dear valued guest, I am greatly appreciative of your comments and thanks for taking the time to let us know. I am particularly happy to see that you enjoyed your stay and I do hope you can stay again with us in the future. Best Regards Austin

title: Overall the welcome hospitality was quite good. The Thai traditional food testy servant at the restaurant were well organized ch
review: Four Star rated hotel with excellent services rendered. from penny to pen they have got your every daily requirement and things fulfilled. it has got best gymnastic machines with expert trainer for guidance. they have got one of the best chef, would make a la carte menu according to your taste. Rooms are beyond excellency. Just a 20 second walk from Pattaya Beach.

title: Centara.  Pattaya
review: Stayed in the Centara for 19 days in August,  very very clean hotel,and an amazing display put on for breakfast. Very helpful staff throughout the hotel, ,got a lot off help and advice from the receptionist, Bum and Neam. Had good laughs,also a special thanks to Suzi at excursion desk ( hope she passes her exams ). Hotel is in the best position in Pattaya. Many many thanks,  will be back

title: Fantastic hotel in a great location
review: Dear valued guest, We really appreciate your positive comments. Often it is human nature to enjoy thier holiday experience but never take the time to give the positive feedback. I am extremely grateful that you took time out to rate us. Our staff here will be very appreciative also. Please stay with us again in the future of you visit Pattaya. Best regards, Austin

title: Would recommend and stay again
review: Myself, my partner and another couple booked to stay in this hotel for our first trip to Thailand for 2 weeks.  The staff were fantastic especially susie, jonny and pol. The rooms were spacious and very clean. The hotel is situated perfectly ; on a much quieter Road away from the busy part's of Pattaya yet only a 2 minute walk to all the action. Breakfast was brilliant with lots to choose from.  Would Definitely come back next time

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear valued guest, Your stay with us was quite a long one!! Given how long you stayed its great to see you experienced consistency of service over that time. I apologize for the situation with the bed corners. This is, I am afraid, an issue of design but we have  adjusted to positioning of beds to minimize impact. I also appreciate your positive comments on the staff here. I believe this is a true point of difference between us and our competitors here in Pattaya. I hope you can visit us again in the future when you are next in Pattaya. Best Regards Austin

title: Returning Visit ; Second Stay
review: We stayed for 25 nights and would recommend and return again. We booked a family suite but it was as others have described a twin room and king size bedroom with inter connecting door but it was fine . The wooden bed surround is lethal  and we all ended up with bruises as it protrudes and space is tight so be aware. The feather topper and comfy pillows made the beds extremely comfortable . Only one english movie channel which was disappointing ..The hotel staff were excellent especially Johnny, Pol, Susie , Os ,  Nick and Pat the room maid. There are a lot of tour groups so it is espeically busy at breakfast time and late afternoon around the pool but lovely / peaceful the rest of the time. The bed linen and towels are changed daily automatically unless you put a card on the…

title: Nice Hotel
review: I went along with my friends and stayed there 3 days, its very nice, clean hotel no smell. Good swimming pool, plus very good location as well, near to beach, very closed to market.  Over all very good experience.

title: Very Comfortable and SAFE
review: Dear Valued Guest, We appreciate you taking the time to rate our hotel. I am especially pleased to see you enjoyed your stay. Our staff do try their best to provide very personalized service for all our guests and I am pleased to see also that you enjoyed this part of our service. Please stay with us again in the future when you next come to Pattaya. Best Regards, Austin

title: Clean, Friendly great option.
review: Excellent hotel in terms of cleanliness, security and comfort. Choose this hotel for your peace of mind. Hotel is close to beach, shops, bars and restaurants. Loved the pillows. Very Friendly staff at reception and in particular at hotel information center.

title: Disappointed
review: Dear Valued guest, I am glad to see you enjoyed your stay. I am particularly happy to see that you enjoyed the safety that our property has to offer too. This is an important aspect of every guest stay. Thank you for rating us and hope you can visit again soon. Best Regards Austin

title: Excellent Staff
review: On a golf trip and stayed here. Clean, big rooms, decent breakfast, close to 24 hour McDonalds if you stay out too late.  Very good value for a Thai Hotel and the level.  Apparently I need more characters for this review although I feel I have said it all.

title: A gem in Pattaya.
review: Thank you for a fantastic stay at your hotel in March for 15 nights.ALL the staff couldnt do enough always smiling,any nigly problems i had where sorted out with effiency.Great breakfast to choose from.bit annoying in the morning when you get a load of tourists just stopping for breakfast but they dont stay that long,although quite a few are ignorant to the breakfast staff but a quiet word in there direction soon shut them up.Hope the same staff are there when i come again this Sept for 15 nights.Would be an even better stay if they played more Thai Traditional music through there PA system.If i wanted to to hear indian music,then i would have went to Mubai or Delhi.After all we are in In Thailand L.O.S.Rooms are excellent so to are the Housekeeping Staff.You are only 5-10 min…

title: Almost, if not perfect!
review: Dear Valued guest, Its nice to see another happy customer and we do appreciate your comments. We don't claim to be perfect but we do try our best. I hope to see you again here at Centara Pattaya  hotel in the future. Best Regards, Austin

title: fantastic hotel
review: My wife loved the king's bed. the beddings were absolutely comfortable - she slept through soundly every nite of the short 3-nite stay there. We went there right after our stay in a renowned hotel in Bangkok. We paid more than twice of what we paid for Centara, yet the room & amenities were not half as good as Centara. We got a top floor (level 8) room with balcony overlooking the pool. Everything in the room is perfect! All the amenities we needed were there - in-room safe, hairdryer, fridge and FREE wifi! Wifi connection is always good and auto-connect every time we returned to the room. Just 1 password for the entire stay. The bathroom had both a bathtub and separate shower cubicle with hand-held shower! The water pressure was good. Here i had a little negative feedback -…

title: Terrible Service!
review: Dear valued guest, Thank you for your positive feedback. From time to time the positive comments are very motivational for the team. I appreciate you taking the time to let us know of your positive experience. Please visit us again soon if you have the time or are indeed in Pattaya. Best regards, Austin

title: jeff &susan
review: Been to this hotel three times now and it is just as good as my previous visits. June/July before I went I sent an e-mail requesting the same room and was given the room on checking in bell boys remembered me from my other visits room very large and spotless maids done a great job.Food is very good and not very expensive with a good choice of Thai and western dishes never made breakfast so cant comment ( to many late nights) The girls on the tour desk were really helpful I had an issue and had to return home early the girls done everything booked flights etc so thanks to the girls again. Always lots of sunbeds and the pool bar guys were always on had for drinks. This hotel suits couples,singles and family groups. One tip please tip the staff they work really hard to make sure…

title: Thoroughly Recommend
review: Had a great stay at this hotel from 28 May to 10 June. Previous reports praising the staff are 100% accurate as they went out of their way to be friendly, helpful and courteous. Rooms were very comfortable and bathroom was excellent with a great walk in shower. Food in restaurant was excellent and not too expensive. Great value hotel in the low season.

title: Perfection
review: Dear valued guest, Your positive comments are appreciated! Thank you sincerely for taking the time to rate us. In particular I am happy to see that you found our prices to be reasonable. This is an area we try our hardest. I will post your comments at our staff canteen and this will be highly appreciated by our team her. Hope to see you again. Best regards, Austin

title: Excellent
review: My 2 friends and I stayed at Centara Pattaya for 10 nights 28th May-7th June.  Firstly thank you to every single individual that has anything to do with Centara Pattaya, every tiny think everyone has done made my holiday magical.  This was my first trip to Thailand and I could not have dreamed it to be better.  I would like to personally thank a few employees: Bow, pol, joss, johnny thank you for keeping the cocktails and room service coming all hours of the day and night, I was never once left hungry or thirsty :)!!!  A very special thank you to Susi the tour desk manager. She catered for all our individual and group needs, she has an excellent way of reading people and knowing what they want.  The hotel manager ( forgive me I cannot remember his name) he welcomed us will open…

title: Bob Syme Newborough Australia
review: Dear valued guest, Thank you for taking the time to rate us. I am very happy to see you enjoyed your stay and also happy to see you valued the spirit of our team here. This is the "point of difference" we try to have in the Pattaya market place. We would love to see you again at Centara Pattaya Hotel in the future. Best regards, Austin

title: Nice property, good location...
review: We have just returned from our stay at Centara Pattaya Hotel where we stayed for 16 days. The manager Austin and Executive Assistant Ja were very helpful. Ja even showed us around on her day off. The hotel staff, cleaners and chef were all great and very polite. The travel agents Susi and Pat were very helpful with taxis and advice. The rooms at the hotel were very comfortable and clean and the aircon was great. The hotel also had easy access to money exchanges, 4 7eleven stores, doctor's surgery across the lane and great foot massages. The gym and pool area have toilets and showers and it was always sparkling clean. The breakfast was good and catered for all nationalities. We found our stay was great and having an Aussie manager with a wealth of experience made our day. He even…

title: Two Centara Hotels in the Vicinity
review: We told our tour operator that we were staying at Centara Pattaya. Now ordinarily, that information would have been enough. Except that there was another Centara hotel in the vicinity. So we were taken to Centara Grand Mirage Hotel only to be told that we were not booked with them. That added to our confusion. A quick frantic calls made us realize that we had reached the wrong hotel. This did not end here. The next day our tour operator's staff called us to say that she wanted to meet us and she was waiting in the lobby. We scanned the lobby but did not find her. Half an hour later, she calls again, and this time we tell her that we can't find her. A few minutes (with the help of a Thai interpreter) we figured out that she was waiting at the other hotel. Now this can be quite…

title: Made my trip! Thank You!
review: Dear Valued Guest, Actually there are 3 Centara hotels in the vicinity. I am sorry that there was some confusion in finding the hotel. I understand all too well how painful that must be after  a long flight. We have clear directions listed with all agents. I will continue to follow up on this important issue. I am glad to see you enjoyed the hotel though and I do hope you can stay again with us. Best regards, Austin

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: We stayed recently stayed for 10 nights, 28th of May. I can not fault anything! The room was amazing, the facilities, restaurant, all outstanding. The pillows where amazing! I must find out where to get them! What really made this trip special were the staff. Extremely friendly and helpful and always so cheerful and full of smiles. They made us feel very welcome. Keep an eye out for Bow, Pol and Joss, awesome bar and restaurant staff. Gave us heaps of helpful tips and showed us around a bit. if you need to book any tours make sure you go see the tour desk, Susi is the lady who runs it and can get you some some great deals on tours! A very fun and friendly lady too! The front desk, house keeping and management time where all very nice and accommodating, always asked how our stay…

title: Nach G Ghuma Group - Shekhar Joshi
review: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive comments. I am very pleased and actually quite proud that our team could have such a positive impact on your stay. Its fantastic that the team here could add value to your holiday and I am sure they will be happy to see your comments. Do visit us again in the future if you have time. Best regards, Austin

title: Thank you :-)
review: From the moment we are arrived at this hotel the staff could not have been friendlier.We had a slight delay in checking in and were taken to wrong rooms but the staff quickly sorted the situation out and apologised profusely. Our room was large and clean, the beds were wonderfully comfortable and the air conditioning was excellent. The bathroom was huge with a powerful walk in shower, it was also spotlessly clean.The only problems we had with the room were the lights and the tv. The room lights seemed to have a mind of their own and would regularly start flashing off and on at 4 or 5 in the morning.This was pretty irritating and several times we had to take our room key out of the wall, turning the power off so we could sleep.The downside of this being that we had to sleep…

title: AVOID THIS HOTEL ,  AT ALL COSTS .
review: I have been lavish in my praise of good hotel , such as the Shangri La . This was an awful experience. Reasonably no stars can be applicable to this place. Breakfast is an odd experience , there was rice , some salad and two curry dishes which the mainly indian guests found acceptable , however the pork dish was there for 3 days and not removed till it was rancid. Eggs are brought in cold ,  pre cooked   , and placed in a container heated by a single candle , when i pointed out they were cold , i was told they need time to heat up [ yuk] , bacon strips [ about 1 cm wide] pre cooked  and dried out are placed in a similar container. Food this poorly prepared belongs in a prison -not a hotel. Sugary  squash not fruit juice , every  expense spared by the hotel . I did reasonably…

title: Value For Money & Good Location
review: Dear Dave, Its disappointing to see that you didn't enjoy the hotel. I am sorry to see this. Please allow me to apologize directly to you for this. I would like , however to clarify a few points. 1. The dress code for the pool is clearly sign posted at pool entry. 2. Showers are available next the pool and also clearly sign posted. 3. The pool is perfectly cleaned on a daily basis. The water is very clear and tested daily. 4. As you can see in other reviews our breakfast is very well received by all our guests. Our Restaurant Manager spent considerable time with you to ensure your eggs were catered for.  5. You can also see that there are no complaints from any other guest regarding air-conditioning noise although I will admit that sometimes the equipment can fail and we will room move any guest who is inconvenienced. 6. We are indeed a four star product and not of the same standard as some of the more expensive 5 star hotels. We don't claim otherwise. 7. The tour desk and Spa pricing is very competitive in the market place of Pattaya and on many occasions cheaper than other comparative hotels. I am hopeful that some of my feedback can clarify some of the issues for you. We do strive to keep all our guests happy and comfortable!! Best regards Austin

title: Comfortable two nights
review: Good clean room with all amenities and a nice balcony with a ocean view at a distance. Many bars, shops and massages near by. The beach is just 200 metres away. The staff is very warm and efficient. They were kind enough to give a room at 10 am when the check in was at 2pm.

title: Good Hotel but lousy House Keeping
review: Dear Valued guest, Its pleasing to see that you enjoyed your stay at Centara Pattaya Hotel. We do appreciate your feedback and I hope we can see you again in the future! Best regards Austin

title: Improved
review: The hotel is situated near Soi 6 on second road in busy Pattaya.  We were early and reached hotel atound 1030am but were accommodated well.  Location is very strategic,  5 min walk to beach through Soi6 or Soi 6/1. 7/11 is also near by giving options to purchase stuff if one finds hotel being expensive  Breakfast has quite a few options, was surprised to see full asian veg section as seperate near pool area.  Staff were good, front desk helpfull and little pool bar staff being cheerful. He made some really nice smoothies. Taste and presentation was perfect.   Internet was free in room and speed was good for an skype chat.  Overall satisfied with the comfortable and enjoyable stay in this hotel

title: Great place to stay
review: I've spent 3 nights at this hotel and it was very good. The staff was very hospitality warm welcoming and English speaking. I took a cooking lesson with the hotel chef (Nan) and enjoyed it very much, actually it was kind of private lesson because I was the only student. The rooms are big, clean and tidy. The bathroom is clean. Location of the hotel is on the parallel road of the shore road and a walking distance from the sea. Next to the hotel is a very good massage (foot, body etc.) and a laundry trolley. You get fine value for money.

title: Outside Noise
review: Dear Valued guest, Its lovely to see you enjoyed your stay and we are glad to be of service! I hope you can visit us again in the near future. Yours Sincerely, Austin

title: Superb Rooms and Nice stay
review: We stayed at this Hotel from son kran April 2013 for 2 weeks, the hotel has set up a bar on the pavement outside the rooms, this seemed nice, but the extremely load music started at 6.30 in the morning was quite during the day, built up at night, the volume increased after 12.00 midnight till 4 or 5 in the morning, the people at the desk assured us this was only during the festival. true they are not playing music early in the morning, but the volume of noise all night till 4.00 is horrendous. the Hotel for a 3 star is ok, rooms are getting very worn, we will be glad to get home to have a good nights sleep. we have stayed at most hotels in Pattaya and enjoy the evenings out, this looked a great area to stay, but even on holiday I would like the choice of sleeping before 4 in the…

title: Perfect stay in centara pattaya
review: Dear valued guest, The Songkran festival period is indeed a noisy one for the whole of Pattaya. Many of the guests at this time travel specifically to experience this. Frankly, this is Thailand over the Songkran festival period an no fault of our hotel at all. The other 400 guests at our hotel enjoyed the experience. You will note that none of the other guest comments have complained at this hotel regarding noise..........EVER. To avoid this problem I recommend you travel at another period. I will happily accept any fair and constructive feedback from any of our guests but in this case I am sorry to say your comments are not fair at all!  Sincerely, Austin

title: Welcome Oasis!
review: We had a a super stay in the Centara Pattaya for 3 nights from 22nd to  25th April 2013. The family room was very well designed with a separate sitting area, large bed and a separate room for the 2 kids with a bunk bed. The kids loved it. The service was nice and helpful. The food was decent compared to other Thai hotels as they had some Indian food as well. The location is convenient, quite near to Big C and various fast food hotels especially some Indian hotels. The beach is a 7-10 min walk across the lane. Travelling is easy in Pattaya as you can hire a tuk-tuk for 10 Baht on the beach road and the second road.

title: Superb service
review: We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite and we were a little surprised that there was no living area it was just 2 connecting bedrooms but they were very nice and spacious and very clean, the breakfast was quite good and the swimming was a little small but adequate and there were plenty of sunloungers but best of all were the staff, reception, bar staff , restaurant waitresses and room maids were all superb some of the best service I've ever had in Thailand where the standard of service is always high any way, they were all extremely helpful and very friendly I would definitely recommend this hotel to others and come back myself without hesitation .

title: A Gem Of A Hotel !!!
review: Dear Sir, Thanks for taking the time to rate us. I appreciate you positive comments and rest assured I will pass this on to the team. I hope you can visit us again when you are next in Pattaya. All my best, Austin

title: Good value
review: Hi Friends,   We stayed at the Centara Pattaya for 4 nights somtime back and had a wonderful experience. The hotel was excellent in every possible way. I had done a lot of research before choosing this one and all of it turned out to be true. The pros and cons below :  Pros  1) The location was ideal to enjoy our holiday. Almost on the main road. Just get on a tuk tuk (pay 10 bhat) and go where you want. The beach is a short 7-10 min walk away.  2) Most popular fast food dining outlets like McD, Burger King, P Hut etc are nearby. 3) Its almost on 2nd Road, which is very lively. Night life just next door at Soi 6. 4) We checked in late in the evening after a long flight/drive and were immediately upgraded to a 1-bedroom Suite that was quite spacious. 2 tv's. Large bed/bath room…

title: Nice place in Pattaya!!!
review: Dear Valued Guest, thank you so much for your detailed comments. This is very valuable for us! I am glad you enjoyed your experience here and we look forward to welcoming you back when you next visit Pattaya. All our best Austin

title: Peaceful stay at Centara Pattaya
review: Great hotel with good service in a central location. We stayed in many hotels in Pattaya before and my experience is that it is not the hotel which makes the difference, it is the people who manage and work there what makes the difference. The Australian Manager was very helpfull and his team provided us a fantastic get away weekend. Thank you

title: Overall nice and convenient
review: The hotel was relatively new and rooms were quite clean. Its location was also convenient. Free wifi was available inside the room. The breakfast was satisfactory. Swimming pool was a small one. We encountered two problems with the rooms. First, we had two non-smoking rooms but one of them had some smell of smoke, making us feel less comfortable. Another minor problem was that some of the door locks of the rooms were not smooth and so some extra effort was needed to lock and unlock the doors.

title: Best value for money hotel without doubt in pattaya
review: Dear Sir, Thank youfor taking the time to rate us. I am very happy that you enjoyed your stay. I hope to see you again here in the future. Kind Regards Austin

title: bob syme newborough australia
review: I find this hotel lives up to the centara group standard in some cases surpasses it staff  from waiters /reception /bellboys etc very helpful,food good will be stopping again, going home Tuesday  will be sorry to leave

title: My stop in Centara Pattaya Hotel by Damian Adie
review: Dear Sir, I am glad to see you enjoyed our hotel and it was very nice to meet you. I hope you can visit us again when you next come to Pattaya. All my best, Austin

title: OK for Group Tour
review: l stayed at the centara  pattaya hotel from the 13th of december to the 10of jan 2013 it is the sixth time l have stayed in 12 months the rooms are spotless the house cleaners are all very friendly a special thanks to jum she was great . Breakfast was in the price and you had a big chose to pick from.The door staff are all friendly and helpfull a big thanks to mr pom.The reception staff make you welcome.The hotel is in a good location.A big thanks to the public relations manager ann for her help in booking me in over the xmas break because they are flat out Going back in may and l will only stay at the centara hotel

title: Excellent SPA!
review: Obviously its a good hotel, 10 minutes way from the beach. We requested for a studio and pleasantly surprised that a studio has  a living room, additional room for  kids and 2 television. Most of the tourists were Chinese and Russians. For the price we paid, it was a good bargain! Staff were ok, SPA not to be missed.

title: Nice hotel with lovely decor.
review: Dear Sir, Thank you for giving us your feedback. I am happy to see you enjoyed our Spa and its great that you enjoyed your stay. I do hope you can visit us again in the future. Please take care Austin

title: Stay at Pattaya
review: Quite a nice hotel with lovely decor. Excellent location, only 10 mins from the beach. Staff are quite friendly. However we specifically requested a bath tub and a king sized bed only to be given a room with no bath tub and 2 x queens sized beds instead. We were told that the king sized beds were sold out but after checking further, they were not sold out and we were promptly moved to another room with a bath tub and king sized bed. We were happy with this new room. Not sure why the staff at the front desk said that in the first place. The rooms have interconnecting doors with the room next door and no lock on this door, therefore we were a little worried about our privacy and security of our valuables - but there is a safe. Breakfast buffet is ok, quite a nice selection of…

title: Wonderful hotel!
review: Dear Sir, Thank you for taking the time to review us and I am glad to see you enjoyed your stay. I hope you can visit us again soon. Best regards, Austin

title: Value for money...Would surely return back...
review: This is an exellent hotel. Excellent lobby and friendly staff. Breakfat area is near the pool. Provides very good spread. Wish hotel had provided some Indian food during breakfast.. Rooms are very well furnished. Hotel provides free internet service.

title: happy stay- Will come back
review: Nice hotel.Initially little hard to find the hotel. Not big rooms but descent. Very clean ambience. The room service was amazing- one phone call and things will be at your door in a minute. I was really happy to spend 2 nights. Did not try the hotel breakfast as we could get good meal for a better price elsewhere. Close walk to beach and Alcazar show. New hotel. Trust me their staff were very friendly , cooperative and smiling faces all time(this is very hard to see in Thailand).  Cons: Neighbour was noisy during the day(Arabic single men) , but they were quiet during the nights.The rooms were A and B (attached) so their noise level was little high. Rooms were smaller but comfortable.

title: Comfortable and well positioned hotel....but hard to find!
review: Dear Sir, I am very glad you enjoyed the service and product we offer her at Centara Pattaya Hotel. I have posted your comments to the team here and they are very happy that you enjoyed your stay too. Please visit us again in the future! We would love to welcome you again as our guest. Best regards, Austin

title: Not worth at all
review: As frequent travellers to Pattaya this was our first time at the Centara Pattaya Hotel. The hotel itself is modern and comfortable and the staff friendly and helpful. Finding the place was a different matter! We travelled from Bkk by car and even with our GPS, and a hard copy map from the website, it was impossible to locate without stopping and asking locals for directions. The small Soi it is located in is congested and busy with both car and bus traffic. However once we were in the basement carpark we had no further need of the vehicle. The hotel is about two city blocks from the beach and most shopping and restaurants are easy to walk to. The tour desk helped with our out-of-town excursions.

title: Great place, close to beach
review: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. The team and I are happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. I hope you can visit us again when you are next in Pattaya. Please take care, Austin

title: Great location, value for money
review: I stayed in this hotel from 2nd Jan 13 to 7th Jan 13 in family studio. First of all this hotel mostly caters to travel groups and it seems that they are not interested  in individual customers at all. Rooms are big and comfortable but the good things end here. Their housekeeping is worst and not at all satisfactory. During our stay it was never perfect and pointing this problem to the front desk , we got the very stubborn reply which was good for nothing. The staff does not know the world polite and are extremely  rude and rough. Throughout our stay toothbrush in toilet were never replaced and housekeeping people were always trying to not change the bedsheets. WIFI is at par with hotel staff's attitude and works very slow and irregularly. After trying a lot I am still not able…

title: great hotel
review: This is my second visit to this hotel just back after 15 days great hotel and a very good location.Rooms big and clean staff are fantastic food is also very good. I had sent an e-mail before i went requesting the same room as my last visit and was given the same room I arrived at 9.30am after a long flight from the UK and was given my room right away (fantastic) good for family,couples or on your own nice pool lots of sun beds never had a problem getting one this is the only hotel i will use when going to Pattaya so thank you to all the staff for helping me have a great holiday.

title: Nice Hotel!
review: Dear Sir, Thank you for taking the time to review us on Tripadvisor. Feedback is important for us to improve our standards or indeed when positive comments like yours, motivate our team to continue their hard work. For us it is pleasing to know you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again in the future when you visit Pattaya. Kind Regards Austin

title: Shocking behaviour of housekeeping staff
review: My first impression of the hotel was not good!!  The room was not as clean as rooms usually are I had to ask at reception if they would send someone to clean the shower as there is no way the glass etc had been cleaned as it had all scum marks all over it, they did come and clean it!  Also I did wonder what kind of hotel has a note to say that if bedsheets are left soiled there would be an extra charge - what goes on in this hotel!!!  It would not be a place I would take my family or recommend to families, the hotel is ok for families but the location is not for a family.  Families would be better staying at the next bay Jomtien Beach are as it is not as seedy as Pattaya Beach.  However all the staff at the hotel were really friendly.  The tour desk were happy to help with any…

title: five star service for 4* budget!! and reliable safe and v friendly
review: Dear Sir, We really appreciate you taking the time to review our hotel. I am pleased to see you enjoyed your stay. I do hope that if you visit Pattaya again in the future you can stay with us again. Best Regards Austin

title: good
review: For the first time I'm seeing housekeeping staff misbehaving with guests.  instead of waiting  for the guests to leave the house keeping staff (Aewo) Walks in and says that they have no time and please " vacate the room now " even when one is staying for a longer period of time. When told  that she's being rude she says "You can go and complain at the reception"

title: Great hotel, great staff & great overall experience
review: I stayed in this hotel with a group of lads from late Nov to early Dec and there is only one word that best describes the experience... Wonderful.  The hotel was of a very good standard with the rooms being of a modern look and the hotel generally very clean it was definitely a good find. The hotel boasts of a good fitness area and an excellent pool.  With that it is in easy reach of the beach and restaurants it was a sheer delight to have stayed in this hotel.  Last but not least I would like to give a special mention to Suzi who was the tour desk manager. She was very welcoming and would take it upon herself to even act as guest relations when needed. Suzi booked for us many fun filled excursions and If it wasn't for her our trip may not have been this enjoyable. Thanks for…

title: Wonderful Stay Experience with Family
review: Hello, We appreciate you taking the time to give us your positive feedback. I am pleased you enjoyed your stay and I do hope you are able to visit us again when you are next in Pattaya. Kind regards Austin

title: Nice hotel, value for money
review: I stayed at this hotel on 25th & 26th of November 2012 with my family. I booked a Studio poolside room on 7th Floor with free breakfast offer. It was really spacious with Two LCD TV's & spacious bathroom (specially loved the kid accommodation space). Friendly stuff , restaurant at ground floor & buffet breakfast is pretty good.  Only con stuff were it's a little far from beach & there were accumulated water in front of main gate for quite a while as it rained so was difficult to get in.  I will stay here again if go to Pattaya.  Really worth the money...

title: 2nd stay at Centara
review: Dear Sir, thank you for your comments. We appreciate all feedback. I have informed the team here of your positive comments, which they appreciate very much. I was especially pleased to see that you enjoyed the time here with your family as well. I hope you have the opportunity to visit us again. Best regards Austin

title: bob syme newborough australia
review: I stayed in Centara Pattaya Hotel for 2 nights. It is nice property with friendly service. It is in close by main attractions in Pattaya. Rooms are big and comfortable with nice balcony facing pool side. It is good hotel to stay with friends and family. Food was good.

title: Decent Hotel and Service, Good Value for Pattaya
review: We booked a room with additional bunk beds for kids. Initially, we were given a room in the main wing, with had an additional sofa bed instead of bunk beds for kids. Changed to a room with bunk beds as the sofa bed was far from comfortable. The new room was great and kids liked their bunk beds. The bathroom was on the smaller side and could have been better designed. This room was clean and the beds comfortable.The buffet breakfast would get you going. The price we payed was good value for Pattaya.

title: good
review: Hello, I am glad your family enjoyed the bunk bed rooms. Its good to know you enjoyed your stay with us and I hope you can visit us again soon. I do appreciate your comments re value as well. At Centara Pattaya Hotel our first priority is to keep prices low without detracting from service standards. Best Regards Austin

title: Great value, great location, very nice staff
review: Hello, I am glad you enjoyed your stay at our hotel, I hope you can visit again in the future. I do appreciate you taking the time to rate us. Kind Regards, Austin

title: All Round Excellence
review: The room was clean and luxurious the staff helpfull and friendly , we used the pool bar and resturant ,not the cheapest but very good quality. The Breakfast buffet was fantastic with so much choice form indian food to the usual continental & Thai.  A short 5 min walk to the beach 10 mins to the ladyboy shows and a very short 10 bart pick up ride away from walking street.  I would highly recomend this hotel for location and value. I stayed in a quiet room at the top of the hotel which was fantastic.

title: Good service hotel
review: I stayed there last week with my wife for holiday. We were impressed with the cheerful and smiley attitude of the staff upon arrival.
