The staff  responded to our requests positively and promptly. We requested to change room in order to get a better view over the balcony. The staff did as requested without questioning. They also provided us breakfast boxes with drinks, fruits and sandwich on our departure day when we had to leave too early before breakfast started. They cared their customers. I like this hotel. Will come again.

title: Average hotel. Has two wings. Staff not very friendly
review: Dear Sir, I am glad you enjoyed the service standard we offer and thank you for your positive feedback. I have informed my team here and they are very proud that you had a positive experience here at the hotel. I hope you can visit us again soon. Kind Regards, Austin

title: Not as good as the other Centara hotels
review: After check in at the counter, the staff did not even bother to tell us that our rooms are in the new wing of the Hotel, because of which, 19 of us in the group ended up going up in search of our room in the old block where the Hotel reception is.  After that the room boys who brought the luggage to the rooms were asking my children to get tips from their dad!!! So I decided, to hell with tips to these creeps.  Quality of rooms were just ok.  Breakfast was ok  Property is way far from the Walking street. But is very close to the place where they have the Al Cazar show (The famous Lady Boys' show)

title: pretty good hotel with minor gripes
review: Dear Sir, Thank you for your feedback. When your group arrived at the hotel your tour escort was clearly informed of room locations within the hotel. This is standard practice for all group arrivals. Its great that you have informed us of this issue because we will follow up with all tour leaders to ensure the correct information is passed on to the guests. I hope to see you again at the hotel soon. Take care Austin

title: Staff named Golf, very nice!!!!
review: After having visited three other Centara hotels (all five stars) I might have had to high expectations on this hotel which has "only" four stars.  The hotel is a little run down but clean enough and the rooms are big. The hotel lies close to some bars so expect quite a lot of noise if you sit on the balcony. There is a small inner yard with a pool area and a bar plus a restaurant. Enough to kill an hour or two. This is not the kind of hotel where you hang around as you will get bored quite quickly. The hotel is excellent if you just need a decent place to sleep and as a base to explore the areas around Pattaya.  If I go to Pattaya again I will stay at Hilton or the other Centara hotel in Pattaya instead.

title: new quality 4 star hotel
review: good 4 star hotel near central shopping .....rooms and fittings are good...bed and pillows are good....balcony is small but ok for smokers....room staff were great and nothing was a problem...in fact all staff were great....special mention to the doormen who were always happy to help...i believe the manager is australian and he should be proud of his staff training...it shows in a number of small ways....breakfast was good.....recommended....

title: Perfect!
review: Hello, Yes we are quite new. The hotel has only been complete for 5 months. We are still perfecting our facilities but I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us. I appreciate you taking the time to give us the positive feedback. This helps the team and is valuable for me also. Pattaya is a great place and I am happy you enjoyed the destination and the hotel services which we provide. Please visit us again soon when you have the time. Best Regards, Austin

title: "Excellent Hotel, Good Location"
review: Very nice hotel, just 10 minutes to Soi Buakhao. The hotel is new, with large rooms and nice furnitures. The bathroom was new, clean and nice. The swimming pool is very suggestive. When I went there there were not many customers, so the restaurant and the bar were empty. But I think in the future everything will be ok.

title: Good hotel.
review: Hello there, I am very happy that our new hotel exceeded your expectations. All of the team do try to be "perfect" in all that we do for our customers but often this is very difficult to do. I am glad that in this case we were able to achieve this for you during your stay. Its also rewarding for us to have our achievements recognised by our valued guests. Please visit us again soon. Best Regards, Austin

title: Excellent!
review: Stayed with family in the last week of October 2012. Impressed with good ambiance, friendly staff, clean rooms, wide variety morning breakfast, excellent small balcony area, great dining area adjacent to swimming pool with crystal clear blue water, complimentary Wi-Fi internet access, extremely good "Mix-Bistro" all-day dining restaurant and soothing Blu Pool Bar. Pattaya beach is just a 5 minutes walk. Hotel is very close to Alcazar, Central Center Shopping Mall. McDonald, Pizza Hut, KFC, Seven Eleven are nearby located. We recommend this hotel.

title: Good Hotel - Pattaya you get what it says on the tin!!!
review: My daughter and i stayed at the centara pattaya hotel for a week in October, it is a good hotel staff are very helpful and polite, we had Bed & breackfast. The breakfast was available until 10:30 and there was a good choice. We booked through Travel Bag and I would be happy to use their services again, we had booked a taxi transfer to the hotel and the rep was waiting for us as we left the airport, we flew Srilanka air not the most comfortable of seats but it was ok but an hour delay both ways. Our stay in Pattaya was fine it is a very seedy part of Thailand we didn't know what to expect but at no time during our stay did we feel unsafe. We went out  every day and had a great week. We booked trips through Travelbag and received a good service from them. We visited the amazing…

title: great hotel,fantastic location
review: Hello, I am grateful for your comments regarding our hotel. It is very pleasing to see you enjoyed your stay. Thailand is a wonderful place and the people here are amazing. Sorry to hear you may not visit Pattaya again but you still have plenty to explore in the rest of Thailand anyway. Best Regards Austin

title: Relaxing getaway...
review: My mum and I stayed in Centara from the 7-13th Oct. From the moment we checked in to the time we left we experienced nothing but great quality service. Check in was swiftly dealt with with a lovely,sweet iced tea welcome drink, just what was needed after a super long journey! the room was spacious, bright, clean and modern and had everything you need for a comfortable stay, including a well stocked mini bar and tea/coffee facilities, even a complimentary apple :-) The pillows were some of the best I have ever had the pleasure of sleeping on! Every staff member spoke English, some better than others admittedly, though our questions were always answered with hand gestures and smiles. Breakfast was good quality, plenty of choice, though quite Asian influenced (but we didn't come to…

title: Tour Desk Operator
review: Hello there, I appreciate you taking the time to rate and comment on our hotel. Your comments are indeed valued and helpful for us. I am happy that you enjoyed your stay and really glad for your contructive feedback. I am looking forward to meeting you when you are next in Pattaya. Best Regards Austin

title: Nightmaire
review: I stayed in centara from 3rd to 5th oct and had a great time. Our checking was swift and very warm by the reception desk. We were upgraded to a suite which added to a more comfy and pleasurable stay with very good amenities. On 1st day our bath tub had a problem in unplugging but housekeeping was prompt and attended to us smilingly. Breakfast had good options but can do a little more variety in western options as asian fare has immense variety but neverthless good. Great on location as close to beach in walking distance at the same time on a quiet street. Had chosen this hotel based on previous reviews and must say it was a good choice. Would like to definately re visit again in future.

title: Great Hotel in Sin City
review: Stayed at the Centara in September 2012 - a really nice hotel and exceeded my expectations. The hotel is just off 2nd Street in Pattaya and within easy walking distance of the beach front. The hotel is only a short Baht bus ride of Walking Street, which is the main area for the bars and restaurants, this area closes around 4am in the morning sometimes later. The hotel is new and is very well kept, the entrance is clean and open and the reception and concierge  are both friendly and efficient. Aui at the concierge desk was great and went out of his way to help. The rooms are not large, but they are well designed and perfect for spending what time you want to or need to in a bedroom. Balconies are OK and either overlook the pool of the city. If you want a sea view ask for rooms…

title: good hotel wrong location
review: Hello, Its great that you enjoyed our hotel and I hope to see you again soon. Pattaya is a great place with plenty to do. The "sin" side is actually only a very small part of what Pattaya has to offer. Thank you for your feedback. Best Regards Austin

title: Wonderful Time At Centara
review: Stayed from 26/08/2012 for 5 nights: having made a reservation for two rooms,arrived at hotel and hotel reception staff not very friendly or welcoming as if they were not expecting us and made us wait for the rooms and then they felt guilty and provided iced tea. as a family of five we had to book two rooms and they made us think they were doing us a favour by giving one room for two people and allowing the third person for free even though we were already paying for three. rooms very clean, spacious and we appreciated the complimentary water/tea and coffee and fruit which consisted of 2 apples in each room, even though there was 5 persons. Had to ask housekeeping for an extra bath towel. Hotel facilities were good, good pool area but they decided to drain the pool on our last…

title: Excellent....
review: Hello to you from Pattaya, I am sorry you didnt like the location of our hotel. I do recall you arriving earlier than check in time of 2.00 and that was why your room was not quite ready. We do try our best to accomodate all guest requirements and I apologise that we were unable to do so on this occassion. What I do appreciate is that you have taken the time to contact and rate us. If you are ever in Pattaya again I can recommend some other "sister" properties with locations that may suit your travelling needs better. Kind regards Austin

title: happy
review: We were a party of three and we stayed in this property for 2 nights from the 31st August 2012 to 2nd September 2012. We had a wonderful stay at this hotel. Right from the staff to the service everything was well above our expectations. The hotels offers a lot of quality services for the price they are asking. The rooms are simple and spacious and have all the amenities a guest may require. The balcony is a welcome addition so one can enjoy a nice quiet dinner or a quiet moment with a loved one. We had a 2 bedroom deluxe suite and it was more than enough space for 3 individuals.  The breakfast is scrumptious with a dish to please everybody. The favourite part of my visit was the complimentary wifi in the room with superfast speed and smooth connectivity.  Though we couldnt enjoy…

title: Nice hotel. Arrogant service staff. Location could have been better
review: The hotel was nice and new. Well kept and clean with nice accommodation, restaurant and pool area. The bartender at the pool was arrogant and disrespectful (ironically his name was "Joke"). Didn't smile at all even though we requested him to be happy and smile. Reception staff was nice and courteous. Hotel location could have been better though only a couple of blocks away from the beach but very near a mini walking street. Overall would only recommend if you get a good deal

title: Perfect Holiday in a Perfect Hotel - Five Star Experience
review: Dear Sir, As you can see from other comments on this website, the majority are very positive so I am surprised that you didnt enjoy the service provided by our pool bar staff. Your feedback is important to us and I will work hard to improve the consistency. Thank you for taking the time to provide us with the feedback. I hope you can stay with us again in the future. Take care Austin

title: Hotel Centara Pattaya
review: We arrived at the Pattaya Centara on the 9th June 2012 for a weeks holiday.  This is definitely the friendliest and most helpful hotel you could ever have the pleasure of staying at. Right from the moment we arrived until the moment we left we felt like royalty. The rooms are immaculate, as is the rest of the hotel. The food and service are out of this world we even went as far as taking photos of our food! The staff were exceptionally helpful, friendly, always having a smile and making sure we were well looked after.  As for the breakfast, wow ! great selection and again delicious.  The hotel has an amazing trip advisor called Suzi who was invaluable she organised all our trips and offered so much help and advice, not only is she a wonderful person she is truly an asset to the…

title: Brilliant hotel with fantastic service.
review: Dear valued guest, It seems that you had a great stay will us. We are very happy to hear that our service standards and facilities are appreciated. As you know it is is difficult to keep all our guests happy and comfortable all of the time but this is our goal. Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your thoughts and I hope I can welcome you again when you next visit Pattaya. Yours Sincerely, Austin

title: Sawadee-ka to a nice clean hotel
review: Excellent hotel with good facilities......staff amazingly cooperative..especially Mr. Golf....The hotel is centrally located...near the beach as well...close to Shopping areas...Near restaurants... Have a nice SPA and gym facilities....Beautiful swimming pool and gorgeous breakfast... This has really a value for money...

title: Marbulous Trip
review: My first time trip to Thailand and i fall in love with the place.The interior and exterior of the hotel is awesome.The facilities like swimming pool , room service , internet , breakfast was excellent.The most important job for hotel staff is to make their customer happy and they manage to do so . The remarkable point is that the luxury stay make the person happy and same happened with me.  When i would come to Pattaya again i definitely book my stay in Centara Pattaya Hotel. Best of luck for the future to the hotel management.   Kob Khun Krap

title: Nice Place
review: Dear Sir, We value your comments here at Centara Pattaya Hotel and I am very happy to see you enjoyed your stay with us. I hope that you are available to visit us again. My team and I are very appreciative that you took the time to comment on our service and facilities. Take care and hope to see you soon, Austin

title: excellant hotel for family stay
review: I had taken the suite room at this hotel and the size was good. Nice ambiance, soft and neat bedding, nice bathroom ( though the size as per suite room was a bit small) and nice air conditioning.  Though the property is not very big but very ideally located. If you are looking for Vegetarian Items in the menu card then you may be disappointed

title: Exceptional!!!
review: Dear Sir, thank you for taking the time to comment on our hotel. I am glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. I do note your comments regarding vegetarian items. We have vegetarian options on our menu and its unfortunate that you didnt access them. The Thai options in particular are all available as vegetarian. I hope you can visit us again soon. Best regards, Austin

title: Mark from S.C.
review: the hotel was very good with clean and neat new looking rooms. it has very nice swimimg pool and nice lobby.             the room service is quick in service and breakfast was very good.    overall very good hotel to stay at pattaya with family.

title: Darryl from Canada
review: Visited for almost 2 weeks and the staff from the cleaners to the managers were fantastic, After awhile felt like family. Great and diverse Breakfast Buffet (which caters to many cultures), was excellent and a little bit different each day with quite a few selections. Enjoyed the pool area also very relaxing with its 10 foot waterfall (drowns out the city noises). The showers in the rooms are 4 feet by 4 feet and didn't feel confined like some hotels. The bell captains (MR POM) were fantastic and provided great advice about PATTAYA.Hotel is only 6 months old with security cameras etc., allowing me to feel secure. Time flew by...Goodbye Centara and Pattaya

title: so clean
review: Dear Darryl, I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. In particular it pleases me to hear that you liked our breakfast options. We cater for all cultures throught the world and the mix of our guests is very international. I have posted your comments on our staff notice board and all of our team are grateful. I do hope you can visit us again in the future if you are ever coming this way. Yours Sincerely Austin

title: danny from Scotland
review: i stayed 7 night there! wish stay 7 month!!! i like its personel manner specially mr pom he was very nice guy..thank u ... very clean-small but lovely pool-nice breakfast- free of charge guest(it was great in pattaya!!!) all things was great i enjoied and surely come to centara next time bye bye centara  with best regard

title: Cheryl from Australia
review: Dear Sir, I really appreciate you taking the time to review us. I am glad you enjoyed your stay at our new hotel and I am extemely happy that you liked our facilities and staff. Should you ever return to Pattaya I would love to welcome you again to Centara Pattaya Resort. Best Regards Austin

title: Great hotel... A shame about the city...
review: What a fantastic hotel staff do a great job very clean good food and nice rooms cant understand why some people gave this hotel poor reviews.Just back after spending 15 nights there and will be back soon

title: The best hotel service in Thailand
review: My wife and I stayed here last week for three nights.  We had not been to Pattaya before and did not really now what to expect.  Without wanting to prejudge why single guys come to the city, it soon became clear that if it was not for the fabulous staff in the hotel, we would not not have had such a great time.  Reception/bellboy service was welcoming and every day we were greeted with big smiles and offers of help whenever we looked bewildered.  Food good and good value.  Swimming pool great, with staff waiting on us at poolside, with plenty of fresh bright yellow towels.  Finally, we took advantage of the in-house tour desk.  Susy is an absolute star and ensured we were kept busy.  What was really good, was when she even advised us when we could get a cheaper price ourselves,…

title: nice hotel
review: Dear Sir, Wow!!!!!! Thank you for your wonderful feedback. We do try to give the best service we can all the time. I have showed your comments to our staff who are all smiling and feel grateful for your feedback. In this industry it is all too common that we only hear the "negative" so I am very appreciative that you took the time to give us all the wonderful feedback. I hope you can visit us again soon. Best Regards Austin

title: nice hotel
review: the view was pretty dire to be honest but inside the hotel cant find fault. Very nice and clean and amazing air con! 2 min walk from Pattaya beach. Staff were fantastic.

title: Good new hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to rate our new property. It is true that we are very new and we are still completing some of our product. I am particularly glad to hear that you enjoyed the service of the team here. We will always do our level best to give the best personalised service we can. I do hope if you have the opportunity, that you can visit us again. Kind Regards Austin

title: Good to experience this hotel!
review: considering the location, the staff were amazingly helpful and very courteous, and the hotel was very clean

title: Good stay, good food - really enjoyed 2 days there
review: We stayed at Centara Pattaya last week for 2 days and we really liked the hotel, its room and its restaurant and what they serve in breakfast and dinner. I read most of visitors have said bad about their food, but I think if u are a true foodie, then u will love their food, we had dinner there and we really loved the authentic Thai recipes made by them.  The receptionists and the staffs were prompt and helpful, and we liked the ambiance of the hotel very much. It's really good place to stay at Pattaya.

title: Brand new hotel with a slightly beginnings problems
review: Dear Sir, We really appreciate you taking the time to review our new Hotel and service. I am especially pleased to hear of your enjoyment of your time here. Often when guests have a good experience they keep it to themselves so it is great for my team to see your comments. I am particularly happy to hear that you valued our food offer. The truth is that our rates for food and beverage are in comparison to most 4 star products, very inexpensive. I dine her often, as you can imagine and always enjoy the food on offer. I certainly hope that if you have time to visit us in the future that we can dine together. We also change the menus on a regular basis. Best Regards

title: Convenience with basic hotel requirements
review: We planned to stay here a few nights but ended up staying here only 1 night. Although the staff was friendly and service minded, the room was comfortable and the buffet breakfast good. But the electrical wiring problems and the light unpleasant smell in the bathroom were things that did put is off.

title: UK Travelodge
review: Hello. It is true that most New facilities will have some "tweaking" and fine tuning to do. I do apologise that you experienced some problems but do hope you can visit us and see the completed product. Thank you for taking the time to comment on the hotel and facilities. I know you will enjoy our offering if you indeed have the chance to come again. Take care, Austin

title: Fruit in the room
review: Almost rooms are 2 bedrooms suite. In fact it is 2 rooms and has extra door before separating to 2 rooms.  It has connecting door.  Room A is king size bed with bathtub and shower while room B is twin bed but bed size is quite big(5 ft) with only shower.  It Just open for 3 months and has 2 buildings. Just open one while the other is decorating with swimming pool in between these 2 buildings.  Room is new but air condition is not good.  Only swimming pool and 1 restaurant is opened.  Swimming pool is beside restaurant so it seems you are showing to guest who is dining.  Location is quite convenient but car park is quite limited.  Car parked in front of hotel so it is difficult to go in and out if you have to load your stuffs.  Food price is reasonable.  Overall should be 3 or…

title: A bit too new
review: We only stayed one night but Centara Pattaya wasn't at all that impressive. The hotel just opened so there were construction going on in some buildings, thankfully none could be heard at night. The swimming pool is medium-sized and unremarkable. The lobby was decorated like they were aiming for a modern look. The rooms were brand new and pleasantly decorated. Air conditioning and electronics all worked fine but the room service menu was so limited, with only a few choices of appetizers, some curries, some Thai dishes and maybe 1 or 2 salads.   We hung out at the pool for a swim and some 69 baht glasses of draft Singha beer and some employees were setting up a food buffet for their staff party near the area and they offered us complimentary snacks so that was a nice touch. But…

title: Nice new hotel!
review: Hello, and thanks for taking the time to comment on the Hotel and facilities. As you can see from other reviews we have come a long way since opening and I hope you will have the opportunity to visit us again soon. I know you will enjoy the finished product and I am especially proud of the service standard we offer. When you re book please remind us of your return guest status and we can assist you with any extra needs. Kind Regards Austin

title: Great new hotel in N. Pattaya at a great price
review: Stayed at Centara Pattaya Hotel in January 2012, just 8 days after the hotel opened. Of course there are a few startup problems, but nothing major. The hotel is modern and comfortable. Central location in  a quiet sou just 2 minutes walk to 2nd road and the bath bus.  Only one wing of the hotel is opened yet, but there is no building noice. I am staying in a one bedroom suite, and it is value for money. There is a mid size pool and sunbeds around. Hotel lobby with lobby bar and restaurant, both good priced. Friendly and serviceminded staff. And the wifi is good and fast - and best of all; free :) I reccomend this hotel as a value for money 4 stars hotel in the heart of Pattaya.
